K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:1b-1: bam po drug cu gsum pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-11: gang gi tshe klu gzhon nu de khyod la yo byad thams cad kyis stob par byed pa de'i mgo la nor bu 'dug pa de slongs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-13: ser sna can yin pas mi ster bas phyin chad 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-14: dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa de'i tshe na klu gzhon nu de de bzhin du rdzing chen po de nas byung nas lus kyis drang srong de'i lus la lan bdun dkris te steng du gdengs ka chen po byas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-15: gang gi tshe drang srong de langs par gyur pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-16: klu gzhon nu des drang srong de'i lus la lus kyis dkrol nas dpung rgyan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-18: phreng ba rgyu sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-19: byug pas brgyan par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-20: thal mo sbyar nas mdun du 'dug ste drang srong de la yo byad thams cad kyis stob par byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-21: drang srong des de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-23: khyod kyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-26: pha ma dag la dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-29: klu gzhon nu des pha ma gnyis la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:7b-31: drang srong gis bdag gi nor bu slong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-2: nor bu 'di'i mthus bdag cag gi zas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-6: rgyan dag rnyed pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-8: de nas klu gzhon nu de rdzing de nas byung ste drang srong de'i mdun du 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-9: drang srong des de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-11: khyod kyi mgo la 'dug pa'i nor bu gang yin pa de kho bo la sbyin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-12: de nas klu gzhon nu des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-13: bza' dang btung dang de bzhin bgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-14: nor bu 'di yi mthu las 'grub 'gyur bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-15: de phyir khyod la nor bu 'di mi sbyin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-16: ha cang slong bas zhe sdang gnas su gyur; ;ha cang slong bas bdag la sdig byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-17: ral gri rdo dang 'bru mar bdar ba bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-18: gal te khyod gnas phyin chad bdag 'ong na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-19: bdag gi klad pa rdo bas snun gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-21: mi snang ba'i lam na 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-23: re zhig dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags de dag kyang ha cang bslangs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-24: mi snang ba'i lam na 'khod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-25: mi dag lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-27: dge slong gis ha cang bslang par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-30: 'das pa'i dus na grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas shig na drang srong zhig 'dug ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-33: nye 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8a-34: de na bya mang po dag gnas pa de dag der sgra 'byin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8b-14: me tog phun sum tshogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8b-18: 'on kyang 'di na nyes dmigs kyang yod do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:8b-23: bsam gtan dag gi tsher ma ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17a-19: mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17a-23: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17a-26: bdag cag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17a-32: mi mkhas pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17a-36: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-0: rjes su mthun pa ma @17b yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-2: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-3: rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-4: zhes rnam par smad par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dag slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-8: phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-9: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-10: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-11: yang dge slong gang dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o; ;zhes bsgo ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-13: bdag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-15: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la yang 'dri'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-19: mi mkhas pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-22: dge slong kun shes par 'dod pas kyang bslab pa de la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-23: dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-25: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la yang dri bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-28: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-31: dge slong rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-33: tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-34: zhes bsgo ba na zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-35: bslab pa gang yin pa de la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:17b-36: de dag la zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-2: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-3: dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde mtha' dag 'dzin pa gang dag yin pa rnams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-4: 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba mtha' dag 'dzin pa gang dag yin pa rnams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-6: bar du zhes bya ba ni ma mo mtha' dag 'dzin pa gang dag yin pa rnams la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-7: byis pa zhes bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-8: byis pa zhes bya ba ni nyes par bsam pa sems pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-9: nyes par smra ba brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-10: nyes par bya ba'i las byed pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-11: rmongs pa zhes bya ba la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-12: rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-13: 'dul pa 'dzin pa ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-14: ma mo 'dzin pa ma yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-15: mi gsal ba zhes bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-16: mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni mdo sde la mi gsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-17: 'dul ba la mi gsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-18: ma mo la mi gsal ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-19: mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-20: mi mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni mdo sde la mi mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-21: 'dul ba la mi mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-22: ma mo la mi mkhas pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-23: khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-24: zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni de skad ces zer na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-26: zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18a-30: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-0: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags @18b na; dge ba'i chos rnams sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-3: dge slong kun shes par 'dod pas kyang bslab pa de la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-4: dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-6: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la yang dri bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-7: de la de ni cho ga yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-8: zhes bya ba ni de la de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-9: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-10: dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-13: bdag dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-21: thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-25: rmongs pa khyed kyi tshig gis bslab pa 'di la mi slob bo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-32: zhes zer na; ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:18b-33: yang dag pa kho nar byis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-2: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-3: bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa spong ba'i ltung byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-4: bdun cu lnga ba rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-6: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-7: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-9: ko'u shambhir song ste snying las chung ngur 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-10: 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-12: dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-13: dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-14: bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag 'dug cing pha rol gnon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-17: ma mo 'dzin par gyur nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-19: bdag cag yun ring po nas drug sde dag gis mtho btsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-20: ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis mtho btsams pa ltar yang gzhan gyis ma btsams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-21: ji ltar nye dgas mtho btsams pa ltar yang dga' bos ma btsams kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-22: de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-24: 'di'i phu bo rtsod pa la mkhas pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-27: zhes de dag dpong sa'i khang par zhugs te sgo bcad nas gros bya bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-28: nye dga' skar khung na nyan cing des de dag bsdigs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19a-29: kye ma bcu bdun sde dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19b-0: kho bo'i tshangs pa @19b mtshungs par spyod pa kha cig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19b-3: snying las chung ngu kho nar 'dug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19b-5: dus la bab pas da 'di gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19b-7: khyed kyis da kho bo cag zil gyis mnan te 'khod snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19b-8: kho bo cag gis kyang khyed la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:19b-10: glang po'i thag pa nyi ma dang //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:21a-1: zhing gros byed pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:21a-2: kho bos phyi bzhin song ste mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:21a-4: khyed nyan rnas 'dug tu rung ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:21a-6: gal te kho bos khyed cag gros byed pa'i tshe nyan rnas 'dug par ma gyur tu zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:21a-7: khyed cag gis kho bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:21a-8: dge slong don nyung ngu dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:21a-13: rtsod par gyur cing 'khod pa la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:21a-15: cang mi smra bar nyan rnas 'dug par byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:21a-17: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29a-3: 'on te legs 'ongs kyi bsod nams med pas de ltar gyur pa blta'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29a-5: ji tsam na des legs 'ongs kyi ming gis phru rtog btsugs pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29b-3: ji tsam na stong par mthong nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29b-10: deng bdag gis khyod mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29b-13: gzhan dag kyang gcig la gcig de skad zer nas de dag gis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29b-15: snyam nas de dag gis bltas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29b-16: ji tsam na legs 'ongs der 'ongs pa mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29b-21: 'di'i le lan gyis bdag cag 'thab mo byung bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29b-22: zhes de dag gis bskrad de gzhan du song ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29b-25: ji tsam na mu lto ba de dag kyang lag pa stong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29b-26: sprang phor stong par gyur te phyir lhags nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:29b-28: bdag cag sngon chad gang du zhugs pa der lag pa gang ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-2: deng bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-3: sprang phor stong par gyur te phyir lhags pa 'di la rgyu ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-5: bdag cag gi nang du sems can skal chad 'ga' zhig zhugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-7: bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-8: sprang phor stong par gyur te phyir lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-9: yang de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-11: bdag cag kha gnyis su bcad de 'jug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-12: zhes de dag gis kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-13: gang dag gi nang du legs 'ongs zhugs pa de dag lag pa stong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-14: sprang phor stong par gyur te lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-15: de dag gis kyang kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang yang de ltar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-16: de dag yang dang yang du kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang de lta de ltar gyur nas ji tsam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-17: legs 'ongs dang mu lto ba gzhan gcig dang gnyis lhan cig zhugs pa yang so sor bye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-20: sprang phor stong par gyur te 'ongs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-21: gzhan thams cad lag pa gang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-22: sprang phor gang bar gyur te 'ongs nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-23: sems can skal chad 'di bdag cag gi nang du zhugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-25: bdag cag lag pa stong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-26: sprang phor stong par gyur te lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30a-27: zhes de dag gis legs 'ongs shin tu brdegs te bskrad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30b-0: mnyan yod na khyim bdag rtog ldan gyi chung po grogs khyim bdag cig 'dug @30b pa de zong thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30b-1: chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir phyin nas khyim bdag des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30b-2: legs 'ongs lag na sprang phor thogs te srang du song ba mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:30b-3: de bzhin gzugs las de'i ngo shes nas des de la smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:34a-1: de dag gis kyang yang dang yang du kha gnyis su bcad de zhugs pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:34b-18: srid pa'i yo byad dag gis kyang ngom par bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35a-8: lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35a-9: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos legs 'ongs la lhung bzed lhag ma bzhag pa brjed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35a-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35a-11: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma bzhag pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35a-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi pham phabs blang bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35a-14: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la legs 'ongs la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma zhog cig ces bka' stsal pa brjed pa dran nas des du bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-0: bdag gis legs 'ongs la lhung @35b bzed kyi lhag ma bzhag pa bskyud de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-1: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bcag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-3: khyod kyis nga'i bka' bcag pa ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-4: 'di ltar legs 'ongs nyid kyis las kyi sgrib pas khyod kyis de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma bzhag pa brjed par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-6: khyod song la legs 'ongs bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-9: du ma dag gis aang zhes lan btab cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-11: deng bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mas gang la dgongs snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo phyir log ste gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-16: du ma dag gis aang zhes lan btab na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-20: chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa khyim bdag rtog ldan gyi bu legs 'ongs gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-22: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo song ste de skad bos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-23: legs 'ongs kyis bdag gi ming dran nas des tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-25: ga las 'dir ni mchis par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-26: nges par ma legs zad gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-27: legs pa byung bar gyur yang dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-28: gang dag khyod la skyabs mchis pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-29: de dag mgon ni kun mkhyen lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-30: gang dag khyod kyi gsung dga' dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:35b-32: bdag ni skal dang bral ba ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-2: brtse gnas drag po'i gnas thob pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-3: mya ngan zug rngus gzir ba lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de khrid de zhugs nas gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-10: khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyi pham phabs za 'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-12: 'tshal lo; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis de la lhung bzed kyi pham phabs stsal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-13: ji tsam na des nyung ngur mthong nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-14: bdag la bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum gyi bla mas brgya lam na dgongs su zin kyang lhung bzed kyi pham phabs chung ngu zhig bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-18: gal te khyod ri rab tsam gyi kham dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-19: rgya mtsho chen po tsam gyi ltos za bar byed na yang ji srid du khyod tshim par ma gyur pa de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed kyi pham phabs zad par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-20: des bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi pham phabs zos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-22: de bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-28: kham tha ma longs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36a-30: des de blangs nas mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-0: khyim bdag mgon med zas @36b sbyin gyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-4: khyim bdag chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri ba khyim bdag rtog ldan gyi bu yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-6: 'o na bdag gi chung po grogs kyi bu lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon bshad pa mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-10: srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin slad bzhin rjes su 'brang zhing song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-12: bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-13: legs 'ongs kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i las sbyang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis legs 'ongs la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-18: khyod la karsha pa na dag yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-25: ji tsam na karsha pa na gnyis yod par mthong nas des gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:36b-30: song la kun dga' ra ba pa rgyal bu dum pa'i gan nas autpa la sngon po dag khyer te shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-0: des bcom ldan 'das bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes @37a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-1: bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas kun dga' ra ba pa rgyal bu dum pa ga la ba der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-2: rgyal bu dum pas de thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-4: bdag la gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-7: kun dga'i ra bar ma 'jug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-8: legs 'ongs kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-9: bdag ni autpal mi sgrub ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-10: padma bdag la dgongs pa med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-11: kho bo kun mkhyen grags ldan pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-12: thub pa'i dbang po'i pho nya yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-13: dum pas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-14: gal te thub pa zhi bdag nyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-15: lha mi rnams kyi mchod gnas kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-16: mchod pa'i gnas kyis ches mchod pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-17: pho nya lags na tshur gshegs byon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-19: khyod sangs rgyas kyi pho nya yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-21: kho bo sangs rgyas kyi pho nya yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-23: autpa la dag gi phyir 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-24: song la ji snyed 'dod pa de snyed khyer te song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-25: legs 'ongs kyis autpa la sngon po dag gi khur khyer te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-28: dge slong rnams la brims shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37a-29: legs 'ongs kyis dge slong rnams la autpa la sngon po dag brim par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-0: dge slong dag mi len nas bcom ldan 'das @37b kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-1: dge slong dag dri zhim po thams cad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-5: dge slong rnams kyis me tog de dag blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-6: legs 'ongs kyis sngon zad par sngon po'i skye mched bskyed pas de rgan pa'i mtha' logs na 'dug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-7: dge slong rnams kyi lag na autpa la sngon po dag thogs pa de dag mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-8: mthong nas zad par sngon po'i skye mched mngon du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-10: khyod ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-14: rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gdams ngag stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-15: de de ltar rab tu byung nas gcig pu dben pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-18: bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-19: tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de'i tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-20: tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-22: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-24: dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:37b-25: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-0: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i @38a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-2: tsandan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-5: so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-8: bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-10: nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-12: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-14: bde ba nyams su myong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-15: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-16: dbang po de nyid gzigs pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-17: thabs kyi zhags pas bdag bcings te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-18: glang chen rgas pa 'dam phyung ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-19: thugs rjes sdug bsngal 'dam nas phyung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-20: bdag ni sngon chad legs 'ongs gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-22: da ni thugs dbang khyod gsung gis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-23: gsal bar legs 'ongs nyid du gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-24: kun mkhyen lcags 'dra bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-25: khyod kyi gsung mchog thos gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-26: da ni gser dang 'dra ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-27: zag pa med pa'i lus kyang thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-28: rin chen la sogs thob pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-29: mtho ris thar pa 'tshal ba yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-30: rtag tu phan pa bzhed pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-31: dge bshes bsten par bgyi ba bzang ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38a-34: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-0: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul @38b ba la rab tu byung ba de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-3: dge sbyong go'u ta ma na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-5: kun tu mdzes pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-8: nyes 'ongs la sogs pa mu lto ba dag kyang rab tu 'byin par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-9: de'i bstan pa ji ltar kun tu mdzes pa yin zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-11: kha zer bar byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa; nyan thos chen po ri rab lta bu la skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag smras pa skyed par byed pas 'di'i yon tan bsgrag par bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-13: gang du skyes shing gang du rdib pa de nyid du bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-17: song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-18: khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-19: chos gos dag longs shig ces sgos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-20: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-22: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-23: bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-24: khyed cag las gang bcom ldan 'das dang thabs cig tu ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:38b-25: chos gos dag longs shig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-1: ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-2: zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-3: grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-4: dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-5: thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-6: dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-7: 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-8: mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-9: khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-10: glang po che ltar glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-11: seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-12: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar ngang pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-13: nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-14: bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-15: sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-16: dpa' bo ltar ru pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-17: sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-18: ded dpon ltar tshong pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-19: tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-20: khams kyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-21: 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39a-22: zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-0: nyi ma ltar 'od zer @39b stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-1: yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-2: 'phags skyes po ltar grul bum gyis tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-3: mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-4: gnod sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-5: thag bzang ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-6: brgya byin ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-7: tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-8: dbang po rnams shin tu dul ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-9: spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-10: chu gter ltar ting de ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-11: sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-12: glang po che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-13: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-14: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-15: 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-16: nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-17: rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun tu bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-20: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-21: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:39b-30: lag bzang la sogs pa nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-0: gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos @40a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-1: yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te ngan spong gi bu dag tu chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri ga la ba de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir byon nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi cha la ri dvags kyi nags na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-2: chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-3: bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-4: chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir byon nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs rung gi tshal ri dvags kyi nags na bzhugs zhes thos so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-5: thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs su /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-6: byings nas byings su 'dus shing lhags te chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-7: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-8: mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-9: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-10: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-11: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-12: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40a-14: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-0: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar @40b mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-1: de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-2: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sang bdag cag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-4: khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-5: de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-7: de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-8: khyim bdag rnams kyis de nyid kyis mtshan mo bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-9: bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-10: gdan bshams shing chur bzhag nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snga dro sham thabs gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-16: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:40b-17: dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-0: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du @41a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-1: bdar nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi bkad sa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-2: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-3: de nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-4: khyim bdag rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-5: dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-6: bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-8: rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-9: bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-10: bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol zhing phyag bcabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-11: lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba dag blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-12: 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri ba'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-17: 'brog gnas la sogs pa de dang de dag kyang btul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-19: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa 'di yun ring po nas bdag cag 'khon ma mchis pa rnams la 'khon du 'dzin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-20: mi 'gran pa rnams la 'gran du tshol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41a-21: mi 'khu ba rnams la 'khu bar bgyid cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-0: lo tog 'khrungs so 'tshal @41b ma rungs par bgyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-1: kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs brtse ba'i slad du klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa 'di 'dul du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-4: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-5: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-6: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-7: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-10: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-12: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-14: song la dge slong rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-15: khyed cag las gang klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa 'dul bar spro ba des tshul shing longs shig ces bsgo la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-16: dge 'dun la tshul shing brims shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:41b-17: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-0: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan @42a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-1: nas dge slong rnams la khyed cag las gang klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa 'dul bar spro ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-2: tshul shing longs shig ces bsgo ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-3: dge 'dun la tshul shing brims par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul shing ma bzhes nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du tshul shing ma bzhes snyam du bsam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-6: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi yon tan bsgrag par bzhed par rig nas de dag gis kyang tshul shing ma blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-7: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis bsam pa; bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis ci'i slad du tshul shing ma bzhes snyam du bsam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-8: bdag gi yon tan bsgrag par bzhed nas ston pa'i thugs la dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-10: des stan phyed las 'phags te glang po che'i sna lta bu'i lag pa brkyangs nas tshul shing blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-12: kun dga' po dge slong gnas brtan gang gis tshul shing blangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-14: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-17: song la dge slong legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42a-19: klu gdug pa yin gyi khyod kyis lus kyi dbang po bsrung bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-1: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-3: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-4: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-9: khyod kyis lus kyi dbang po bsrung bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-11: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-13: ston pa'i bka' mnyan pas bka' bzhin 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-14: gzhan du na klu aa mra'i chu ngogs lta bu sha stag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-16: bu ram shing gi tshal lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-18: 'od ma'i tshal bzhin du gang bar gyur kyang de dag gis bdag gi spu'i rtse mo tsam yang g-yo bar mi nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-19: lus kyi dbang po 'gag par lta ga la nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-21: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po dag kun tu bsten cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-23: lan mang du byas pa'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-24: de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-25: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-26: chu srin byis pa gsod kyi rir bsod snyoms rgyus nas klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa'i gnas ga la ba der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:42b-27: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs thag ring po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-1: pa; dge sbyong 'dis bdag shi bar gtam thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis chu tshags dang lhung bzed mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste snam sbyar sbrugs nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-8: lag pa gnyis bsnyal te tshu btsags nas lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis zas kyi bya ba byas nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-12: 'dul ba'i gnas su mi rung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-14: klu gdug pa yin pas 'khrugs par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-16: de lhung bzed bkrus te lhung bzed kyi 'khrud ma'i chu de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-17: de'i rdzing der blugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-18: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa de 'khrugs nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-19: bdag gis dge sbyong 'di 'ong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-20: za ba yang yal bar bor na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-21: bdag la brnyas te bdag gi gnas su 'khrud ma'i chu ldugs par byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-23: nye bar ma zhi ba zhig yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-25: de khros te steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'brug sgra chen po phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43a-26: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi steng du rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-0: mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa mtshon cha sna tshogs @43b dbab par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-1: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-2: mtshon cha de dag lha'i me tog autpa la dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-5: padma dkar po dag tu gyur te tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi lus la 'bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-6: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pas me mdag gi char dbab par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-7: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-8: me mdag de dag lha'i me tog manda ra ba dag tu gyur te tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi lus la 'bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-9: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pas phyag dar gyi char dbab par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-10: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-11: phyag dar de dag lha'i aa ka ru'i phye ma dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-12: tsandan gyi phye ma dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-13: rgya spos kyi phye ma dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-14: ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dag tu gyur te tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi lus la 'bab po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-15: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pas khro ba'i mthus ngu ba btul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-16: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus ngu ba btul te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-17: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pas khro pa'i mthus me spar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-18: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-19: de na klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa'i khro ba'i mthu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:43b-20: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus snang ba chen po byung bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-0: chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang @44a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-1: khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-4: bcom ldan 'das klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa gdul bar mdzad pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-7: nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-8: dge slong legs 'ongs 'di mchog yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-9: gang gi che klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa mtshon thams cad zad par gyur pa de'i tshe na des 'bros par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-10: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis kun tu me mngon par sprul nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-11: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyi rkang pa'i drung 'ba' zhig zhi bar mthong ba ma gtogs par thams cad kun tu 'bar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-14: me lce gcig tu gyur bar mthong nas de tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-16: ci'i slad du bdag la mtho 'tsham par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-18: kho bo khyod la mtho 'tsham pa ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-19: khyod kho bo la mtho 'tsham ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-20: gal te kho bos yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob par ma gyur tu zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44a-21: khyod kyis deng kho bo ming las lhag ma ma lus par byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-1: bdag gis ci bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-5: bslab pa'i gzhi dag longs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-7: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa lhung bzed du bcug nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-8: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-10: klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa de 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-13: khyod re zhig nyes par spyad pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-14: da ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas ngan par skyes shing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-22: khyod 'di nas shi 'phos pa'i 'gro ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:44b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gis ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:45a-2: bslab pa'i gzhi dag longs la chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri ba'i bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:45a-3: khyim bdag rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:45a-5: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:45a-7: deng slan chad nas chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:45a-8: khyim bdag rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsol to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:45a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa btul tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:45a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:45a-16: ngas klu aa mra'i chu ngogs pa ma btul te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:45b-7: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:45b-8: btsun pa legs 'ongs la brten te dgung bdun du bdag cag gi mchod pa'i dbang du bgyis pa'i gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:45b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri pa'i bram ze dang /
