K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-12: bcos pa'i chang 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-13: 'bru'i chang dang bcos pa'i chang 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-14: dge slong 'bru'i chang gi nu rdzi 'thung na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-15: dge slong sbang ma za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-16: dge slong tshigs ma za na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-17: dge slong phabs kyi chang bu za na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-18: dge slong me tog dang 'bras bu myos par 'gyur ba dag za na nyes su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-20: kha'i nad yod pa la sman pa'i lung gis khur bar bsrel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-21: lus dag skud pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-25: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-26: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-27: the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-29: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-30: las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-31: nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50a-33: las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-0: mu lto @50b ba rnams kyi nang du zhugs shing nyes 'ongs zhes bgyi ba'i ming du gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-2: las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-6: rigs kyi bu legs 'ongs nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-8: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-9: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-10: legs 'ongs nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-12: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-15: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-17: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-19: skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-20: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-21: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-22: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-25: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na ri brag cig na khyim bdag phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-27: longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-28: 'khor dang bcas te skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-29: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:50b-30: bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-2: bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-3: rang sangs rgyas na ba zhig ri brag der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-4: khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas de thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-5: de zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-7: rab tu byung ba 'di skrod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-8: de dag las 'ga' yang rang sangs rgyas de skrod par spro ba med nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-9: khyim bdag des spyos te stan las langs te rang nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas de'i gnya' ba nas bzung ste bskrad nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-11: mu lto ba rnams kyi nang du zhugs shig ces phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-12: de phyag dar gyi phung po'i nang du bsgyel to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-13: rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-14: khyim bdag nyon mongs pa 'di ha cang smras pa dang nyams bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-16: 'di la lag nas drang pa sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-18: des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-21: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-23: rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-24: khyim bdag de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51a-25: yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-1: nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-2: rang sangs rgyas de khyim bdag de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-3: khyim bdag des de la mchod pa byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-4: bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur par mchod pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-6: longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skye zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-7: 'di pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-8: thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-11: de la de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-13: 'dis rang sangs rgyas de la mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-14: da ltar phyug la nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-16: nyes 'ongs zhes brjod pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin bas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-17: bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gdungs nas las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mu lto pa nyid kyis 'phyan par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-18: nyes 'ongs zhes bya bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:51b-19: da ltar gyi bar du yang mu lto ba rnams kyi nang du zhugs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-0: nyes 'ongs zhes bya ba'i ming du @52a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-2: bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur par 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-3: thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-4: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-5: 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-7: tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-8: las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-10: de yang smon lam gyi dbang gis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-11: gang du smon lam btab ce na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-13: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-14: ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-15: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-16: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-17: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-0: de w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na nye @52b bar brten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-1: de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas dge slong gang gis de rab tu byung ba'i dge slong de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-3: de na 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-4: de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-5: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-6: yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-7: bdag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-9: bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub par gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-10: rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-13: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-14: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:52b-16: zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-4: sh'akya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-5: yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-7: smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas yang dang yang du me'i khams la snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-10: las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-11: gcig tu nag pa rnams yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-12: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-13: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-16: las gcig tu nag pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-18: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la stsal par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-20: khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-21: myos par 'gyur ba 'thung ba'i ltung byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-22: bdun cu dgu pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-24: zhi pa ral ba nor bu dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-25: sman pa dge 'dun lto dang skras //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-26: za dang gnyis gyur gtum mo dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53a-27: gzhon nu lhung bzed stobs rnams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan @53b yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-1: ri brag cig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-2: mnyan yod pa'i bu mo zhig bag mar blangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-3: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-5: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-6: de la bu mo zhig byung nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen mor gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-7: bram ze de la re zhig mnyan yod du bya ba zhig byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-8: des shing rta bcas te 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-9: bu mo des mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-20: khyod da mchog thob pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-22: rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis reg par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-23: bdag cag la mi snyan par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-25: bu mo des ngu bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-30: yab mnyan yod du bzhud nas bdag der khrid par mi bzhed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-33: bu mo yang khrid cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-34: nye du dag mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-36: bu mo da mchog 'thob par 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-38: rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis reg par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-39: bdag cag la mi snyan par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-42: rje'i sras dang thabs cig mchi na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:53b-45: bram ze des bu mo de shing rtar bcug ste 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-0: bu mo de ltad mo'i rang bzhin can @54a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-4: 'di su'i kun dga' ra ba lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-12: 'di ni sh'a kya'i bu dge spyod rnams kyi bsti gnas yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-18: bsti gnas 'di na rigs sna tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-19: rus sna tshogs las rab tu byung ba dag 'khod pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-21: rkang pa la 'ga' zhig gis reg par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-22: bdag la mi snyan par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-26: ji tsam na grong bar de nyid nas bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-27: khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po gtsug lag khang lta 'dod pa dag mnyan yod kyi phyi rol du byung ba de dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-30: snum zung byon pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-32: khyod yun ring mo ring mo zhig gis gar bzhud /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-34: kho bo khyed cag nyid bltar 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-36: rgyal byed kyi tshal du gtsug lag khang bltar mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-38: tsha mo 'di yang khrid de dengs la 'di la yang gtsug lag khang ston cig bu mo de yang de dag dang lhan cig rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-39: drug sde dag gi kun tu spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54a-40: 'dir bdag cag gis bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-0: khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la yang chos bstan par @54b bya; rgol ba dag kyang tshar gcad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-1: rang gi grags pa yang bsgrag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-3: drug sde dag las gang yang rung bas rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo stong par mi 'jog pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-4: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka nang par sngar langs te so shing bor nas snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-5: rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-6: drug sde dag gis grong khyer chen po drug po dag na 'khod pa'i mi rnams 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-17: rnam par mi shes pa 'ga' yang med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-18: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-19: khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po de dag thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-20: mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-28: khyed cag ci'i phyir yun ring mo ring mo nas zla ba ltar rgyu bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-30: btsun pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das kyis mi khom pa brgyad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-31: gang zag gis tshangs par spyad pa'i dus ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-32: zhes legs par rab tu gsungs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:54b-35: khyim gyi 'du 'dzi dang ldan pas mi khom pa dgu pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-0: dug can la sogs rgyal po @55a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-1: yis; ;bya ba dag ni ma byas par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-2: de dag nyid dang bya ba rnams //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-3: zhig pa nyid du gyur pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-4: bya ba de dag nyid kyang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-5: yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-8: zhes smras pa ma thos sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-11: de'i slad du bdag cag skyed mos tshal du mchis te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'jug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-12: gtsug lag khang blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-14: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i slad du mchis lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-17: gal te khyed cag de'i phyir 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-25: ltad mo ji ltar blta bar dri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-27: khyed cag gang du 'jug par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-29: bdag cag kun dga' ra bar 'jug cing gtsug lag khang blta bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-32: mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-33: sangs rgyas mchod rten dag la gom 'dor na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-34: dzambu chu bo'i gser ltar srang tshad ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-35: stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55a-36: zhes gsungs pas de yang legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-0: khyed kyis gang khyed cag gtsug lag khang ston par byed pa'i dge slong 'ga' zhig @55b btsal tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-2: ci bdag cag sgron ma sug pa na thogs bzhin du zhugs gzhan du tshol lam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-3: btsun pa 'char ka spangs te dge slong gzhan ga la tshol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-4: khyod pas gzhan khyad par 'phags pa su zhig mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-5: khyod nyid kyis bstan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-7: gal te 'di dag gtsug lag khang bstan par bya na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-8: bdag gi dge ba'i phyogs yongs su nyams par yang 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-9: gal te bstan par mi bya na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-10: tshig pa'i bsod snyoms kyang ster bar mi 'gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma dad pa rnams dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-16: de'i phyir 'di dag dge ba la nges par sbyar bar bya'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-17: rnam pa thams cad du bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-18: snyam du rig nas des me tog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-19: bdug spos la sogs pa mchod pa sna tshogs thogs te pog phor lag tu blangs nas go rim ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi dri gtsang khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:55b-23: gang du bcom ldan 'das nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-5: ngan song gi 'dam nas bslangs te mtho ris dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-8: 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-10: 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-11: 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-12: gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-14: gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma skyes pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-16: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa gang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-18: yongs su smin pa gang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-19: rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-22: chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-24: sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-26: ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-27: rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-29: rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-30: kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-31: bzhon ma gdul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-32: srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-33: rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-35: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56a-36: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-0: @56b mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-1: khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-2: 'khor gyi nang du sengge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-3: 'di'i zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten mi shes pa'i mun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-8: yongs su 'dren pa med pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-9: de'i dang por ye shes kyi mag sman gyi thur mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-10: gang gi chos kyi mig rnam par sbyangs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-12: rgyal tshab lta bu rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-13: yun ring po nas rab tu byung ba rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-14: tshangs par spyod pa mngon par spyad pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-15: snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-16: gang gi rgyud la de'i dang por bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten du dge slong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-21: sus kyang chos dang mthun par bskor mi nus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-22: chos dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'gro ba mang po'i don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-23: skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-25: 'jig rten la rjes su thugs brtse ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-26: lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-28: bde ba'i phyir lan gsum du bzlas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-29: rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba de'i yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-30: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:56b-32: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-0: bram ze shing s'a la chen po lta bu rmon pa dor stong tu gcig gis mchog pa spangs @57a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-2: dbyig bye ba phrag drug cu dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-3: gser nas bang chung brgyad cu bdog pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-4: bran gyi grong bco brgyad bdog pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-5: sbyor ba'i grong bcu drug bdog pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-6: ser skya bzang mo lus gser bas lhag pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-7: mchil ma'i thal ba smin pa ltar spangs te mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la ras sbyar ma'i snam sbyar rin thang 'bum ri ba thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-8: 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi phyir rab tu byung ba bsam gtan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-11: snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed pa'i phyir nags na brtan pa gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-12: gang mthong na spos kyi glang po che dag kyang rgyags pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang gi bu mang gi mchod rten du ston par khas blangs nas dge slong gi sdom pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-14: nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong 'dod pa chung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-16: sbyangs pa'i yon tan smra ba rnams kyi nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su bsngags pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-23: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-25: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-26: mchog thob pa'i bu gang yin pa gang lo brgyad gnyis su dbang po'i brda sprod pa bklags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57a-27: rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis @57b shes rab chen po rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-1: spobs pa chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten thams cad gang gi cha bcu drug par bzhag cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-5: 'jig rten kun gyi shes rab gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-6: sh'a ri'i bu yi shes rab kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-7: bcu drug char yang mi chog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-9: sh'a ri'i bu dang mnyam gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-11: bcu drug char yang mi chog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-12: zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-13: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-15: tshe dang ldan pa moonggal gyi bu chen po'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-16: mdun na 'don gyi bu cod pan med pa'i rgyal srid spangs te rab tu byung ba gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-17: gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthe bos lan gsum du bsgul /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-19: kun tu rab tu bsgul ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-20: gang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer can du nyin mtshan bdun gyis gshegs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-22: mthu chen po rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-23: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-25: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gag pa'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-26: mi skal pa bzang po las rab tu byung ba gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:57b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-0: gang gi ming yang dag par bsgrags pas tshong @58a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-1: pa dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bzhon pa'i snod legs par grub cing 'ong bar 'gyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i mig can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-3: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-6: yun ring po nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsnyen bkur ba gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring na nye bar spyod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-8: ston pas yang dag par bsngags pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-9: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams kyis yang dag par bkur ba gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi yab kyi mched kyi sras las rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-13: thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-14: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-16: tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga'i gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung po sru'i sras las rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-18: gal te rab tu ma byung na stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-20: dbang po dag gi sgo bsdams pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-21: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-23: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyi gtsug lag khang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi sras las rab tu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-0: @58b gal te rab tu ma byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-1: mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-2: gang rab tu byung bas rgyal po mang pos bkur gyi rgyud gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang dag par rgyud chad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-4: bslab pa la gus pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-5: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa thob pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa gang yin pa de'i yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-6: 'dir yang zhabs la phyag dag tshol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-8: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo'i gtsug lag khang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-18: kho bo'i gtsug lag khang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-19: ci; 'di yang blta bar byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-21: ci bdag cag gi gtsug lag khang thams cad bltas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-22: gdod 'phags pa 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang blta bar mi bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-23: bdag cag gis 'phags pa 'char ka'i gtsug lag khang 'di dag shin tu blta bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-26: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de 'dod chags spyad pa yin pas de'i gtsug lag khang gi gzhi mon sran gre'u'i phye mas bskus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-27: rtsig pa bkra zhing nye bar bkra ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-28: mal stan be'u phrug gi snying po can bshams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-29: bum pa btung bas bkang ba bcu snod dang bcas pa bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:58b-30: skon pa'i nang na bca' ba sna tshogs kyis gang ba dag yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-0: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bram ze dang khyim bdag gi chung ma rab tu mang po rang gi gtsug lag khang du 'ongs pa rnams la smras @59a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-5: ci chu klung zlog phyogs su 'bab bab /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-6: bdag cag gis 'phags pa la gsol bar bgyi ba gang lags pa de nyid 'phags pas bdag cag la stsol tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-8: bdag cag la gang dkon pa de stsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-10: khyed cag la ci zhig dkon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas drug po dag 'jig rten du byung ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-15: ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-16: drug po de dag gang zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-18: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-20: dbus pa'i gnas su skye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-21: dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-24: de'i phyir khyed cag dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa skyes pa 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-29: kho bo khyed la chos bstan par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-30: de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-31: des de dag la chos bstan par brtsams so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59a-34: bu mo de yang ltad mo'i rang bzhin can yin pas ri mo blta zhing gzhan du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-0: de dag gis kyang chos mnyan nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i rkang @59b pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te gtsug lag khang nas byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-1: bu mo des gzhan dag byung ba tshor nas sgo khang de nyid na ri mo blta zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-2: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de dag bskyal nas gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-3: des bu mo de sgo khang na 'dug pa mthong nas des de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-4: bu mo khyod ma song ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-6: 'char kas de la 'o byas te yan lag dang nying lag dag mnams kun tu mnams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-7: bu mo de ngu zhing phyir byung nas pha'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-9: bdag dge sbyong 'char kas gzhon nu ma dang bral bar bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-11: gal te da cung zad smrar ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-14: mang bas bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yong bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-15: gang du grogs rnyed par gyur pa na ra mda' bzlog par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-17: rgyal byed kyi tshal dang mnyan yod kyi bar na gnas kyi shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i drung na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug cing 'dug nas bram ze des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-20: dge sbyong 'char kas kho bo'i bu mo gzhon nu ma dang bral bar byas kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-21: khyed cag kho bo'i tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-24: yongs su mi rtog pa yin pas de dag dbyug pa dag thogs te der dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-25: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo na 'chag cing 'dug pa de dag gis bzung zhing bkri bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:59b-26: de dag gis de bsgul bar yang ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-1: ldan 'das kyis gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas de'i stobs dbri bar mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-2: de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phar drangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-4: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gnod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-7: mi bde ba byung ba la mi dgongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-10: 'di la gdams pa'i tha ma 'di yin pas khrid kyang bla'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na gnyid log cing 'dug pa se gol gyi sgras sad par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-14: khyod kyis gya tsom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na gnyid log cing 'dug pa lan gnyis lan gsum du se gol gyi sgras sad par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-18: khyod kyis gya tsom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-20: bram ze de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60a-21: de na rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgo na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag bram ze rnams kyis dge sbyong 'char ka bzung ste rgyal po'i sgor khrid de 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-0: sgra chen po 'byin @60b to; ;ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na gnyid log pa skye bo phal po che'i tshogs des sad nas des zho shas 'tsho ba dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-2: ci'i phyir skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'di dag sgra mthon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-7: bram ze'i bu mo zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-9: bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam rgyal po'i pho brang gi chab sgo na blag cor mchi zhing mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-10: ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la dgongs nas bdag la rgyal po chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-12: khyod kyis gya tsom du mi bya bar legs par brtag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-15: mnyan yod na chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe rtsod pa chen po byung ba de'i tshe na rnga bo che rdung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-16: dung sgril ma yang 'bud par byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-17: rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-19: rnga bo che yang rdung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-20: dung sgril ma yang bus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-21: de dag gis rnga bo che brdungs shing dung sgril ma bus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-22: rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'dus par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-25: btsun pa 'char ka nang du thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-26: de gnyis nang du 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-27: rgyal pos bram ze de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-31: dge sbyong 'char kas bdag gi bu mo zhig gzhon nu ma dang bral bar bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:60b-34: bram ze 'di de skad mchi na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-2: bdag gis de la sdig pa'i las ma bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-3: rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-6: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod nyid spobs pa can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-9: lha nyid kyi zhal mchu 'di dgum du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-12: 'di la ji ltar shes pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-16: bu mo de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du thong la brtag tu chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-17: de dag gis bu mo de btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-18: btsun mo phreng ldan mas bu mo de pang bar bsnyal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-21: gal te khyod btsun pa 'char kas gzhon nu ma dang bral bar byas na yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-23: bram ze mdun na 'don gyi bu las rab tu byung ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-24: khyod kyi khyim thab kyi thab rir 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-25: 'on te khyod phyug chung ma rmas pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-26: dge slong la yang dag pa ma yin pas bskur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-27: sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-30: bdag des gzhon nu ma dang bral bar ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-33: nyid lag dag kun tu mnams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-34: btsun mo phreng ldan mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-36: khyod kyis don de tsam zhig la rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor kun tu dkrugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61a-38: pha dag kyang bu mo dag la 'o byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-1: nying lag drag la mi nom mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-3: de nas bud med rgan mo rnams kyis bu mo de brtag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-4: ji tsam na phyug chung ma nyams par 'gyur nas de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-6: bu mo 'di phyug chung ma nyams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-7: rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-10: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-15: dengs la bram ze 'di rgya skegs kyi khang par chug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-17: bu mo de yang rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la thogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-18: bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag kyang lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-20: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-22: gal te bdag la brten te sems can de snyed cig chab stsal bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-23: don gyis lhas bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa las phyung lags so; ;rgyal pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-25: 'o na dengs la bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po de dag thong la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-27: rgya skegs kyi khang par chug la mes sregs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-28: bu mo de yang rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la thogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-29: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-31: gal te bdag la brten te tha na grog ma phra mo 'ga' zhig la gnod par gyur na yang don gyis lhas bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa las phyung ba kho na lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-32: rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:61b-34: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'dod chags dang ma bral na yang so sor rtog pa'i stobs la ltos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-1: dag gis btsun pa 'char ka thub par gyur na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-2: rdo gcig gis kyang gsod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-4: dengs la thams cad khye zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-5: de dag bkye nas 'gyes rnga brdungs shing yol bas bcad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-6: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs dag so sor gyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-8: btsun mo phreng ldan ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-9: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gsum 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-10: rgyal pos btsun mo phreng ldan ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-12: btsun pa 'char kas ji ltar bu'i phan phun byas pas rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor kun tu dkrugs pa la ltos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-13: btsun mo phreng ldan mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-15: khyod pas slad kyis rab tu byung ba dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-16: dge tshul ma skul byed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-17: dge tshul ma ci ri ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-18: gzhan yang mang po gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-20: rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyi nang du mi mdzes pa 'di lta bu bgyis par gyur kyang da dung skyo ba mi mnga'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-21: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-23: da phyin chad 'khor bar 'khor ba na nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-24: zhes smras nas de stan las langs te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62a-25: de ngo tsha bas bcom ldan 'das dang 'phrad par ma nus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-0: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces @62b smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-2: ji ltar bdag 'khor bar 'khor ba na nyon mongs pa de lta bu dag kun tu spyod par mi 'gyur pa de ltar bdag la chos bstan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-3: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus bsam pa; ltung ba lhag ma med pa byung bar ma gyur tam snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-4: ji tsam na des lhag ma yod par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-5: des de bshags par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang 'chags su bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-6: bsdam par bya ba'i ltung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sdom du bcug nas des de la 'di dang 'di ltar yid la gyis la bag yod pas sgrubs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-8: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gcig pu dben pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-11: bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-12: rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-13: tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-14: bdag gi skye ba zad do; ;tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-16: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-18: dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-19: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-20: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:62b-22: rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-1: dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-4: bku sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-6: nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-8: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-12: bdag la phan pa mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-14: bdag la legs par mdzad pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-17: bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi chos mang po dag sel bar mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-19: bdag gi bde ba'i chos mang po dag sgrub par mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-21: bdag gi mi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag sel bar mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-23: bdag gi dge ba'i chos rnam pa du ma dag sgrub par mdzad pa lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-24: bdag gis ci zhig byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-25: des bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-27: rab tu byas par 'gyur snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-30: dka' ba mdzad pa brgya stong du ma dag gis bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa mdzad nas bla na med pa'i mkhyen pa thugs su chud pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-31: sems can la phan pa'i phyir yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63a-32: bdag gis kyang sems can la phan pa bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa 'ga' yod dam snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-2: des ji tsam na med par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-4: bdag nyid la ltos par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-6: bdag gis ston pa'i thugs la dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-8: gang 'dul ba'i dus yin snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-9: mnyan yod na bram ze zhi ba la dad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-10: zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byed pa zhig 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-11: bram ze de 'dul ba'i dus yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-12: snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-13: bram ze des kyang zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-14: kye bram ze bram ze zhes bram ze tshol bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-15: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-16: kho bo bram ze yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-19: thor tshugs can gyi khyod ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-20: dge sbyong mgo reg yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-21: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-23: kho bo bram ze yin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-24: kho bo'i ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-26: zhi ba 'di la mngon par dad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-29: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-31: ji ltar kho bo bram ze yin zhing kho bo'i ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-37: khyod kyi ston pa yang bram ze'i mchog lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-39: bdag gis yun ring po nas zhi ba la bsnyen bkur byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:63b-40: 'dis lan 'ga' rmi lam du yang ma bstan na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:64a-1: smras pa la tshig smra bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:64a-2: kye ma btsun pa 'char ka ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:64a-11: de'i slad du 'di nyid du bzhugs te zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzod cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91a-39: 'dod chags spyad pa zhig yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91a-41: des de la 'dod chags kyi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-2: gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-4: gal te de ma bsad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-5: bdag gi khyim thab la byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-6: de bdag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur du 'ong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-8: snyam nas des chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-10: gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-12: gal te de ma bsad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-13: bdag gi khyim thab la byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-14: de bdag cag la gnod pa byed par 'gyur du 'ong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-16: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-17: kho bo de mi gsod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-19: ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi chung po grogs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-20: btsun mo phreng ldan ma'i slob dpon yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-21: kho bos de bsad par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-22: kho bo rgyal pos rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste bsregs pas 'chi bar bya dgos pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-24: gal te khyod de gsod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-27: khyod phyin chad kho mo'i khyim du 'jug par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-28: 'dod pa bsten pa dag gis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-29: sdig pa'i chos mi bya ba ci yang med pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-30: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-31: gal te de gzhan gyi sems shes pa la mkhas pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-32: kho bos ji ltar gsad par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-34: thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:91b-35: zhes des dus ma yin par tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i gan du mngag pa btang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-2: khyod kyis bdag la gzigs par ci gnang zhes spring ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-4: ma bsam par shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-5: mthong ba mi 'jug pas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yang dus ma yin par zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-6: de la chos bstan par byas nas de phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-10: glo ba thag pa nas yud tsam zhig bzhugs su gsol zhes des tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ji srid kyis shin tu nam sros par gyur pa de srid du bzung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-11: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon yang ral gri shubs nas phyung ste sgo na sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phyir phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-13: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-14: 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-15: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i mgo drung pa nas bcad de sa la bsgyel to; ;de 'phags pa gsod cing 'dug pa bud med rgan mo zhig gis mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-17: gzu lums byed pa 'di su yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-18: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-19: su la yang ma zer cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-20: kho bos khyod kyang 'di'i gnas skabs lta bur byas par gyur ta re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-21: de skrag nas 'phral du smra ma phod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-22: bdag nyid chen po 'di'i rjes gcod pa 'ga' zhig phyis 'ong grang snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-23: de nyid na cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-24: snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92a-25: 'jig rten pha rol btang ba de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i lus de phyag dar gyi phung po zhig tu sbas te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-0: de'i nyin mo gso sbyong gi @92b zhal ta ba rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-1: 'ga' zhig gis btsun pa 'char ka'i 'dun pa blangs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-5: khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de bsad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-6: chos gos dag longs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-7: de'i lus la mchod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-9: ji tsam na mnyan yod kyi sgo chod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gser gyi 'od lta bu'i 'od gtong ba mdzad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-10: des mnyan yod thams cad gser gtso ma'i 'od lta bus snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-11: ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-12: ci'i phyir mnyan yod thams cad gser btso ma'i 'od lta bus snang bar gyur snyam nas des yang bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-13: bcom ldan 'das gshegs par bzhed gor ma chag snyam nas de btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mnyan yod kyi lde mig khyer te sgo phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-14: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-15: ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-16: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dus ma yin par mnyan yod du gshegs snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:92b-19: bzod par dka' ba yin pas des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma nus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-0: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mdun du gshegs nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi slad bzhin @93a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-1: slad bzhin du rjes su 'brang zhing song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-3: phyag dar gyi phung po'i phyogs der byon to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-6: khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-10: de na gang dag tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la brten nas 'phags pa'i bden pa dag mthong ba de dag gis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-11: 'di bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyid par ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-14: ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-15: 'di bdag gi chung po grogs lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyid par ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-18: btsun mo phreng ldan mas gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-19: 'di bdag gi slob dpon lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag 'di'i lus la mchod pa bgyid par ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-22: de nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka'i lus de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-23: sa dkar gyis dril phyi byed du bcug nas spos chus 'khrur bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93a-24: ras kha dog sna tshogs dag gi khyogs spyil brgyan nas der bcug ste bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa mdun du gshegs nas rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa de'i phyi bzhin du rjes su 'brang @93b zhing song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-1: sa phyogs go skabs yangs pa zhig tu bzhag nas btsun mo phreng ldan mas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-2: spos kyi shing thams cad kyis phung por bcer te bsregs nas phung po de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-3: 'o mas zhi bar byas te rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-10: phye ma dang; sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-11: rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad de gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-13: bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-16: gzhan dag kyang dge slong dus ma yin par grong du 'jug pa las gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-19: phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-20: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-21: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-22: yang dge slong gang dus ma yin par grong du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:93b-24: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-0: dge slong nad ngan can dag 'khod pa dag gis yun ring du 'jug par mi nus pa na dge slong @94a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-1: nad g-yog dag gis kyang nad pa dag gis bya ba nyams par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-2: dge slong zhal ta byed pa dag gis kyang dge 'dun gyi bya ba nyams par byed pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-3: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-6: dge slong 'dug pa la smras te 'gro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-8: zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong zhig gis khyim gzhan du lhung bzed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-9: chos gos bzhag nas ji tsam na der me shor nas dge slong des der 'gro bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-10: de lam gyi phyed du son pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-11: bdag gis dge slong 'dug pa la ma smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-12: snyam pa'i dran pa skyes nas de phyir log ste ji srid du dge slong 'dug pa la smra bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-13: chos gos tshig nas de der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-16: khyod ci'i slad du 'phyis te byon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-17: des na khyod kyi lhung bzed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-19: gal te khyod myur du byon par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-21: chos gos tshig par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-23: dge sbyong de yang phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-24: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-27: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94a-29: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-0: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs @94b ba'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-2: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-3: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-8: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-9: yang dge slong gang dus ma yin par grong du 'jug cing dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-10: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-11: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-13: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-14: dus ma yin par zhes bya ba ni; dus ma yin pa gnyis su ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-15: skya rengs ma shar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-17: grong du zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-20: sum mdo dag yod par ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-23: dge slong 'dug pa la mi smra na zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-24: de na dge slong gang 'dug pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-25: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-33: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-36: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-37: dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:94b-40: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-0: dge slong gis dus ma yin pa la dus ma @95a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-1: yin par 'du shes pas grong du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-3: dus ma yin pa la yid gnyis za bas grong du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-5: dus la dus ma yin par 'du shes pas grong du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-7: dus la yid gnyis za bas grong du 'jug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-11: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-12: btsun mo phreng ldan mas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-13: lhas dge slong rnams la ni gzhon nu'i yongs su spangs pa stsal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-14: dge slong ma rnams la ni btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongs su spangs pa rtsal cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-16: lha'i ni chung po grogs lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-17: bdag gi ni slob dpon lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-18: dge slong rab tu grags pa de lta bu yang btsan mthong du bkum na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-19: dge slong rab tu ma grags pa gzhan dag lha la bka' mchid kyang su rmed par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-20: lhas 'phags pa 'char ka de sus 'gum du stsal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-21: sus bkum pa bkas rma bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-22: ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zho shas 'tsho ba dag la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-24: dengs la 'phags pa 'char ka sus gsod du bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95a-25: sus bsad pa de dag rmos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-0: de dag rmed cing phyogs @95b der dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-1: de dag gis de na bud med rgan mo de mthong zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-2: des ni de dag ma mthong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-3: bud med rgan mo des byung rgyal du smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-4: phyogs 'dir khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog de sbas pa ni de dang de dag gis bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-5: de dag gis de thos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-9: de dag gis de bzung ste bsdigs nas de sus bsad smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-12: bram ze'i bu mo 'dis gsod du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-13: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'dis bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-14: de dag gis kyang bsdigs te; ci de gnyis kho nar zad dam zhes rmas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-16: gzhan yang g-yon can lnga brgya yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-17: rgyal po'i mi de dag gis bram ze'i bu mo de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-18: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-19: g-yon can lnga brgya po de dag bzung ste rgyal po la phul nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-21: 'phags pa 'char ka ni bram ze'i bu mo 'dis 'gum du stsal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-22: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'dis bkum mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-23: g-yon can lnga brgya po 'di dag gi dmag dpon ni 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-26: dengs la bram ze'i bu mo 'di ni rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la thogs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-27: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'di ni rgya skyegs kyi khang par chug la sregs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:95b-28: g-yon can lnga brgya po 'di dag ni lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-2: rte'u dmu rgod kyi rkang pa gnyis la btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-3: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-4: rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-6: g-yon can lnga brgya po de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-9: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-12: las de'i rnam par smin pas sdang ba ma mchis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-13: gnod pa ma bgyis bzhin du de gnyis kyis dgum par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-14: de gnyis kyang bkum par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-15: g-yon can lnga brgya po dag kyang lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-16: rkang pa dag bkum par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-19: de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-20: rkyen yongs su bsgyur pa; 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-21: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-22: de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-24: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-25: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-28: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-31: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96a-34: skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-0: @96b las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-1: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-2: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-6: 'das pa'i dus na w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid byed du bcug pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-7: nyam nga ba dang bcas pa'i dus byung ba na mu stegs can dag gis lo bcu gnyis su than pa 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-8: zhes lung bstan nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste gang la lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-10: gang la med pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-13: de'i mdun na 'don de bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug pa de la bram ze'i khye'u dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-15: bdag cag la lo bcu gnyis kyi 'tshal ma ma mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-19: kho bos khyod la mkho ba bstab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-20: rgyal po tshangs byin gyi rmi lam na bdag gi rgyu ma dag gis grong khyer thams cad dkris par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-21: mthong nas kyang de gzhi 'dis bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-23: gcig tu mi 'gyur grang snyam du 'jigs pa skyes par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-24: des rmi lam de mdun na 'don de la bzlas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-26: lhas rmi lam bzang ba zhig gzigs mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:96b-27: 'on kyang bram ze'i khye'u dag gi rnyed pa'i bar chad du gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-1: nas des rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-3: rmi lam ngan pa zhig gzigs pas gzhi 'dis lha rgyal srid las nyams pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-10: ba lang gi mchod sbyin stsal bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-13: des ba lang stong phrag du ma dag bsregs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-14: rgyal po phyir byung nas rgyal pos ba lang de dag mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-15: ba lang de dag ba lang gi 'bu sgra chen po byung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-16: rgyal pos de dag mthong zhing thos nas de snying rje skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-17: des mdun na 'don la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-18: 'di dag thams cad gsad par bya'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-21: 'di dag thams cad gsad par mi 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-25: de'i tshe rnga bran zhig rnga bran mo zhig la rgyab rgal byed nas mdun na 'don gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-28: rnga bran mo 'di gnyis dgum par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-29: bram ze'i khye'u de dag gis kyang lag pa brkyang ste 'di gnyis lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-31: de gnyis bshas pa na sems pa g-yos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-32: bdag cag gnyis sdang ba med pa dang; gnod pa ma byas bzhin du bsad pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97a-34: bram ze'i bu lnga brgya po 'di dag gi le lan yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-0: bdag cag gnyis gang du gang du skyes pa @97b na bdag cag gnyis kyis mdun na 'don 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-2: gnod pa ma byas bzhin du gsod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-3: bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang lag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-4: rkang pa dag gcod du 'jug par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-8: da ltar ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs byin gyi btsun mo gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-10: da ltar btsun mo phreng ldan ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na mdun na 'don gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-12: da ltar dge slong 'char ka yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-13: de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-14: da ltar g-yon can lnga brgya po 'di dag yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-15: de'i tshe de'i dus na rnga bran gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-16: da ltar chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-17: de'i tshe de'i dus na rnga bran mo gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-18: da ltar bram ze'i bu mo yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-20: bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya po dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-22: rnga bran mo de gnyis sdang ba med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-23: gnod pa ma byas bzhin du gsod du bcug pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-24: da ltar yang chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-25: bram ze'i bu mo 'di gnyis kyis 'char ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-26: g-yon can lnga brgya po dag sdang ba med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-27: gnod pa ma byas bzhin du gsod du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-29: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:97b-30: las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-1: spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-3: des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-5: des dgra bcom pa nyid thob kyang mtshon gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-8: rigs kyi bu 'char ka nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-10: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-11: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-12: 'char ka nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-14: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-15: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-18: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-20: las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-23: skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-24: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-25: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-26: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-30: 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-31: bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98a-32: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-0: @98b bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-1: ji tsam na ri brag cig na rngon pa zhig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-2: ri brag de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na ri dvags dang bya mang po dag gi rten du gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-3: mtshe'u zhig yod pa der rngon pa de nyi ma re re zhing ri dvags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-4: bya mang po dag drungs dbyung ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-5: nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-6: tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir rngon spyad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-8: rnyong mang po dag 'dzugs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-11: rnyong de dag kyang don yod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-12: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri brag der phyin nas lha'i gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-13: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ri brag der bsod snyoms la zhugs so; ;der bsod snyoms rgyus nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-14: lha'i gnas 'di nyin mo rgyun lugs mang ba yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-15: ri brag gi phyi rol gyi gnas zhi ba zhig tu bsod snyoms bza'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-17: de ri brag nas byung ste; 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:98b-21: zhes mtshe'u de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas lhung bzed dang chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal te tshu btsags nas lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-0: lag pa gnyis bsnyal nas kha bkrus te lhung bzed dang chu tshags gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te shing @99a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-1: drung zhig tu brten nas brang 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas te spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-2: de'i nyin mo mi'i dris ri dvags gcig kyang ma zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-3: de nas rngon pa de nang par sngar langs te mtshe'u de ga la ba der song nas des rngon spyad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-5: rnyong de dag byul bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-6: ri dvags gcig kyang ma mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-9: rnyong 'di dag don yod pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-10: gang gi phyir der ri dvags gcig kyang ma zin pa 'di'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-11: des mtshe'u de'i than kor byul bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-12: mi'i rjes mthong nas de rjes de'i phyi bzhin du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-13: rang sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi bas 'dug pa de mthong nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-14: rab tu byung ba sems zhi ba 'di dag gnas 'di lta bu dag tu mngon par dga' bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-15: gal te bdag gis 'di'i srog gcad par ma byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-16: 'di dag gis nges par bdag gi 'tsho ba gcod par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-17: rnam pa thams cad du 'di gsad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-18: snyam nas snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-19: 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-20: mda' dug can gyis gzhu rnga'i dbyibs 'dra bar rna drung du thug par bkang ste rang sangs rgyas de'i gnad du bsnun to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-21: rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99a-24: nyams par gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-0: da 'di @99b la lag nas drang ba sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-2: des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-5: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-7: rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-8: rngon pa de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du 'gyel nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-9: yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-11: nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-12: rang sangs rgyas de rngon pa de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-13: de nas rngon pa des zug rngu med par byas te rma lhan gyis glan nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-14: 'phags pa sdum par gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-15: gal te 'dir gser gyi lhan pas glan par mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-16: de yang bdag gis sbyar bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-17: rang sangs rgyas kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-18: bdag gi rnag gi lus 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa thob zin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-20: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-22: de rngon pa de nyid kyi mdun du yang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:99b-23: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag rnam par bstan nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-0: nor dang ldan pa yin pas des spos kyi shing thams cad kyis phung @100a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-1: por bcer te bsregs nas phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-2: rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-3: lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-11: sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-12: bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur par mchod par byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-15: longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skye bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-18: de la de'i tshe de'i dus na rngon pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-19: 'char ka 'di yin te; des rang sangs rgyas kyi gnad du mda' dug can gyi bsnun pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-20: bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gdungs nas las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mtshe'u 'gram de nyid du ri dvags su skyes shing mtshon gyis dus la bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-21: da ltar gyi bar du yang dgra bcom pa thob kyang de mtshon gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-22: mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100a-25: longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-0: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas @100b las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-1: las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di'i dus la bab pa'i lus phyag dar gyi phung por sbas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-2: 'dis ston pa mnyes par bgyis shing thugs byung bar ma bgyis pa dang /
