K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-3: 'di dus la bab pa'i lus la ston pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-4: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas lus kyi mchod pa bgyis pa de lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs thob par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-6: 'char ka nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-8: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-9: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-10: 'char ka nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-12: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-13: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin pa mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-19: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-22: skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-23: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-24: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-25: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-29: 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-30: rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-31: bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:100b-32: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-0: bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur @101a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-1: pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-2: gangs kyi sul zhig na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-3: de na rang sangs rgyas gcig cig na bar gyur nas gzhan dag gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-4: khyod bzhud la sman pa la smos te cho ga mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-5: de ri brag gzhan zhig tu song nas mtshan mo rdza mkhan gyi ra ba zhig tu gnas par khas blangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-6: de mtshan mo na bar gyur nas dus la bab bo; ;rdza mkhan des de mthong nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-8: rdza ma so btang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-9: ma btang ba dag gi nang du dus la bab pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-11: gtsang sbra 'dod pa yin pas gal te skye bo dag gis tshor bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-12: 'ga' yang snod nyo bar mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-14: des rang sangs rgyas de'i lus de phyag dar gyi phung po zhig tu sbas te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-15: rang sangs rgyas gzhan dag gis bsam pa; bdag cag gi tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod par de gar song snyam nas bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-16: ji tsam na yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong nas de dag gis de nyid nas spos kyi shing dag steng gi nam mkha' las khyer te 'ongs nas rdza mkhan gyi ra bar babs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-17: rdza mkhan gyis de dag mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-21: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la mchod pa byed du'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101a-23: 'dis kyang khyed kyi yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-0: @101b bdag gis 'di la bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-1: da bkur sti bgyi ba'i bar du yud tsam zhig ba zhes su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-2: de song ste rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-4: bdag gi ra bar rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs grub pa zhig dus la bab kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-5: lhas de la bkur sti mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-6: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa phyir byung nas des rang sangs rgyas kyi lus de spos kyi shing thams cad kyi phung por bcer te bsregs nas phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste gdugs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-13: sil snyan dag gis mchod par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-14: rdza mkhan des rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-15: bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur par mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-16: bdag 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-17: thugs byung bar byed par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-18: bdag dus la bab pa'i lus la yang ston pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-19: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa mchod pa mdzad par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:101b-22: de'i tshe de'i dus na rdza mkhan gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-2: 'dis de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas de dus la bab pa'i lus phyag dar gyi phung por sbas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-3: da ltar 'di dus la bab pa'i lus phyag dar gyi phung por sbas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-4: 'dis de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas kyi lus de la mchod pa byas te smon lam de skad btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-5: da ltar 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-6: thugs byung bar ma byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-7: 'di dus la bab pa'i lus la ston pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-8: rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas lus kyi mchod pa byas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-10: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-11: las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa dad par bgyid pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-13: smon lam gyi dbang gis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-14: gang du smon lam btab ce na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-16: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-18: 'jig rten mkhyen pa; skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102a-19: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-0: de w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags @102b na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-1: de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung nas dge slong gang gis de rab tu phyung ba'i dge slong de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-3: de na 'dis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-4: yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe smon lam 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-5: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang ma thob ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-6: bdag gis tshe ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye rgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-11: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-12: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:102b-13: zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-4: sh'akya'i rgyal po'i gtso bo des khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-6: smon lam de'i dbang gis de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas khyim pa dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-9: las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu nag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-10: gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-11: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-14: las gcig tu nag pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-16: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-18: khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-19: dus ma yin par 'gro ba'i ltung byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-24: zas bcas skya rengs da gdod dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-25: khab ral dang ni khri rkang dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-26: bdal dang 'ding dang g-yan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103a-27: ras chen bde gshegs chos gos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal @103b byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-1: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa de'i khyim du nye dga' dus dang dus su 'gro zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-2: des de skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-3: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-4: dus gzhan zhig na des de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po dag gi bsngags ba rgya cher brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-7: bdag gis kyang rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi cung zad bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-12: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-14: khyod kyis sems rgya chen po bskyed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-17: khyod kyis bdag gi ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas khyim bdag de la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-20: aa rog gya zhes byas te song nas de gtsug lag khang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-21: des khyim bdag de'i ming gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-22: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-23: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-24: khyim bdag de ma dad pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-25: khyod kyis ji ltar rjes su 'jug par byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:103b-28: nye dga' la de tsam yang mi gnas sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-0: rjes su 'jug par byas pa 'ba' zhig tu @104a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-3: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la yang bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-4: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-8: gang gi ngor dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs pa de dus sngar 'gro ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-9: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' dus der song nas des khyim bdag de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-11: kho bo khyim du 'gro ba'i khyim dag lta ba'i bar du khyod re zhig zhal zas sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-12: kho bos ma 'ongs kyi bar du yang khyod kyi re zhig brim par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-16: song la dge slong rnams la khyim bdag de rgyus mi shes pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-17: des spyan 'dren gtong bar mi byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-21: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-23: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-24: dge slong rnams chas te lhags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs te sgo drung na gzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104a-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-0: song la khyim bdag de la sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sgo drung na @104b gzhes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-1: ci bder gyis shig ces sgos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-2: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-4: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas nang du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-5: khyim bdag de la khyim bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-6: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sgo drung na gzhes kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-10: bdag gis khyed cag gi ci bde ci lags ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-11: mi 'tshal gyi; 'di ltar khyed cag kho na'i slad du gdan dag bshams kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-13: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-16: bdag gis khyed cag gi ci bde ci lags ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-18: 'di ltar khyed cag kho na'i slad du gdan bshams kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-21: gal te de skad zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-22: khyed cag kho na'i phyir stan dag bshams pas ci bde byas par brjod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-25: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-26: ji tsam na gdugs tshod la bab tu nye bas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-28: song la khyim bdag la gdugs tshod bab tu nye'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-30: zas 'dis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:104b-31: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-0: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas khyim @105a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-8: 'phags pa; de mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-9: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-11: khyim bdag de'i mchid nas nye dga' mchis sam zhes mchi nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-14: de'i mchid nas de mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis yud tsam zhig gzhes nas yang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-17: song la khyim bdag la gdugs tshod la bab kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-19: zas rul bar gyur pa 'dis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-20: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-22: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas khyim bdag la bsgo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-25: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-30: de mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-31: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105a-33: khyim bdag de'i mchid nas nye dga' mchis sam zhes mchi nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-0: de mchid @105b nas de mchi'i bar du yud tsam zhig gzhes su gsol zhes mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-3: song la khyim bdag la nye dga' 'ongs par ma gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-4: zan sbyin par mi byed dam zhes gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-5: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-7: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas khyim bdag la de skad smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-10: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-15: gzhan dbang thams cad sdug bsngal te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-16: bdag dbang thams cad bde ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-17: thun mong dag gis gnod byed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-19: ji tsam na gdugs tshod kyi mtha' la bab pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-20: nye dga' 'ongs nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-25: khyod kyi zhal nas kho bo ma 'ongs kyi bar du re zhig brim par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-28: nye dga' shags med nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-29: de nas khyim bdag des brim par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-30: ji tsam na gdugs tshod yol nas dge slong kha cig gis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-31: zan thob nas zan bcad pa byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:105b-33: zan ma thob pa kho nar zan bcad pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bshad pa mdzad de gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-0: nye dga' ngo tsha bar gyur pa'i @106a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-1: snying gis de nyid du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-2: de'i nyin mo gso sbyong gi zhal ta pa rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-3: dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo zhing smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-4: btsun pa nye dga' ma mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-5: 'ga' zhig gis de'i mdun pa blangs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-6: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-8: sus kyang de'i 'dun pa yang ma blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-9: dge slong gzhan dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-11: nye dgas bdag cag snga dro /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-12: zang zing gi phyed la mtho btsams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-14: chos kyi phyed la mtho 'tsham par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-15: dge slong don nyung ngu dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-16: ci'i phyir dge slong dag zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang phyi dro khyim dag tu rgyu bar byed ces smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-18: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-19: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-22: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-25: mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye dga' la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-28: khyod zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106a-29: phyi dro khyim bdag tu rgyu bar byed pa bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge @106b sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-1: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-3: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-4: rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-5: zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-9: phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-10: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-11: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-12: yang dge slong gang zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang phyi dro khyim dag tu rgyu na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-14: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-15: dge slong nad ngan can dag 'khod pa dag gis yun ring du 'dug mi nus nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-16: dge slong nad g-yog rnams kyis nad pa'i bya ba nyams par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-17: dge slong zhal ta byed pa dag gis kyang dge 'dun gyi bya ba nyams par byed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-18: khyim pa 'dug pa la bsgo par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim pa 'dug pa la bsgo bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-20: zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong zhig gis khyim gzhan du lhung bzed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-22: ji tsam na der me shor nas dge slong des der 'gro bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:106b-23: de lam gyi phyed du son pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-1: gi khyim pa 'dug pa lam bsgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-2: snyam pa'i dran pa skyes nas de phyir log ste ji srid du khyim pa 'dug pa la sgo bar byed pa de srid du de'i lhung bzed dang chos gos tshig nas de der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-5: khyod ci'i slad du 'phyis te byon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-8: gal te khyod myur du byon par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-10: chos gos tshig par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-12: dge slong de yang phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-13: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-16: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-18: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-19: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-21: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-28: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-30: zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro dang phyi dro khyim dag tu rgyu zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-31: khyim pa 'dug pa la mi sgo na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107a-32: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te ltung byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-0: @107b yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-1: sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-2: zas dang bcas pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-3: mgron du bos pa dang bcas pa'i'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-7: mgron du bos nas zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-9: snga dro zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-11: khyim gnyis las lhag par rgyu na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-12: phyi dro zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-14: khyim gsum las lhag par rgyu na'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-15: khyim dag tu zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-17: khyim bdag dag gi khyim dag tu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-18: rgyu zhing zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-20: khyim pa 'dug pa la mi sgo na zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-21: de na khyim pa gang 'dug pa la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-22: de 'dra ba'i rkyen ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-30: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-33: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-34: dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-37: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-38: dge slong ji tsam cung zad zas dang bcas pa'i khyim du mgron du bos nas snga dro khyim gnyis las lhag par rgyu zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-39: phyi dro yang khyim gsum las lhag par rgyu na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-40: thams cad ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:107b-41: de'i ngor mgron du bos pa ma yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-3: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-4: grong rgyu ba'i ltung byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-5: brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-6: sgo gtan gyi bslab pa'i gzhi'i bar sdom la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-7: dga' bo nye dga' zhag bdun dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-8: bzang sbyin sdum byed tshul khrims dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-9: nag po'i tshigs bcad 'char ka dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-10: bcu dang bslab bzhi'i rim pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-11: grong khyer gnyis dang g-yul gzhi dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-13: sngo sangs rgyal srid bog ka na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-14: ma la 'khar ba byin pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-15: lham gyi dbang phyug mnyan yod dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-16: sngon gyi tshul dang nor bzang dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-17: drang srong rnams dang gtsug lag khang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-18: mgu byed dang ni gzung byed dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-19: stong thub dang ni 'brog gnas dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-20: lag brgyud dang ni sngo bsangs can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-21: mi gdung rnams su skyes pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-22: dpa' chen dang ni sgur mchog dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-23: dpe med ma dang lcags mgar dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-24: singga la dang shar pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-25: snyan smra dang ni tshig pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-26: sgur dang thos pa 'dzin pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-27: dran me dang ni bram ze mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-28: mgu byed dpal ldan gyur pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-29: sh'a ri'i bu ni bzhugs pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-30: sgo gtan yang dag bsdus pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-31: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108a-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-6: bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di dag tu bsam gtan gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-8: bag yod par bsgrubs la phyis 'gyod par mi 'gyur bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-11: rjes su bstan pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong rnams dgon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-22: bas mtha'i gnas mal dag tu zhugs te; kha cig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-23: ri rab kyi bang rim na bsam gtan byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-25: gser gyi ri bdun po dag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-27: mtsho chen po ma dros pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-31: rnal 'byor pa'i skye bo dang rjes su mthun pa'i grong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-35: rgyal po'i pho brang gi phyogs de dang de dag na bsam gtan byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-36: ri'i rgyal po ri rab dpag tshad brgyad khri ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-40: de la dpag tshad 'bum drug khri yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-41: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos re re la dpag tshad brgyad khri brgyad khri yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-42: de dag la dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khri yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-43: ri'i rgyal po ri rab rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:108b-47: der klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-1: gnyis skyes nas de gnyis kyi lus kyis de lan gsum dkris te 'khod cing bskal par gnas pas sa 'dzin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-2: 'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab bzang gis dbyung par mi nus pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-3: de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-4: bdag cag gnyis kyi bsod nams kyis gnas 'di byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-5: snyam nas de gnyis ser snas kun nas dkris pas nyin mo lan gsum mi mthun pa'i rlung gtong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-6: des ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i ri dvags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-7: bya mang po dag tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-8: de na dge slong gang dag ri rab kyi bang rim na bsam gtan byed pa de dag kyang mi mthun pa'i rlung des skya bo seng seng por gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-12: lus ma thob par gyur nas de dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mnyan yod du lhags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-13: dge slong rnams kyis de dag mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-14: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-17: khyed cag dbyar gang du gnas par khas blangs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-20: bdag cag ri rab kyi bang rim nas 'dir 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-21: bdag cag ri rab kyi bang rim du dbyar gnas par khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109a-22: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-0: khyed cag ci'i phyir skya bo seng seng por @109b gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-7: ri rab kyi bang rim du klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-8: nye dga' gnyis skyes nas de gnyis kyi lus kyis de lan gsum dkris te 'khod cing bskal bar gnas pas sa 'dzin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-9: 'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab bzang gis dbyung bar mi nus pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-10: de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-11: bdag cag gnyis kyi bsod nams kyis gnas 'di byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-12: snyam nas de gnyis ser snas kun nas dkris pas nyin mo lan gsum mi mthun pa'i rlung gtong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-13: des ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i ri dvags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-14: bya mang po dag tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-15: bdag cag kyang mi mthun pa'i rlung des skya bo seng seng por gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-19: lus ma thob par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-20: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-22: khyed kyis de gnyis 'dul bar mi nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-25: re zhig de gnyis bdag cag gis gdul ba ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-27: nyan thos chen pos gdul ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-29: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:109b-31: de gnyis gang gis gdul ba yin snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-0: dge slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos gdul ba yin par gzigs shing mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal @110a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-3: ri rab kyi bang rim na klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-4: nye dga' bo gnyis la soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-5: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-7: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-8: ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-9: mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-10: ri rab kyi bang rim du son par gyur pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-11: de'i tshe na klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-12: nye dga' gnyis gnyis log par gyur nas des se gol gyis sad par bya bar brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-14: des de gnyis kyi steng du bcag par brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-15: de lta na yang de gnyis ma sad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-16: des de gnyis kyi ltor zhugs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-17: sprin chen po bzhin du 'brug bsgrag par brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-18: de lta na yang de gnyis ma sad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-19: des klu chen po'i lus kyis ri'i rgyal po ri rab la lan bdun dkris te steng du gdengs ka chen po byas te 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-20: de gnyis khur lci bas mnan pas sad de ji tsam na klu chen po zhig gis bdag cag gnyis mnan par mthong nas de gnyis kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-21: klu rdzu 'phrul chen po zhig byung ste bdag cag gnyis gnas 'di nas nyams par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110a-23: snyam du rig nas skrag ste bram ze'i khye'u'i kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas 'bros par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-0: de nas tshe dang @110b ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de phyir bsdus nas de gnyis kyi mdun du 'dug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-3: klu rdzu 'phrul chen po zhig byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-4: bdag cag gnyis gnas 'di nas nyams par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-9: de gnyis de dang lhan cig phyir log pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-10: ji tsam na mi snang nas de gnyis kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-11: 'phags pas bdag cag gnyis la ku re ma bgyis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-15: bdag cag gnyis kyis nongs pa ci bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-17: khyed gnyis kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya 'ongs pa la ma bsam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-19: khyod sangs rgyas kyi pho nya lags sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-20: sangs rgyas kyi pho nya yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-22: gal te khyod sangs rgyas kyi pho nya lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-23: bdag cag gnyis kyis ci bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga kho nar 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-30: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-31: nye dga' gnyis khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:110b-32: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi slad du bdag la bka' stsal pa'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-5: nye dga' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-7: khyed gnyis sngon gyi nyes par spyad pas klu'i skye gnas ngan par skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-8: khyed gnyis da ltar drag shul can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-9: lag pa khrag gis gos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-11: rab tu nyams pa la zhen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-13: gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-23: bdag cag gnyis kyis ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-25: klu'i dbang po gnyis tshur shog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-26: nga'i drung du skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-27: bslab pa'i gzhi dag longs la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-28: ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i ri dvags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-29: bya rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-32: bdag cag gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su mchi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-33: bslab pa'i gzhi dag len cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-34: ri rab kyi bang rim la gnas pa'i ri dvags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-35: bya rnams la mi 'jigs ba stsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111a-36: de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-0: bslab @111b pa'i gzhi dag blangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-1: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-3: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-4: nye dga' gnyis kyis las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-5: de'i rnam par smin pas klu'i nang du skyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-7: des rin po che sna bzhi las bgyis pa'i gnas mngon par grub cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-9: sbrang rtsi'i chang gi btung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-10: re re la yang 'khor nyis stong lnga brgya dang ldan par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-12: des na bskal par gnas pas sa 'dzin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-13: 'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab bzang gis dbyung bar rngo mi thogs par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-16: 'di gnyis kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-18: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-19: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-20: 'di gnyis kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-21: gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-23: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-24: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-27: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:111b-30: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-0: @112a *// skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-1: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-2: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-3: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-6: sngon byung ba bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di nyid la skye rgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-7: ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-8: bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-9: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-10: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-12: de dge slong nyi khris bskor cing grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-13: de'i tshe na grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na rgyal po kri kri zhes bya bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-17: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-25: bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-27: ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-29: chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112a-30: rgyal po kri kri de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-1: skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-2: lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung 'jig rten du byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-4: de dge slong nyi khris bskor cing grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na drang srong smra ba ri dvags kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs zhes thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-5: thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-6: rgyal po'i mthu chen pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-7: rgyal po kri kris yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-8: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku rnam par mdzes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-9: 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-10: nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-11: rin po che'i ri bo kun tu 'gro ba ltar bzang ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-12: mthong ma thag tu rgyal po kri kri /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-13: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung la shin tu dad pa skyes nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der song ste phyin nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-14: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rgyal po kri kri'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-17: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:112b-18: rgyal po kri kris stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-0: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste @113a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-1: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-2: des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-4: bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-7: lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-8: sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-10: bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-13: rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-17: rus pa'i ri dag las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-19: ngan song gi sgo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-29: mi rnams kyi nang du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-31: zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-33: khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-34: ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-35: mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-36: mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-37: shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-38: de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113a-39: go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-0: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol @113b brgal bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-1: 'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-2: skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-3: srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-4: thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-5: zhes smras te stan las langs nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la lan gsum bskor ba byas te zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-6: gang gi tshe rgyal po kri kris yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-7: de don gyi gnas su 'dug ste blon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-9: yul mi rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-13: ngas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar bden pa dag mthong bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-15: chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug mi nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-16: de'i phyir khyod kyis gzhon nu legs skyes rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag por zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-17: nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-18: de la blon po'i mchog dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-19: nye dga' zhes bya ba gnyis shig yod pa de gnyis kyis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-20: lhas mtshan ma tsam 'ba' zhig mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:113b-21: bdag cag gnyis kyis chos kyis lha'i rgyal srid bgyid du stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-3: de gnyis kyis ji srid pa de srid du chos kyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas yang chos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-4: chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du gzhug par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-5: de gnyis kyi nye du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba de dag de gnyis kyi gan du 'ongs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-7: chos kyis rgyal srid byed du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-9: chos ma yin pas byed du ma gzhug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-10: sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-11: de gnyis kyis de dag las thos nas ji srid pa de srid du chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug nas yang chos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-12: chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du gzhug par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-13: de dag yang de gnyis kyi gan du 'ong ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-15: chos kyis rgyal srid byed du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-17: chos ma yin pas byed du ma gzhug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-18: sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-21: bdag cag blon po dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-22: rgyal srid bgyid du stsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-23: gsang tshig mthun pas 'tsho ba lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-24: gcig tu chos kyi rgyal srid bgyid du stsol ba'i rngo mi thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-25: nges pa kho nar khyed par can ma lags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114a-28: yongs su bskyang bar bgyi 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-0: yo byad thams cad phun @114b sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du bcug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-3: gzhon nu'i yongs su spangs pa byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-4: dge slong ma rnams la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-5: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongs su spangs pa byin cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-6: des khyed gnyis la yun ring po'i don dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-13: zhes de gnyis kyis yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i gtsug lag khang byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-14: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-16: gzhon nu'i yongs su spangs pa byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-17: dge slong ma rnams la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-18: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongs su spangs pa byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-20: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po kri kri'i blon po'i mchog dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-21: nye dga' zhes bya ba de gnyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-22: da ltar klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:114b-28: rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i gnas mngon par grub cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-1: sbrang rtsi'i chang gi btung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-2: re re la yang 'khor nyis stong lnga brgya dang ldan par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-4: dge slong ma rnams la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi yongs su spangs pa byin pa gang yin pa des ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-6: 'dab chags kyi rgyal po 'dab bzang gis dbyung bar mi nus par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-9: las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-10: gcig tu nag pa yin la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-12: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-15: las gcig tu nag pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-17: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-19: khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-20: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-21: nye dga' gnyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-22: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-25: tshes bco lnga la ri rab kyi bang rim du 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115a-26: de gnyis gang gi tshe mtshan mo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa de'i tshe na ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115b-1: gang gi tshe nyin mo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa de'i tshe na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115b-2: khyim bdag gi cha lugs kyis bsnyen bkur byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115b-3: dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis nyin mo khyim bdag gi cha lugs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115b-4: ji tsam na ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang rgyal byed kyi tshal ga la ba der song ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115b-7: rgyal po de gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115b-8: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba na 'ga' zhig bdag la mngon du ldang bar mi 'gyur ba med grang snyam nas mi dag pa'i mtha' can gtong bar byed pa yin pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115b-11: bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyen bkur byed pa ltos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115b-12: mi dag pa'i mtha' can des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115b-14: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:115b-15: ji tsam na khyim bdag gnyis shig bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa mthong ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-0: khyim bdag gnyis shig bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen @116a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-2: de gnyis lha'i yul na gnas pa dag lags gor ma bkum mo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-5: de gnyis kyis bdag mthong na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-13: 'on te rgyal po la bsnyen bkur bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-17: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dam pa'i chos la gus par mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-18: dgra bcom pa dag kyang chos bla mar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-21: sangs rgyas gang dag ma byon dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-22: sangs rgyas mya ngan sel mdzad pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-23: da ltar mang po gang bzhugs dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-24: thams cad dam pa'i chos la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-25: gus par gnas gyur gnas 'gyur zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-26: de bzhin gus par gnas mdzad de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-27: de ni sangs rgyas chos nyid yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116a-28: de phyir bdag la legs 'dod cing //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-1: sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byed na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-2: 'di la dam chos gus par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-3: de gnyis kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la mngon du ldang ba ma byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-4: rgyal po khros te bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-5: khyim bdag 'di gnyis bdag gi yul na gnas pa dag yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-6: bdag la mngon du ldang ba mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-7: snyam nas de khros pas kun nas dkris bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di khro bas kun nas dkris so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-18: zhe sdang can dang 'khrugs pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-19: yang dag rdzogs sangs bstan pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-20: dam chos kun shes bya mi nus //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-23: kun nas mnar sems 'di spong ba //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-25: rgyal po rgya cher de gnyis la khros te bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-26: 'di gnyis la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos mnyan pa yang rgyun bkum mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:116b-27: snyam du rig nas sdod cig ces byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:117a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos @117a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:117a-3: nye dga' gnyis nyin mo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa de'i tshe na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119a-35: de gnyis 'khrugs par ma gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119a-37: de gnyis 'khrugs par ma gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119a-38: de gnyis kyi zho shas 'tsho ba dag 'khrugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119a-40: bdag gis de gnyis la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-4: ri rab kyi bang rim na mchis la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-7: bdag gis ji ltar de gnyis la bzod par gsol bar bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-12: tshes bco lnga la nga'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal du 'dir 'ong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-15: tshes bco lnga la 'dir shog cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-16: ngas khyod la de gnyis bstan par bya'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-17: khyod kyis bzod par gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-21: bdag gis de gnyis kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-24: khyod kyis de gnyis kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs par mi bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-26: mi ma rabs dag gis rkang pa la phyag 'tshal ba gang yin pa de ni; mi gtso bo dag gis lag pa nas bzung ba yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-27: khyod kyis lag pa g-yas pa rkyongs la klu'i dbang po gnyis bzod pa mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-28: ces bzod pa gsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-34: zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-35: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:119b-36: nye dga' gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim du 'ongs nas bdag nyid khyim bdag gi cha lugs su mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120a-1: la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120a-2: ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la brda mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120a-4: de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas lag pa g-yas pa brkyangs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120a-10: de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120a-11: nye dga' gnyis la bzod par gsol nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120a-12: bdag gis 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la mchod pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas bdag gi sdum par dgung bdun gyi bar du gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120a-14: de nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te song nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-0: ngas 'phags pa mo'u @120b 'gal gyi bu chen po mchod pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zhag bdun du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-1: khyed kyis grong khyer mdzes par gyis la gdugs tshod sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-7: sems bskyed pa tsam gyis thams cad 'grub pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-10: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal las mnyan nas rgyal byed kyi tshal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-11: mnyan yod kyi bar gyi lam ji srid pa dag mchog tu mdzes par byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-12: mnyan yod kyang rdo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-14: gyo mo med par rnam par gnas par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-15: tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-16: bdug spos dri zhim po'i snod nye bar bzhag ste dar gyi chun po'i tshogs dpyangs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-18: ba dan bsgrengs te me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing lha rnams kyi lha'i mdun sa chos bzang ltar nyams dga' bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-19: zhal zas kyang kha dog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-21: ro phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-22: skyu rum sna tshogs dang bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:120b-23: spyan gzigs sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa bshams nas 'byor pa de lta bu 'dis nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-0: des na mtshan mo'i 'khur ba tshod pa dag tu me shor nas des ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi glang po che yan lag mchog dang ldan pa mang po @121a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-2: de nas gdugs tshod zhag bdun thal nas ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis mnyan yod du dril sgrog par byed du bcug nas mnyan yod du sus kyang mtshan mo me sbar bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-3: gang me sbar bar byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-4: de karsha pa na drug cu'i chad pas gcad par bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-5: phyag sbal du bcug ste 'chi bar bya dgos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-7: de'i tshe mnyan yod na khyim bdag bzang sbyin zhes bya ba phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-10: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-11: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-12: rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-13: des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-15: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-16: de dus gzhan zhig na bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-17: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag bzang sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-18: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-19: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-20: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121a-21: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121b-0: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar @121b mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121b-1: de nas khyim bdag bzang sbyin stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121b-2: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag bzang sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121b-4: de nas khyim bdag bzang sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121b-5: de nas khyim bdag bzang sbyin gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121b-6: bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byas te nang par sngar langs nas gdan dag bshams te chu ra bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis gdugs tshod g-yar dgongs 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121b-9: lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:121b-10: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag bzang sbyin gyi khyim ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-0: de nas khyim bdag bzang sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas bza' @122a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-2: bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-4: rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-5: bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs nas bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod gsol cing phyag bcabs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-6: lhung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-10: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas 'di ltar /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-11: khyim bdag bzang sbyin chung ma dang bcas pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-12: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-13: des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-15: bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-18: lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-19: sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-21: bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-24: rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-26: mchi ma'i rgya mtsho dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-28: rus pa'i ri dag las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122a-30: ngan song gi sgo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-7: mi rnams kyi nang du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-9: zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-11: khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-12: ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-13: mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-14: mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-15: shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-16: de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-17: go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-18: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-19: 'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-20: skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-21: srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dkon pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-22: thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa mdzad nas gshegs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-24: khyim bdag bzang sbyin chung ma dang bcas pas gang gi nyin mo bden pa mthong bar byas pa de'i nyin mo de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-25: khyim bdag bzang sbyin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khyim gzhan du spyan drangs te bshos gsol nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag bzang sbyin chung ma dang bcas pa la gang thos nas de gnyis kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:122b-27: rdzu 'phrul yang mngon par bsgrubs par gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-0: gang gi nyin mo khyim bdag bzang sbyin chung ma dang bcas pas phyir mi 'ong @123a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-1: ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-2: rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs pa de'i nyin mo de'i chung ma la bu btsas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-7: mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-11: sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhig byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-12: de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-13: nye du dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-14: gang gi phyir khye'u 'di'i ming pha ma gnyis kyi nyi ma gang la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-15: rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs par gyur pa'i nyi ma de la btsas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-16: de'i phyir khye'u'i ming rdzu 'phrul len ces bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-17: zhes de'i ming rdzu 'phrul len ces bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-18: khye'u rdzu 'phrul len ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-19: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-20: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-21: rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-22: de ma ma brgyad po de dag gis 'o ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-27: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-29: rdzing na gnas pa bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123a-30: de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-3: gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs nas de yi ge'i mthar phyin cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-8: brtag pa brgyad po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-9: rin po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-13: glang po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-16: skyes pa brtag pa la mkhas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-17: de ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi drung du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-18: de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyis steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa nas de la me tog gi phreng ba 'phangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-23: ji tsam na gzhan dag gis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-26: lha'i btsun mo'i 'khor don du gnyer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-28: mi rtog par byed pas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-30: ngas khyim bdag gi bu gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul len yongs su btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-31: blon po rnams kyis de k'a ra b'i ra'i me tog gi phreng bas mgul pa bcings te gos sngon po gyon pa'i mi dag bkri nas grong khyer gyi dbus nas phyir phyung ste gsad sar phyin nas gsod du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-32: mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-33: yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i mi dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-34: rgyal po sdig pa can 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:123b-35: ma brtags par byed pa ngan pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-1: gi bu gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul len 'khon med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-5: de bzhin du btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-7: blon po rnams kyis kyang ngan pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-8: khyim bdag gi bu gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul len 'khon med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-14: khyim bdag bzang sbyin gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-15: bdag gis bdog cing bdag dbang ba su la yang yongs su ma btang ba gang yin pa de thams cad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-16: gzhon nu rdzu 'phrul len la ltos pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-18: sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas rgyal pos ma brtags pa lnga pa nyid du bsgrubs pas da su'i phyir bcang bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-22: sdug 'phongs pa dag la yongs su gtang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-23: snyam nas des karsha pa na gcig zong gi rgyur bzhag nas nor gyi rnam pa gzhan thams cad dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-26: sdug 'phongs pa dag la yongs su btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-27: des karsha pa na gcig po des zong nyos shing btsongs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:124a-28: des karsha pa na bzhi rnyed nas des karsha pa na gcig gis ni /
