K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:147b-29: yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:147b-30: bu rgyal tshab ma skyes dgra zhes bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:147b-31: blon po'i mchog ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar tshul zhes bya ba yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:147b-32: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po'i khab na tshong pa dag zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'phags nas de dag mthar gyis grong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:147b-35: rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu tshong 'dus dag la rnam par lta ba na grong khyer chen po sgra sgrog tu phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-0: ji tsam na rgyal po au tra @148a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-1: ya na blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te don gyi gnas na 'dug pa na tshong pa de dag skyes thogs te rgyal po au tra ya na'i gan du dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-2: rgyal po au tra ya nas de dag la 'ongs pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-3: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad de gnas ji lta ba bzhin du 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-4: rgyal po au tra ya nas de dag mthong nas blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-9: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba 'di lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-10: shing ljon pa rtag tu me tog dang 'bras bu 'chags pa 'di lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-11: lhas dus dang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-12: lo thog shin tu phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i rgyal po gzhan 'ga' zhig yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-13: tshong pa de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-16: shar gyi yul na grong khyer rgyal po'i khab ces bgyi ba de na rgyal po gzugs can snying po zhes bgyi bas rgyal srid 'byor pa rgyas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-19: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba bgyid du stsol ba de na yang shing ljon pa dag kyang rtag tu me tog dang 'bras bu 'chags shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-20: lhas kyang dus dang dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-21: lo thog shin tu phun sum tshogs pa lags so; ;rgyal po au tra ya na de la rjes su chags pa skyes nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-23: rgyal po de'i yul na ci zhig dkon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148a-24: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-0: rin po che'i mnga' bdag lags @148b la; rgyal po de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-1: gos kyi bdag po lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-2: de la rin po che dag dkon no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-6: rin po che rtog pa dag bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-7: ces rgyal pos rin po che dag brtags shing brtags shing sgrom bkang nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-8: tshong pa de dag gi lag tu skyes su bskur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-11: khyod bdag gis ma mthong ba'i grogs lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-12: gal te grong khyer sgra sgrog tu khyod la bgyi ba cung zad mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-13: bdag la 'phrin yig skur cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-16: de nas tshong pa de dag gis skyes dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-18: zong rin khyer te rgyal po'i khab tu 'phags nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-19: de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas rin po che'i sgrom dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-21: rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te sgrom dang 'phrin yig dag phul nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-23: grong khyer sgra sgrog na rgyal po au tra ya na zhes bgyi ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-26: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'phrin yig bklags te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-28: rgyal po de'i yul na ci zhig dkon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-29: blon po rnams kyis smras pa; lha /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:148b-32: rin po che'i bdag po lags pas de la gos dag dkon no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-0: de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gos rin po che dag gis @149a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-1: sgrom bkang ste skyes su bkur zhing 'phrin yig kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-3: khyod kyis 'phrin springs pa des 'jal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-4: khyod kyang bdag gis ma mthong ba'i grogs lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-5: rgyal po'i khab tu khyod la yang bgyi ba cung zad mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-6: bdag la 'phrin yig springs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-9: blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-12: pho nya dag la skur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-13: blon po rnams kyis pho nya dag la bskur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-15: 'phrin yig de khyer te sgra sgrog tu 'phags nas mthar gyis sgra sgrog tu phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-16: de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos te gos kyi sgrom dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-17: 'phrin yig de dag khyer nas rgyal po au tra ya na'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas sgrom dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-18: 'phrin yig dag phul te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-20: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos lha la skyes 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-22: rgyal po au tra ya nas 'phrin yig bklags te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-27: lha'i ci 'dra ba kho na lta bu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-28: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-30: de lta bu lags mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-31: 'on kyang rgyal po de rang gis mtshon 'debs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149a-32: nye 'khor gyi mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams dang lhan cig rang gis g-yul 'gyed cing g-yul 'gyed du stsol ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-0: rgyal po au tra ya na la nor bu'i @149b khrab yan lag lnga po dus tshigs su reg pa bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-4: snang ba'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa zhig yod nas rgyal po au tra ya nas blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-6: rgyal po de gal te rang gis mtshon 'debs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-7: nye 'khor gyi mkhar gyi rgyal po rnams dang lhan cig g-yul 'gyed cing g-yul 'gyed du 'jug pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-8: de la nor bu'i khrab 'di bskur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-9: pho nya dag sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-10: de dag gis pho nya dag sta gon byas nas rgyal po au tra ya nas rin po che'i khrab de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-13: khyod la bdag gis nor bu'i khrab 'di skyes su bskur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-14: 'di yang yon tan lnga po dus tshigs su reg pa bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-18: snang ba'i bdag nyid dang ldan pa lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-19: khyod 'di bdag dang rkyen pas rang nyid kyis bcang bar bgyi zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-20: su la yang stsal bar mi bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-22: pho nya rnams kyis skyes de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-23: 'phrin yig khyer te rgyal po'i khab tu 'phags nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-24: de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas nor bu'i khrab de dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:149b-25: 'phrin yig khyer te rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du dong nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te nor bu'i khrab dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-0: rgyal po au tra ya nas lha la skyes @150a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-3: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'phrin yig bklags te nor bu'i khrab de mthong nas mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-4: blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-6: rin po che rtog pa dag bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-7: de dag gis rin po che rtog pa dag bos nas rgyal pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-9: rin po che 'di'i rin thang chod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-10: rin po che rtog pa dag gis nor bu'i khrab dang ldan pa'i rin po che re re nas brtag par brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-11: rin po che re re yang rin thang med par mthong nas de dag rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-13: 'di la nor bu rin po che re rer yang rin thang ma mchis pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-15: rin po che gang gis rin thang gdab par mi nus pa de'i rin thang bye bar 'debs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-16: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos rin po che dag bgrang nas bdag gis de la skyes lan ci zhig bskur bar bya snyam du nyam nga bar gyur nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug nas blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-18: rgyal po au tra ya nas nga la skyes 'di lta bu bskur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-19: ngas de la skyes lan ci zhig bskur bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-20: ma ga dha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar tshul gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-22: khyod kyi yul du yang 'jig rten gsum las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i rin po che byung ba 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-0: khyod kyis kyang ras la sangs rgyas @150b kyi sku gzugs 'brir stsol la skyes lan du bskur bar gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-4: zhes de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-5: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-7: grong khyer sgra sgrog na rgyal po au tra ya na zhes bgyi ba bdag gi mthong ba'i grogs shig mchis pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-8: bdag la nor bu'i khrab yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhig skyes su bskur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-9: de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-10: bdag gis kyang ras la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs 'brir stsal te de la skyes lan du bskur bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-12: rgyal po chen po gnang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-14: khyod kyis sems bskyed pa bzang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-15: rgyal po au tra ya nas mthong ma thag kho nar dad pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-16: bden pa mthong bar byed par 'gyur ro; ;rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-17: des yul thams cad na gnas pa'i ri mo mkhan dag bkug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:150b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ras la bris shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-0: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma gzung ba @151a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-2: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-3: blta bas chog mi shes pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-4: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma gzung bar ma nus nas de dag yi chad de rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-6: bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma gzung bar rngo ma thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-7: gal te lhas bcom ldan 'das pho brang gzhan du spyan drangs te gdugs tshod gsol na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-8: de lta na bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma gzung bar rngo thogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-9: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das pho brang gzhan du spyan drangs kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-10: blta bas chog mi shes pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-12: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mthong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-13: de dang de la blta bas ngoms par gyur nas de lta na yang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma gzung bar ma nus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-15: ri mo mkhan rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma gzung bar mi nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-16: yi chad par ma byed par ras de 'on cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-17: ngas grib ma gtang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-18: rgyal pos ras phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis der grib ma btang ste ri mo mkhan rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-21: grib ma 'dir tshon sna tshogs kyis khongs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151a-22: rgyal po la yang bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-0: sku gzugs byas zin nas 'og @151b tu skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-2: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-3: lugs las ldog pa dag bri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-4: steng du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-5: brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-6: sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-7: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-8: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-9: gang zhig rab tu bag yod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-11: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-12: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-13: zhes bya ba dag bri bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-14: pho nya dag la 'phrin du phyogs go skabs yangs par bkur sti chen pos sku gzugs dbye bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-15: gal te 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-17: 'jig rten gsum las ches khyad par 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-19: gal te 'og tu bris pa 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-26: ldog pa zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-27: gal te steng du bris pa 'di ci yin zhes 'dri na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-29: mngon par spro bar bya ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-32: rgyal pos thams cad bris shing 'brir bcu ga nas dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos te legs par dril nas gser gyi dong bur bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-33: gser gyi dong bu yang dngul gyi dong bu bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:151b-34: dngul gyi dong bu yang zangs kyi dong bur bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-0: zangs kyi dong bu yang dri sna tshogs kyis bsgos @152a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-1: pa'i gos dag gis dkris te glang po che'i rgyab tu bkal nas grong khyer mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-2: lam mdzes pa chen pos grong khyer nas phyung ste rgyal po au tra ya na la 'phrin yig 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-4: khyod la bdag gis 'jig rten gsum las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i skyes 'di bskur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-5: khyed kyis 'di dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du grong khyer mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-7: bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-8: sa phyogs go skabs yangs par mchod pa dang bkur sti chen po byas te dbye bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-9: de nas khyod kyis bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-11: pho nya rnams la yang khyod kyis 'di dang 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-12: zhes bsgos nas de dag gis sku gzugs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-13: 'phrin yig de khyer te sgra sgrog tu 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-14: de dag mthar gyis sgra sgrog gi 'dabs su phyin nas de dag gis lam gar bsdad de rgyal po au tra ya na la 'phrin yig bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-15: rgyal po au tra ya nas 'phrin yig bklags nas khro bas kun nas dkris par gyur te blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-17: des nga la 'phrin yig 'di skad spring ba la nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-18: des nga la skyes ji lta bu zhig bskur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-19: de'i phyir ngas dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du grong khyer mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152a-21: bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-1: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa sta gon gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-2: nga song la de'i yul 'khor gzhom par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-3: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-5: rgyal po de ni bdag nyid chen po zhig lags zhes gda' bas; des lha'i zhal sngar skyes ngan ngon zhig bskur bar rngo mi thogs pas je brtag par bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-6: gal te lha'i thugs mnyes na de lta na lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-7: gal te ma mnyes na bdag cag gis de la dus 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-8: de dag gis dpag tshad phyed dang gsum tshun chad du lam mdzes par byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-9: grong khyer sgra sgrog kyang rdo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-11: gyo mo med par rnam par bzhag nas tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab cing bdug spos kyi dri zhim po'i snod dag dngar te dar gyi chun po'i phreng ba dpyangs shing gdugs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-12: rgyal mtshan bsgrengs te me tog sna tshogs bkram zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-13: lha'i skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal zhes bya ba ltar dga' bar 'gyur bar byas nas rgyal po bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu nas grong khyer gyi nang du 'jug tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-14: de nas srog chags bye ba 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang der 'dus par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-15: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du yang lha 'bum phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyur nas sa phyogs go skabs yangs par de dag gi nang du mchod pa chen po byas te sku gzugs de phye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:152b-16: yul dbus nas tshong pa mang po zong thogs te grong khyer sgra sgrog tu lhags pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs de mthong nas sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-1: cad kyis skad gcig tu sgra byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-2: rgyal po au tra ya nas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas spu'i khung bu thams cad zing zhes byed par gyur nas ya mtshan skyes te yun ring mo zhig tu mig tshugs su brtags nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-4: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-8: yul dbus na gangs kyi ri ngos dang nye ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-9: chu klung skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-10: drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang mi ring bar sh'akya rnams kyi gzhon nu byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-11: de bram ze ltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-13: gal te gzhon nu de pho brang gi nang na bzhugs par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-14: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rgyal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-17: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-18: de'i rin po che sna bdun po de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-22: glang po rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-24: nor bu rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-25: bud med rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-26: khyim bdag rin po che dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-27: dmag dpon rin po che nyid ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-31: yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-32: pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong tshang pa yod par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153a-33: de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par bsdo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-0: chos dang mthun zhing snyoms pas legs @153b par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-1: gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig ngag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du rnam par grags pa'i sgra dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-7: rgyal po rgya cher yid dga' nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-17: bslab pa'i gzhi dag lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-24: steng du bris pa 'di ci yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-27: mngon par spro ba bgyi ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-28: rgyal po au tra ya nas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-29: lugs las ldog pa yang bzlas nas legs par bzung bar byas te des mtshan mo nam ma nangs pa'i tshe don thams cad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-30: las kyi mtha' thams cad bag yangs su byas te 'dug nas skyil mo krung bcas te lus drang por bsrang nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-31: lugs las ldog pa las rnam par lta bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-34: 'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:153b-36: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-1: rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-2: rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-3: ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-4: skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-5: reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-6: tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-7: sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-8: len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-9: srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-10: skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-17: sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-20: 'di ma skyes pa'i phyir 'di mi skye ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-22: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-23: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-24: rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-25: ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-26: skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-32: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154a-38: de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-0: zhes @154b rnam par ltar bar byed de des rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-1: lugs las ldog pa la rnam par lta ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-2: 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-3: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-4: des bden pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-5: ring na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-6: shes rab mig ni rnam par sbyangs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-7: gang la de 'dra'i gso mnga' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-8: sman pa'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-9: des shes nas dad pa dang ldan pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'phrin yig 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-11: khyod la brten nas bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-16: mi rnams kyi nang du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-23: rus pa'i ri dag las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-25: ngan song gi sgo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-30: thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-31: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-33: bdag dge slong mthong bar 'dod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-34: khyod kyis dge slong 'ga' zhig gtang ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:154b-36: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'phrin yig de bklags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-0: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis @155a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-1: la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-2: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-4: rgyal po au tra ya nas bden pa dag mthong nas des bdag la 'phrin yig bskur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-6: dge slong 'ga' zhig gtang ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-8: de'i slad du 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-10: rgyal po au tra ya na 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-11: grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dge slong gang gi gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-12: dge slong k'a ty'a ya na chen po'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a na chen po la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-14: grong khyer sgra sgrog na rgyal po au tra ya na 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-15: sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la sems shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-16: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-18: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155a-19: de nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-0: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod @155b snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-1: rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms rgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-2: phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-3: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas 'khor lnga brgya dang grong khyer sgra sgrog ga la ba der dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-4: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos kyang rgyal po au tra ya nas 'phrin yig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-6: khyod kyi phyir bdag gi dge slong ston pa dang 'dra ba 'di 'khor lnga brgya dang btang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-7: khyod kyis dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du lam mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-8: grong khyer mdzes pa bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-9: bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-10: grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu gtsug lag khang lnga brgya byed du gzhug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-16: gor bu lnga brgya yang sbyin par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-17: bsod snyoms lnga brgya yang sbyor du gzhug bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-18: des na khyod kyis bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-20: rgyal po au tra ya nas 'phrin yig bklags nas dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-21: mchog tu dga' ba skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-22: des dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du lam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-23: grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug nas bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-24: skye bo 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas bsu nas bkur sti chen pos grong khyer sgra sgrog tu 'jug tu bcug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:155b-25: grong khyer gyi phyi rol du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya yang byed du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-5: gor bu lnga brgya yang 'bul du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-6: bsod snyoms lnga brgya yang sbyor du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-7: sa phyogs go skabs yangs par stan shom du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-8: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du stan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-9: srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-12: sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul ba na der 'dus par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos 'khor de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-16: rang bzhin khong du chud nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis gang thos nas khyad par chen po rtogs par gyur pa de lta bu'i chos bstan par byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-18: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-20: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-22: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-24: rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-26: nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-28: rang byang chub tu sems bskyed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-30: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-32: sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156a-34: dge 'dun la bab par bkod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-0: skar rgyal zhes bya ba @156b gnyis shig 'khod pa de gnyis che dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-1: mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas khyim bdag rgyal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-2: skar rgyal gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-3: 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-4: bdag cag gnyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-5: rdzogs par bsnyen pa'i dge slong gi dngos po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-6: bdag cag gnyis kyis 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po'i drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa thob bam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-7: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos de gnyis rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-8: rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te gdams ngag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-9: rjes su bstan pa byin nas de gnyis kyis spro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-11: brtsal pa byas pas gong nas gong du yid la byed pa'i khyad par thob nas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g-yo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-12: mi g-yo ba de nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-15: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-16: tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:156b-17: tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-2: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-3: dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-4: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-5: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-6: tsan dan bzhag pa lta bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-7: rig pas sgo nga'i spubs dral bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-10: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-12: 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-14: nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-16: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-20: klog 'byin pa'i tsha 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-21: de gnyis kyi nye du dag gis lus la lus kyi mchod pa byas nas mchod rten gnyis byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-26: rgyal po au tra ya na nyin re nyin re zhing tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po'i drung du song nas chos mnyan te btsun mo'i 'khor la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-27: 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos mngar ba dang mngar ba ston par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-28: sbrang bu sbrang rtsi 'byin pa bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-33: 'bras bu dang bcas pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157a-35: gang gi slad du khyod chos gsan pas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-0: khyed cag @157b kyang ci'i phyir chos mi nyan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-3: ngo tsha dang ldan pa lags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-4: ji ltar der mchis te chos mnyan par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-5: gal te 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po 'di nyid du mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-8: bdag cag kyang chos nyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-9: rgyal po au tra ya nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-11: btsun mo'i 'khor chos nyan par 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-15: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs shing chos mi ston to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'jug pa bkag go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-18: 'o na su zhig btsun mo'i 'khor la chos ston par bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-21: rgyal po au tra ya nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la phrin yig 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-23: bdag gi btsun mo'i 'khor chos nyan par 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-24: de'i slad du dge slong ma 'ga' zhig gtang ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-26: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos phrin yig de bklags nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-27: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-29: rgyal po au tra ya nas phrin yig spring ste btsun mo'i 'khor chos nyan par 'tshal gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-30: de'i slad du dge slong ma 'ga' zhig gtang ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:157b-32: de'i slad du 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-2: rgyal po au tra ya na'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-3: grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i bud med rnams dge slong ma gang gi gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-4: dge slong ma ri ma'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma ri ma la bka' stsal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-7: grong khyer sgra sgrog na rgyal po au tra ya na'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-8: sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i bud med rnams la soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-11: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-12: de nas dge slong ma ri ma de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-13: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-14: rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms rgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas 'khor lnga brgya dang grong khyer sgra sgrog ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-15: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos kyang rgyal po au tra ya na la 'phrin yig 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158a-17: khyod kyi phyir bdag gis nyan thos ma chen mo ston pas bsngags pa 'di 'khor lnga brgya dang btang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-0: khyod @158b kyis kyang dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du lam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-1: grong khyer mdzes par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-2: bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pas bsu bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-3: grong khyer gyi nang du dbyar khang lnga brgya yang byed du gzhug par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-9: gor bu lnga brgya yang dbul bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-10: bsod snyoms lnga brgya yang sbyor du gzhug par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-11: des na khyod kyis bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-13: rgyal po au tra ya nas 'phrin yig de bklags nas dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-14: mchog tu dga' ba skyes te des dpag tshad phyed dang gsum du lam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-15: grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug nas bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-16: skye bo 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor dang bcas pas bsus nas bkur sti chen pos grong khyer du 'jug tu bcug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-17: grong khyer gyi nang du dbyar khang lnga brgya byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-23: gor bu lnga brgya yang 'bul du bcug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-24: bsod snyoms lnga brgya yang sbyor du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-25: dge slong ma ri ma nyin re zhing rgyal po au tra ya na'i btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-26: grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i bud med rnams kyi nang du zhugs te chos ston par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-27: rgyal po au tra ya na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-28: pi wang mkhas pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:158b-31: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po au tra ya nas pi wang sbrengs te btsun mo zla 'od gar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-1: gar byed pa na chud za ba'i mtshan ma mthong nas des de la mgo mjug tu brtags te bsam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-2: zhag bdun 'das na 'di dus byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-3: snyam nas de'i lag nas pi wang shor te sa la lhung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-4: btsun mo zla 'od kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-6: bdag gi gar ma legs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-9: khyod kyis gar ma legs pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-11: ngas khyod gar byed pa na chud za ba'i mtshan ma mthong bas nyi ma bdun pa la khyod dus byed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-12: btsun mo zla 'od kyis rgyal po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-15: bdag gis lha la bsnyen bkur ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-23: gal te khyod rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-24: de khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-25: gal te kun tu sbyor ba lhag ma dang bcas pas dus byas te lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-26: khyod lhar gyur pas nga la blta bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-30: rgyal po au tra ya nas btsun mo zla 'od dge slong ma rim la gtad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-32: btsun mo zla 'od legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-33: rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po 'tshal gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159a-34: de'i slad du 'phags mas 'di rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-0: rdzogs @159b par bsnyen par mdzad pa'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-1: dge slong ma ri mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-3: zhes des rab tu phyung zhing rdzogs par bsnyen par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-4: dge slong ma ri mas bsam pas de la 'chi ba'i 'du shes sgoms shig ces gdams ngag byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-5: btsun mo zla 'od kyis 'chi ba'i 'du shes sgom par brtsams nas de nyi ma bdun pa la dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-7: lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-8: skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-12: lha'i bu mo zla 'od kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-13: bdag gang nas shi 'phos snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-14: mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-16: rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-17: las gang gis snyam snyam na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa nyid kyis skyes par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-19: de nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-20: gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-21: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-22: bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-23: bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-24: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-26: de nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od rna cha gdub kor g-yo zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-27: dri ma med pa thogs te do shal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:159b-28: se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-1: padma dkar po dag gis thu ba bkang ste kha dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-4: lha'i bu mo zla 'od kyi kha dog gi mthus 'od ma'i tshal ka landa ka'i gnas thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu mo zla 'od kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-7: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-8: gang thos na lha'i bu mo zla 'od kyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-9: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-10: des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-12: bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-15: lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-16: sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-18: bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-21: rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-25: rus pa'i ri dag las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160a-27: ngan song gi sgo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-0: mtho @160b ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-7: mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-8: zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-10: khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-11: ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-12: mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-13: mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-14: shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-15: de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-16: go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-17: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-18: 'gro bar lha mi na mi dang lhas mchod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-19: skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral pa po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-20: srid ba stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-21: thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-22: de nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'chang bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-23: zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-24: dgra thul g-yas nas yongs su bskor byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-25: lha yi 'jig mngon phyogs mkha' la song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-26: de nas lha'i bu mo zla 'od tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-27: zhing ba lo thog 'byor ba lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-28: dpa' bo g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-29: nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bur gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-30: cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:160b-32: bdag gis rgyal po au tra ya na la khas blangs pas da de lta ba'i dus yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-2: rgyal po au tra ya na ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-3: de'i tshe na rgyal po au tra ya na gcig pu steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na nyal zhing 'dug nas des de snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par byas te se gol gyi sgras bslang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-4: de gnyid kyis non pa'i mig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-5: rnam par shes pa mi gsal bas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-14: bdag shi zhing dus la bab nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-15: gal te bdag dang lhan cig mjal bzhed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rab tu byung zhig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-17: gal te tshe 'di nyid la nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-18: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du mdzad na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-19: de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtha' lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-20: gal te kun tu sbyor ba lhag ma dang bcas pas dus bgyis te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes par gyur na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-21: der khyod bdag dang mjal bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-23: de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-26: rgyal po au tra ya nas mtshan thog thag tu rab tu 'byung ba rjes su bsam nas nang par langs te blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161a-33: rgyal po au tra ya nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-0: gang gi phyir bdag @161b la lha mos bskul nas bdag khyim pa khyim gyi nang na gnas shing gsog 'jog gi longs spyod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-1: 'dod pa la yongs su spyod pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-2: bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-3: bdag gis gzhon nu gtsug phud can rgyal srid la dbang bskur te bdag skra dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-4: kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig dag bgos te yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-6: des blon po'i mchog he ru dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-7: bhi ru ka gnyis mngag pas bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-9: bu gzhon nu gtsug phud can nga la ci 'dra ba de kho na bzhin du khyed gnyis la yang de 'dra ba yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-10: khyed gnyis kyis de gnod pa las bzlog par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-11: phan pa la nges par sbyar bar gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-13: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-14: de gnyis kyis thos nas mchi mas brnangs te 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-15: rgyal pos gzhon nu gtsug phud can la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-17: khyod ji ltar nga'i tshig mnyan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-18: bya bar sems pa de bzhin du khyod kyis blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-19: bhi ru ka 'di gnyis kyi tshig mnyan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-20: bya bar soms shig nga ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-21: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-22: des kyang thos nas mchi mas brnangs te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-23: de nas rgyal po au tra ya na grong khyer sgra sgrog tu dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-24: grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-25: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:161b-26: yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-0: kha spu bregs te gos ngur @162a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-1: smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-2: ngas rgyal srid byed du bcug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-3: gang la gnod pa cung zad ci byas pa de bzod par gyis shig ces bsgo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-4: grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-5: pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-6: yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams rgyal po la rjes su chags pa yin pas de dag gis thos nas thams cad mchi mas brnangs te 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-7: de nas rgyal po au tra ya nas gzhon nu gtsug phud can rgyal srid la bzhag nas rtsa lag gi skye bo rnams la bzod par gsol te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-11: sdug phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa dag byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-12: bsod nams dag byas te mi bsnyen bkur ba gcig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-13: rgyal po'i khab logs su phyogs der 'phags so; ;de nas rgyal po gtsug phud can btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-16: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-17: gzhan yang yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du 'brangs te srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bskyal bzhin du grong khyer sgra sgrog nas phyir byung ste skyed mos tshal shing ljon pa'i tshal sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162a-20: chu rgyun sna tshogs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-0: shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa zhig tu yud tsam @162b zhig bsdad nas grong khyer sgra sgrog logs su rnam par bltas te rgyal po gtsug phud can la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-2: ngas chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-3: de'i phyir srog chags 'bum phrag 'di snyed nga'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-4: khyod kyis kyang chos kyi rgyal srid byed du gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-5: skye bo'i tshogs de la yang bag phab ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-7: ngas khyed kyi rgyal por 'di bskos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-8: phyir dengs la bde bar sgrubs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-10: rgyal po gtsug phud can btsun mo'i 'khor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-13: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-14: gzhan yang yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams mchi mas dkrugs pa'i mig gis yud tsam yud tsam phyi bzhin rtog cing grong khyer sgra sgrog tu phyir log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-15: de nas rgyal po au tra ya nas mthar gyis grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas des skyed mos tshal du bsdad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-18: rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du song la rgyal po au tra ya na skyed mos tshal na sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-20: mi de song ste rgyal po gzugs can snying po la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-22: rgyal po au tra ya na skyed mos tshal na sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-24: des thos nas 'phral kho na la langs te zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-25: shes ldan dag rgyal po de dpung chen po ngang ldan pa yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-26: des ma sbran pa kho nar 'ongs pa khyed cag sus kyang ma shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-29: de la dpung ga la mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:162b-30: dpon g-yog gnyis po zhig mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-1: po gzugs can snying pos bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-2: gang gi phyir bdag gi rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba bgyi na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-3: de bzhin du grong khyer du 'jug tu gzhag pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-4: bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-5: bdag gis bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-6: snyam du rig nas lam mdzes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-7: grong khyer mdzes par byed du bcug nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pas bsu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-8: de nas gnya' ba sprad de glang po che'i rgyab tu zhon nas grong khyer rgyal po'i khab tu 'jug tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-9: spos sna tshogs dang sbyar ba'i chus khrus byed du bcug nas rgyal po la 'os pa'i gos dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-11: phreng ba rgyu dang byug pa sna tshogs dag gis legs par brgyan nas zan byin te lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-12: shed mthun dgyes pas rgyal srid rgyas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-16: pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams spangs te 'dir ci la byon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-17: sa gzhan gyi rgyal po 'ga' zhig gis yul 'khor gzhom par bgyis pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-18: gzhon nu rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-19: blon po skyon chags pas bslus pa 'ga' zhig gis bslus pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-24: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-25: rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163a-26: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos thos nas yid dga' zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-0: dga' @163b ste ro stod bsrang nas lag pa g-yas pa brkyangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-4: kye ma chos kyi legs par gsungs pa nyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-6: skyes bu gtso bo 'di lta bu dag gis rgyal srid rgyas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-9: rtsa lag gi tshogs rgya chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-12: khyim rgya chen po dag spangs te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-13: rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod pa ngo mtshar che'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-14: zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa smras nas rgyal po au tra ya na khrid de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-15: de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du ma'i gong na bzhugs shing chos ston par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-17: gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-20: rgyal po gzugs can snying po yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-21: de skyes dang bcas pas nga'i gan du 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-24: gdul ba'i skyes lta bu gzhan med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-25: zhes bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-26: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:163b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-0: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po gzugs can snying @164a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-3: rgyal po au tra ya na 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-4: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-5: rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di rab tu 'byung du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-7: rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong tshur shog ces pas rab tu phyung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-10: tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-11: de bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i mjug kho nar skra byi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-12: snam sbyar gyon par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-14: kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-16: bya ma bum gyis 'brel ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-17: dge slong rdzogs par bsnyen nas lo brgya lon pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-18: yang smras pa de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-19: skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-20: mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-21: sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-22: de nas tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya na snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-24: chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-25: de skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis mthong nas grong khyer rgyal po'i khab thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po au tra ya na rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164a-26: rdzogs par bsnyen par mdzad nas de bsod snyoms la rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-0: @164b zhes de lta bu'i sgra sgrog par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-1: de skad thos nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-2: khyim gyi nang na gnas pa'i bud med dag kyang skar khung dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-3: skar khung dra ba can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-4: lan kan dag gi drung du 'khod de lta bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-5: rgyal po gzugs can snying po la blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-7: rgyal po au tra ya na rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs te srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis bskor cing mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-8: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de thos nas dge slong au tra ya na ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-9: dge slong au tra ya na la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-10: mi dbang grong khyer stong dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-11: sgra sgrog kyang ni spyad byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-12: bor ba'i bsod snyoms tshol byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-13: ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-14: gser dang de bzhin dngul gyi snod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-15: srang tshad brgya pa spyad byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-16: sa yi lhung bzed spyod byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-17: ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-18: s'a lu'i 'bras chan gtsang ma dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-19: sha yis brlan pa spyad byas nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-20: zan dron khengs pa spyod byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-21: ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-22: srin bal ras bal zar ma dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-23: ko ta ma ka shi'i gos spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-24: phyag dar khrod dag bsrel byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-25: ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-26: rlung med sgo gtan bsdams pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-27: khang pa brtsegs par khyod nyal na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-28: shing ljon drung du gnas gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-29: ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-31: mal khri dag la khyod nyal nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:164b-32: rtsva yi stan la nyal gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-2: btsun mo mtshungs pa yid 'ong ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-3: gus par nyal cing snyan smra ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-4: du ma khyod kyis rnam spangs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-5: ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-6: glang chen gnya' dang shing rta dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-7: rta yi bzhon pas khyod song nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-8: rkang pas sa la rgyu byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-9: ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-10: nor mang ldan pa'i mdzod dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-11: bang ba dag kyang rnam spangs te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-12: ci yang med pa thob gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-13: ji ltar yongs su mi gdung ngam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-14: au tra ya nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-15: rgyal po gal te gdul dka' ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-16: gzhan gyi zas kyis 'tsho byed na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-17: ma grub pas ni de 'dul te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-18: gnya' shing ba lang 'dul ba bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-19: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos smras pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-20: rgyal po khyod yid mi bde'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-21: ci'i phyir dman pa bzhin du smra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-22: rgyal srid phyed ni sbyin bya yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-23: khyod ni sngon bzhin longs spyod gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-24: rgyal po khyod yid mi bde'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-25: ci'i phyir dman pa bzhin du smra //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-26: yid kyis gang dang gang 'dod pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-27: longs spyod rab mchog sbyin par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-28: au tra ya nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-29: rgyal po gang zhig 'jig rten na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-30: lus kyi chos reg bkren pa min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-31: de ni nges par lha nyid dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-33: mi dbang gang zhig chos spong zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-34: 'di la chos min dga' byed pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-35: rgyal po de bkren shes par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-37: khyod la chos ni bstan bya yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-38: rgyal po chen po bdag la nyon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165a-39: chos thos 'og tu rgyal po ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-1: yon tan med pa'i lus la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-2: gcig nyid yon tan chen po ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-3: ji lta ji ltar bzung byas pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-5: rgyal po bcu pa'i bcu po 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-6: skyes bu'i tsher ni brjod par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-7: bu dang chung ma nor de la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-8: rtsed mo dga' ba ci zhig yod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-9: bu yis dga' ba ston byed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-10: chung mas khengs pa rjod par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-11: chom rkun nor ni sgrub byed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-12: rgyal po bdag ni bcings las grol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-13: mthar byed pa las sman dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-14: nor dang nye dus skyo ba mi nus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-15: rig sngags kun dang dpung dag dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-16: dpa' rtul gyis kyang skyob nus min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-18: gnas pa'i lha tshe ring po yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-19: de yang tshe zad nyams 'gyur bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-20: 'chi las de ring su zhig mthar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-21: mthu chen nor ldan grags 'bar ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-22: rgyal srid byas pa khyab 'jug dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-23: mun byed sgra ngan skya seng bu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:165b-24: des kyang 'chi ba zlog ma nus //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:166a-20: gser dngul gang dag yod pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:166a-21: bu dang chung ma 'khor bcas dag /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:166b-16: 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag dang 'dra ba'i slad du ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:166b-20: me tog gi shing ljon pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:166b-21: 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa dag ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:166b-29: lo thang dag 'bul bar bgyid do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:167a-0: de la de gnyis kyis lan gsum gyi bar du yang @167a *//
