K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:169b-11: phyag rjed bka' nyan pa dag lags kyi mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:169b-12: zhes de dag gis ral gri rnon po mchan du bcug ste 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:169b-13: tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya na dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:169b-14: chos gos zin pa dang ldan pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:169b-15: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:169b-17: bdag grong khyer sgra sgrog tu ljongs rgyu zhing mchi bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:169b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:169b-20: song la khyod kyis las bdag gir bya ba yid la bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:169b-21: de nas tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:169b-22: de nas tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya na de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:169b-23: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-0: rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la rgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi @170a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-1: bsod snyoms las phyir log pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-2: ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas las kyis bdas te song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-3: las kyis ring du 'dren byed de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-4: ring nas las kyis 'dren par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-5: gang du las rnams smin 'gyur ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-6: der ni las kyis rab tu 'drin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-7: de grong khyer sgra sgrog ga la ba der song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-8: lam gar ri brag cig yod pa der bsod snyoms la zhugs nas de de nas bsod snyoms rgyus te song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-9: mi gshed ma de dag dang phrad nas de dag gis de mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-10: des kyang de dag ngo shes nas de de dag dang lhan cig skyed mos tshal zhig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas des de dag la dri bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-11: ji ltar sgra sgrog dag na gtsug phud can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-12: 'khor dang tshogs bcas stobs ldan nad med dam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-13: de la phas kyi bsdo ba 'ga' med cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-14: rang gi rgyal srid chos kyis byed 'jug gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-17: de bzhin sgra sgrog dag na gtsug phud can //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-18: 'khor dang tshogs bcas stobs ldan bro ma 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-19: de la phas kyi bsngo ba ma mchis te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-20: rgyal srid rtag tu chos ma lags pas bgyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-21: mi mchod khyod kyi tshul dang mthun pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-22: 'phags dngos mngon rtogs gang lags khyod kyis mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-23: zhi ba de mi tshul mthun gang lags pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-24: de ni de ring nye bar gzigs par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170a-25: tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-0: de nga der 'ongs pa la @170b mngon par mi dga' 'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-6: gal te de lta na mi 'gro'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-8: de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-9: skyes bu pa khyod slar ni gang du gshegs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-10: sras ni khyod gson mngon par mi dga' ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-11: bdag cag byur ngan rgyal pos bsgos rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-12: 'dir ni khyod bgrongs slad du mchis kyis 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-13: tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-15: khyed cag nga gsod pa'i gshed ma pa dag yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-17: bdag cag khyod bgrongs pa'i gshed ma pa dag lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-18: tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la au tra ya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-20: song la khyod kyis las bdag gir bya ba yid la bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-21: zhes bka' stsal pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-24: rnam pa thams cad du ngan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-27: snyam du rig nas de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-29: nga don gang gi phyir rab tu byung ba'i don de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-30: ngas da dung ma thob kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-31: re zhig nga rang gi don rjes su sgrub kyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-32: de dag gis phan tshun gros byas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-35: de nas tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya nas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du brten nas brang 'gro'i rgyal po gnyid log pa'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas te spyod lam zhi bas 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa la phan yon lnga yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:170b-37: phung po la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-1: skye mched la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-2: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-3: de'i gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa gzhan la rag ma las pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-5: des brtson 'grus brtsams pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g-yo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-6: mi g-yo ba 'di nyid rig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-7: 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-10: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyi zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-11: rigs kyi bu dag gang gi phyir skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-12: tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-13: tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-15: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-17: dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-18: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-19: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-20: tsandan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i spubs dral bar gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-23: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171a-24: srid pa dang 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-0: nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis @171b mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-2: mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya nas dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-4: bde ba so sor yang dag par rig pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-5: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-6: dge slong au tra ya na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-7: mdud pa'i sbyor ba zug rngu dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-8: de bzhin sgrib las thar gyur kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-9: rgyal po'i chos las deng mthar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-10: ces smras nas mi gshed ma de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-12: ngas thob par bya ba gang yin pa de thob zin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-14: khyed cag don gang gi phyir 'ongs pa'i don de thob par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-17: gal te rgyal po gtsug phud can bdag cag la rgyal po rgan pos 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe ci zhig smras zhes rmed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-18: bdag cag gis de la ji skad brjod par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-21: rgyal srid phyir ni pha bsad pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-22: bsod nams ma yin mang po bskyed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-23: nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'da'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-27: khyod kyis mtshams med pa gnyis byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-28: pha srog dang bral ba gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-29: dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srog dang bral ba gang yin pa de gnyis kyis khyod yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas par bya dgos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-30: sdig pa sna tshogs las shogs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:171b-33: yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-0: @172a *// tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya nas yang bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-1: sems can de sems can dmyal ba chen po la gzhol bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-4: snyam nas des rdzu 'phrul gyi thabs gang dang gang yin brtsams na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-5: de'i las kyis non pas rdzu zhes bya ba tsam yang snang bar ma gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-6: rdzu 'phrul lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-7: de nas mi gshed ma pa de dag las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-8: mi snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-9: 'jig rten pha rol btang ba zhig gis ral gri shubs nas phyung ste de'i mgo drungs nas bcad nas sa la bsgyel to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-12: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe na zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-18: dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-23: gang dag 'og logs su 'dong ba de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-24: sems can dmyal ba yang sos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172a-39: padma ltar gas pa chen por dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-0: sems can dmyal ba @172b tsha ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-1: bsil bar gyur te 'bab par byed la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-2: sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-3: dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-4: des sems can de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-5: de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-8: 'on te gzhan du skyes snyam du sems so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-9: de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-10: de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-12: bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-13: gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-15: sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-17: de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nyid mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-18: gang dag steng logs su 'dong ba de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:172b-20: sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-5: 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas mi rtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-8: bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrog par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-9: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-10: brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-11: sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-12: 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-13: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-14: gang zhig rab tu bag yod pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-16: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-17: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-18: zhes bya ba yang smras so;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-19: de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi slad bzhin slad bzhin du rjes su 'dong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-20: de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-22: ma 'ongs pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-24: sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-25: zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-26: dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-27: zhabs kyi long bur nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-28: yi dvags su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-29: zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-30: mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173a-32: stobs kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-0: phyag mthil @173b g-yon par nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-1: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-2: phyag mthil g-yas par nub par 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-3: lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-5: nyan thos kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-7: rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-9: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-10: gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-11: de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil du nub bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-12: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-13: kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-14: tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-15: de yis phyogs rnams thams cad snang bgyis pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-16: nyi gdugs bdal bar gyur pa ji bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-17: yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-18: rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa rab spangs pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-19: sangs rgyas 'gro ba mchog gi rgyur gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-20: rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-21: rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-22: de slad brtan pa rang blos dus mkhyen nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-23: thub pa khyu mchog dge sbyong skye dbang po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-24: nyan pa'i skye bo som nyi ldan rnams la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-25: the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-26: dam pa dge ba dag gis bsal du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-27: tsha chu ri rgyal lta bu brtan pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:173b-28: sangs rgyas mgon rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-2: skye bo'i tshogs rnams de ni nyan par 'tshal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-9: rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-12: dge slong au tra yan ni; ;mdud pa sbyor ba zug rngu dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-13: de bzhin sgrib las thar gyur kyang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-14: rgyal po'i chos las deng ma thar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-16: grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i rgyal po gtsug phud can sdig pa'i grogs pos bskor bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-17: dge slong au tra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa srog dang bral bar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-18: des pha dgra bcom pa srog dang bral bar byas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-19: nges par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-21: tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-22: srog dang bral bar gyur tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-24: au tra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing srog dang bral bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-25: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de thos nas mchims brnangs te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-26: de nas gshed ma pa mi de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya na'i lhung bzed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-28: mkhar gsil khyer te grong khyer sgra sgrog tu phyin nas de dag gis blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-29: rgyal po rgan po bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174a-30: de gnyis kyis thos nas dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-0: mchog tu dga' ba @174b skyes te rgyal po gtsug phud can ga la ba der dong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-3: lha'i rgyal srid la tsher ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-5: lha'i dgra gang lags pa de bkum mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-9: de bsad pa ji ltar shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-10: de gnyis kyis mi gshed ma pa dag bstan te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-15: rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis de dag mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-17: rgyal po rgan po la dpung ji tsam yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-19: de la dpung ga la mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-23: rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis de mthong nas brgyal te sa la 'gyel nas chus btab ste dbugs phyir byung nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-25: rgyal po rgan pos 'chi ba'i tshe ci smras /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-26: lha; rgyal po rgyan po srog dang bral khar 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-27: rgyal srid phyir ni pha bsad pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-28: bsod nams ma yin mang po bskyed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-29: nga ni yongs su mya ngan 'da'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-33: khyod kyis mtshams med pa'i las gnyis byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-34: pha srog dang bral ba gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-35: dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srog dang bral ba gang yin pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-36: khyod yun ring por dmyal bar gnas par bya dgos kyi sdig pa sdig pa las shogs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:174b-38: las bsrabs pa nyid dang yongs su zad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-2: de mya ngan gyi zug rngus gzir bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-3: 'dam bu sngon por brngas pa bzhin du rnyid par gyur nas des blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-4: bhi ru ka gnyis pos te smras pa shas ldan gnyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-5: khyed gnyis kyis nga las de lta bu byed pa las ma bzlog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-7: lhas bdag cag gnyis spyan lam du ma bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-9: des blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis mig lam du mi snang bar bzhag nas he ru ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-10: bhe ru ka gnyis phyir blon po'i mchog tu bskos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-11: blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis gsang ste tshe dang ldan pa rgyal dang skar rgyal gyi mchod rten gnyis la khung bu gnyis bskos nas der byi la'i phrug gu gnyis bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-12: de gnyis kyis nyi ma re re zhing sha sri re re byin nas 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-14: skar rgyal gnyis bden pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-15: bden pa'i tshig gang gis khyed gnyis kyi sgyu mas 'jig rten bslus te dad pas sbyin par bya ba chud gzan pas byi la'i gnas ngan par skyes pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-16: sha sri longs la rang rang gi mchod rten la bskor ba bgyis te rang rang gi khung du zhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-18: gang gi tshe de gnyis legs par lobs par gyur pa de'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-19: blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis au tra ya na'i btsun mo'i gan du song ste smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-24: lus ma thob par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175a-25: ci'i slad du khyod btang snyoms mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-1: khyed gnyis nyid kyis de las de lta bu byed du bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-2: da kho mos ji ltar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-6: gang du bum pa ltung ba der dpyang thag kyang ltung bar bgyi'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-9: re zhig de'i pha bsad pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-10: kho mos gsang bar bya na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-14: dgra bcom pa bsad pa bdag cag gnyis kyis gsang bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-18: zhes de'i gan du song ste smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-27: ci'i phyir khyod skya bo seng seng po rid pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-30: gang gi slad du bdag blon po skyon chags pa gnyis kyis bslus pas mtshams med pa'i las gnyis bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-31: yab srog dang bral ba gang lags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-32: dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa srog dang bral ba gang lags pa des bdag yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gnas par bgyi 'tshal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-33: bdag ji ltar skya bo seng seng po rid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-36: lus ma thob par mi 'gyur du rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-39: je mi 'jigs pa stsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-40: gang mad pa de bka' mchid bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-44: ji ltar lags pa gsungs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:175b-47: khyod kyi yab ma lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-1: bkru ba'i slad du skyes pa gzhan dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pa de las khyod 'khrungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-3: de ltar na pha bsad par ma gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-4: snyam du rig nas smras pa; yum /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-8: dgra bcom pa bsad pa mchis pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-9: ji ltar mthar thug par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-12: 'di la shes pa la mkhas pa dag rma bar bgyi ste; de dag gis de mthar thug par bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-13: zhes smras te song nas des blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis pos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-14: kho mos de'i pha bsad pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-16: da khyed gnyis kyis dgra bcom pa bsad pa sol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-17: rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-19: shes pa la mkhas pa thams cad sdus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-20: de dag gis blon po skyon chags pa gang dag shes pa la mkhas pa thams cad bsdus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-21: blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyang der 'dus par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-24: ngas dgra bcom pa bsad pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-25: ji ltar mthar thug par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-26: de na rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba'i mi thams cad kyis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-27: mi mthun par smra bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-28: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-30: des dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis par sus mthong /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176a-34: thams cad mkhyen pa dang 'dra ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-0: blon po skyon chags pa @176b de gnyis kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-2: 'di la thugs ngan bgyir ci mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-4: khyed gnyis kyang de skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-5: 'di la mya ngan byar ci yod ces zer ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-7: dgra bcom pa gsod du bcug go ;zhes mi zer ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-10: dgra bcom pa dag ma mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-11: dgra bcom pa dag bkum par mchis re skan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-13: ngas mngon sum kho nar dgra bcom pa rgyal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-14: skar rgyal gnyis kyis 'bar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-17: klog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas te phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong bzhin du khyed gnyis kyis de skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-18: dgra bcom pa dag med na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-19: dgra bcom pa bsad pa yod re skan zhes zer ram /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-22: ji ltar de gnyis kyis sgyu mas 'jig rten bslus te dad pas sbyin par bgyi ba chud gzan pas byi la'i skye gnas ngan par skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-23: deng sang nyid du yang rang rang gi mchod rten na mchis pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-25: rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-27: gal te de ltar na tshur shog dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-30: yang dag pa ma yin pa bltar 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-31: grong khyer sgra sgrog thams cad du ji ltar rgyal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-32: skar rgyal gnyis byi la'i skye gnas su skyes te rang rang gi mchod rten na 'dug nas rgyal po bltar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:176b-33: zhes bya ba'i sgra des khyab par gyur nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag ltad mo skyes nas rgyal po'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-1: skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor 'bum phrag du ma'i mdun du smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-6: sha sri 'di longs la rang rang gi mchod rten la bskor ba bgyis te rang rang gi khung du zhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-8: de gnyis kyis rang rang gi khungs nas byung ste sha sri blangs nas rang rang gi mchod rten la bskor ba byas nas rang rang gi khung du zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-9: srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis mthong nas blon po skyon chags pa de gnyis kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-17: 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa dag ma mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-19: skye bo'i bka' mchid 'ba' zhig tu bas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-20: de nas rgyal po de la 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa dag yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-21: snyam pa'i lta ba yod pa gang yin pa de med par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-22: de nas gang dag ma dad pa de dag la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-23: med par lta ba skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-24: gang dag bar mar gnas pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-25: yid gnyis za bar gyur to; ;gang dag dad pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-26: gnong zhing mi dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-27: mi 'jigs pa med par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-28: de nas rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177a-29: gal te 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa dag med na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-0: @177b bdag gis ci'i phyir 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-1: dge slong ma ri ma 'khor lnga brgya dang ldan pa la bsod snyoms dbul snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-3: dge slong ma rnams kyi bsod snyoms bcad nas dge slong rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-4: dge slong ma rnams kyang grong khyer sgra sgrog nas dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-5: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-6: dge slong ma ri ma ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-7: gdul ba la ltos pas de nyid na 'khod do; ;ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gtsug phud can grong khyer sgra sgrog nas phyir byung ba na tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po grong khyer sgra sgrog tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-8: des rgyal po mthong nas 'di mi dga' bar sems par gyur na mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-9: snyam nas mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-10: rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis de mtha' gcig na sdod pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-11: mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-13: ci'i phyir 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-14: nga mthong nas mtha' gcig tu song nas sdod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-15: de'i phyi bzhin blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-16: bhi ru ka gnyis 'gro ba de gnyis kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-18: 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chan po'i thugs lam na lha gshed du gzigs mo dang dge mtshan la gshegs pas mi dgyes par dgongs par gyur na mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-20: tshon gyi las bgyi ba dka' bas chos gos dag rdul gyis phog par gyur na mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:177b-22: rgyal po cang mi smra bar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-0: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos grong khyer sgra sgrog tu bsod snyoms @178a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-1: rgyus te phyir byung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-2: rgyal po gtsug phud can nang du 'jug nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po de bzhin du mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-3: rgyal po gtsug phud can gyis de mtha' gcig na sdod pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-4: mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-6: 'phags pa k'a ty'a na chen po 'dis sngar nga mthong nas mtha' gcig tu sdod pa'i rgyu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-8: da ltar yang mtha' gcig tu song ste sdod pa'i rgyu ci yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-9: de'i phyi bzhin blon po skyon chags pa gnyis 'gro ba de gnyis kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-11: 'di'i mchid nas kho bo pha gsod pa 'di'i rdul gyis mi reg par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-14: yongs su mi rtog pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-15: de skad thos nas khro bas kun nas dkris par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-19: gang dang gang nga la dga' ba de dang des dge sbyong mgo reg 'di'i steng du sa sbar mo re re gtor cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-20: skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis sa sbar mo re res gtor to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-21: rgyal po de dpung che ba yin pas re res sa sbar mo re tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po'i steng du gtor ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-22: de'i steng du sa phung chen po rnam par gnas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-23: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos kyang de'i dbus su lo ma ma yin pa'i spyil bu mngon par sprul te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178a-24: de dag de la 'thor ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178b-0: phyugs rdzi dag gis mthong nas de dag smod bzhin du mtha' 'khor zhing sdod pa na blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang bhi ru ka gnyis phyi bzhin du @178b 'brang zhing 'ong ba phyogs der phyin nas de gnyis kyis dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178b-4: rgyal po 'thab krol can pha gsod pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178b-5: 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po nyes pa med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178b-6: gnod pa mi byed pa sas bkab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178b-7: de gnyis mchi mas brnangs te ngu ba'i bzhin gyis ba lang rdzi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:178b-8: phyugs rdzi dag dang lhan cig sa phyags par brtsams pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:179a-8: las de'i cha can ma yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:179b-3: de'i 'og tu grong khyer sgra sgrog gi nye 'khor na gnas pa gang dag gis las mthun par byas pa de dag grong khyer sgra sgrog tu 'jug par 'gyur zhing de dag zhugs pa na nyi ma drug pa la rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:179b-18: de na he ru ka la bu sngo bsangs zhes bya ba khye'u zhig yod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:179b-19: bhi ru ka la yang bu mo sngo bsangs can zhes bya ba bu mo zhig yod nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:179b-20: he ru kas khye'u sngo bsangs tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po la phul te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:179b-22: gal te 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba 'ga' zhig mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:179b-25: 'di khyod nyid kyi zham 'bring ba lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:179b-26: bhi ru kas kyang bu mo sngo bsangs can dge slong ma ri ma la phul te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:180a-1: ba'i rtsa ba 'ga' zhig mchis na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:180a-7: des bu mo de ko'u shambhir khyim bdag gdangs can la gtad nas 'phrin ji skad spring pa yang bzlas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:180a-8: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:180a-12: khyim drung du gru bzhag nas bsdad do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:180a-15: gyo mo med par rnam par bzhag go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:180a-21: ring po mi thogs par gos kyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:180b-9: de na he re kas ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:180b-12: he ru ka'i tshal ces bya bar gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:180b-14: bhi ru ka'i tshal ces bya bar gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-1: phud can 'bros par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-2: mi ma yin dag gis sgo bcad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-3: khye'u sngo bsangs kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-5: grong khyer du sgra mthon po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-6: sgra chen po byung ba 'di ci lags /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-9: skar khung nas kham phor phyir phyung zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-10: de skar khung nas kham por phyir byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-11: sas phyed tsam gang bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-12: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-13: da dung spyod yul lhag ma dang bcas pa yin snyam mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-14: ji tsam na yang kham phor phyi rol tu phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-15: byur bur gang bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-16: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-18: spyod yul med par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-21: de nas grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-22: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-27: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos sngo bsangs la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-29: chos gos kyi grva nas zungs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-31: des chos gos kyi grva nas bzung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-32: des khye'u sngo bsangs khrid de rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-33: sgra sgrog na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo yang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis de'i phyi bzhin song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181a-34: grong khyer sgra sgrog kyang sas non par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-0: de dag mthar gyis khar pan zhes bya @181b ba'i ri brag tu phyin nas de dag de na g-yul gyi gzhi na 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-1: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos khye'u sngo bsangs g-yul gyi bzhir bzhag ste bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-2: lha mo de'i mthus g-yul gyi gzhi der 'bru 'phel bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-3: de na mi gang 'dug pa des khye'u de mthong nas de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-5: khyod kyi mthus g-yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-7: kho bo'i mthus g-yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur pa ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-9: grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo 'dir 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-10: phyogs ga ge mo zhig na 'dug pa de'i mthus g-yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-11: de de'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-13: bdag grong du mchis te mchi ba'i bar du re zhig lde mig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-14: lde mig kyog po 'di bzung zhing khyod kyis bdag ma lags pa gzhan su la yang mi stsal bar gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-16: mi de yang ri brag tu song nas ri brag na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs bsdus te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-18: grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnyug mar gnas pa'i lha mo 'dir 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-19: g-yul gyi gzhi na 'dug pas de'i mthus g-yul gyi gzhir 'bru 'phel bar gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-20: bdag gis de'i lag tu lde mig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-21: lde mig kyog po byin te bdag gi de la bdag grong du mchis te slar mchi ba'i bar du lde mig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-22: lde mig kyog po 'di bzung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:181b-23: khyod kyis bdag ma gtogs pa gzhan su la yang stsal bar mi bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-1: de'i phyir grong mi rnams la gal te bdag gi bu gtso bor dbang bskur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-2: kho bo bdag nyid srog dang 'bral bar gsol ba 'debs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-4: lha mo bdag cag gi gnas nas gar yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-5: khyed cag longs spyod dag gis mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-6: yams kyi nad thams cad kyang nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-7: de dag gis de'i bu gtso bor dbang bskur nas des kyang bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-8: de nas de dag gis gnas de thams cad spos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-9: me tog gis mdzes par byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-11: rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan te gtor ma thogs nas lha mo de ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-13: khyod 'di nyid la bzhugs par gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-16: 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po la bsnyen bkur byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-17: 'di na kho mo'i gnas med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-18: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-20: khyod kyis gang las lde mig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-21: lde mig kyog po blangs pa soms shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-22: des bsam pa la zhug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-23: ji tsam na mi de dus la bab par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-24: des gnas de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-26: kho mo'i dam tshig gis gnas par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182a-27: gal te kho mo'i gnas gzhi ji lta bu byad du bcug pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i gnas gzhi yang byed du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-0: de dag gis khas blangs nas @182b de dag gis lha mo de'i gnas ji lta bu byed du bcug pa de lta bur tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po'i gnas kyang byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-1: lha mo de'i gnas su mar me btsugs pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-2: des khyer te tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po'i gnas su 'dzugs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-3: de mar me khyer te 'gro ba rtsig drung na 'dug pa'i mi zhig gis mthong nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-4: lha mo 'di 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po'i gan du 'dod pas 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-6: des de'i sems shes nas khros te ri brag 'di na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-7: sdig pa'i sems kun tu spyod pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-8: 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po 'dod pa'i dri nga ba med pa la rdzun gyis skur pa 'debs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-9: snyam nas des ri brag der mi ngas phyung ste skye bo phal po che shi bar gyur nas skye bo shi ba'i ro phyir 'byin pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-12: gnas de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ltas pa dag bcug ste dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-16: de dag gis de la bzod pa gsol bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-18: khyed cag 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po 'dod pa'i dri nga ba med pa la rdzun gyis skur pa 'debs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-19: de dag gis yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-22: 'ga' yang bsnyen bkur ma lags ba bgyid par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-24: dam tshig gis bzod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:182b-25: gal te khyed cag kho mo la ji ltar bsnyen bkur byed pa de ltar 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po la yang byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-3: ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyi yi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-5: des de dag la bzod par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-6: de dag gis kyang tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po la ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsnyen bkur byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-7: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos de nyid du dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas khye'u sngo bsangs khrid de lha mo la smras nas 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-10: bdag la mtshan ma cung zhig stsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-11: bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-12: des de la kham phor byin nas des de khas phub ste mchod rten du byas nas dus ston byed du bcug nas kham phor gyi dus ston zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-13: deng sang yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-16: phyugs rdzi dag gis mthong nas de dag gis 'phyang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-18: zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po byung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-19: yul de'i mi rnams kyi ming 'phyang ba pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-20: 'phyang ba pa zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-21: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po ri brag cig tu phyin nas der khye'u sngo bsangs shing ljon pa'i drung du bzhag ste bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-22: ri brag de na rgyal po bu med par dus la bab nas pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-24: yul mi dag 'dus te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183a-26: gang zhig rgyal por dbang bskur bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-0: de na kha cig gis @183b smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-4: de ji ltar shes par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-6: rtog pa dag bsgo bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-7: de dag gis rtog pa dag bskos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-8: de dag gis phan tshun bcal bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-9: de dag gis khye'u de shing ljon pa'i drung na gnyid log par mthong nas de dag gis de'i mtshan ma bzung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-10: ji tsam na shing ljon pa gzhan dag gi grib ma shar phyogs su gzhol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-12: shar phyogs su bab par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-13: shing ljon pa de'i grib mas khye'u de'i lus mi gtong bar mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-14: mthong nas kyang gros bya bar brtsams pa; shes ldan dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-16: dbang che bar grags pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-18: de dag gis de sad par byas te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-22: kho bo rgyal srid don du gnyer ba ma yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-24: 'phags pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po'i bsnyen bkur ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-25: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-27: khye'u 'di la rgyal srid du 'gyur ba'i las dag yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-29: yod par mthong nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-31: rgyal srid longs la 'di ltar khyod kyis chos kyis byed du chug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-33: de dag gis de dbang bskur nas khye'u sngo bsangs kyis der rgyal srid byed du bcug pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-35: sngo bsangs kyi rgyal srid ces bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:183b-36: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po yul bog ka nar phyin nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-1: ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po'i ma bog ka nar skyes pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-2: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-4: khyod yun ring zhig nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-6: khyod yun ring zhig lon nas mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-7: de'i nu ma gnyis las kyang 'o ma'i rgyun 'dzag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-8: tshe dang ldan pa ka tya ya na chen pos de la yum yum zhes khag phab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-9: des tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen por zan byin nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-12: rang bzhin khong du chud nas gang thos nas des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-14: btsun pas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-15: bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-18: lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-19: sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-21: bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-24: rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-28: rus pa'i ri dag las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-30: ngan song gi sgo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184a-39: lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-0: zhes @184b lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-2: dka' ba byed pa'i ma la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-3: phu pho bzang pos gang bya ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-4: de ni khyod kyis bdag la bgyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-5: sems ni mtho ris gzhol bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-6: ngan song dag nas legs phyung zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-7: khyod kyis mtho ris thar pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-8: rab tu 'bad pas bdag bzhag ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-9: khyod kyis dka' ba legs par mjed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-10: tshong pas khe spogs rnyed pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-11: mtho ris rnyed pa bdag gis rnyed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-12: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-13: nye bar brten pa bzang ba lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-14: de nas tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos bu mo bzang mo de bden pa dag la bzhag nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-21: bdag la mtshan ma cung zhig stsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-22: bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-23: des de la 'khar ba byin nas des mchod rten byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-24: der de btsugs nas 'khar ba'i mchod rten /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-25: 'khar ba'i mchod rten zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-26: deng sang yang dge slong mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba dag phyag 'tshal bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-27: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po yul dbus su 'gro 'dod nas yul si nur phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-28: de nas byang lam na gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-29: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-31: bdag la yang mtshan ma cung zhig stsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-32: bdag de la mchod pa bgyid cing mchis so;/
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-34: bcom ldan 'das kyis yul dbus su lham sgrog gu can bcang bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:184b-38: des lham sgrog gu can de de la byin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-1: gzhi byed du bcug ste der bzhag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-3: lham gyi dbang phyug ces bya bar shes so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-5: lham gyi gzhi zhes bya bar shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-6: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen po mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-7: tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-9: ji ltar bde bar rgyus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-12: cung zad bde bar yang rgyus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-13: cung zad sdug bsngal bar yang rgyus so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-14: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-16: ji ltar sdug bsngal bar rgyus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-18: sems can gyi bya ba byas pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-19: bde bar rgyus pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-20: rgyal po gtsug phud can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-21: grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis bdag sas mnan pa gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-22: blon po'i mchod he ru ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-23: bhi ru ka gnyis tshegs chen pos bros pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-24: sdug bsngal bar rgyus pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-25: dge slong don nyung ngu dag gis smad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-28: des tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-30: gnod pa mi byed pa bsad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-32: de'i me tog tsam yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-35: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-36: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-38: tshe dang ldan pa au tra ya nas las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185a-40: nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan @185b pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis nas mtshon gyis pa bkum par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-3: dge slong au tra ya na nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-5: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-6: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-7: au tra ya na nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-9: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-10: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-13: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-16: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-19: skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-20: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-21: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-22: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-25: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-26: rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-27: bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-28: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-29: bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-30: ji tsam na ri brag cig tu rngon pa zhig 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-31: ri brag de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na ri dvags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-32: bya mang po dag gi rten du gyur pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-33: mtshe'u zhig yod pa der rngon pa de nyi ma re re zhing ri dvags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:185b-34: bya mang po dag drung dbyung ba'i phyir dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-2: tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir rngon spyad dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-4: rnyong mang po dag 'dzugs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-7: rnyong de dag kyang don yod pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-8: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri brag der phyin nas lha'i gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-9: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ri brag der bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-10: der bsod snyoms rgyus nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-11: lha'i gnas 'di nyin mo rgyun lugs mang ba yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-12: ri brag gi phyi rol gyi gnas zhi ba zhig tu bsod snyoms bza'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-13: snyam nas de ri brag nas byung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-18: zhes mtshe'u de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas lhung bzed dang chu tshags mtha' gcig tu bzhag ste rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas lag pa gnyis bsnyal te chu btsags nas lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byas te lag pa gnyis bsnyal nas kha bkrus te lhung bzed dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-19: chu tshags gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas rkang pa gnyis bkrus te shing drung zhig tu brten nas brang 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas te spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-20: de'i nyin mo mi'i dris ri dvags gcig kyang ma zin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-21: de nas rngon pa de nang par sngar langs te mtshe'u de ga la ba der song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-24: rnyong de dag byul bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186a-25: ri dvags gcig kyang ma mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-3: rnyong 'di dag don yod pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-4: gang gi phyir der ri dvags gcig kyang ma zin pa 'di'i rgyu gang yin snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-5: des mtshe'u de'i than kor byul bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-7: de rjes de'i phyi bzhin du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-8: rang sangs rgyas spyod lam zhi bar 'dug pa de mthong nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-9: rab tu byung ba sems zhi ba 'di dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-10: gnas 'di lta bu dag tu mngon par dga' bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-11: gal te bdag gis 'di'i srog bcad pa ma byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-12: 'di dag gis nges par bdag gi 'tsho ba gcod par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-13: rnam pa thams cad du 'di gsad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-14: snyam nas snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-15: 'jig rten pha rol btang ba des mda' dug can gyis gzhu rnga'i dbyibs 'dra ba rna drung du thug par bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-16: rang sangs rgyas de'i gnad du bsnun to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-17: rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-20: nyams par gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-21: 'di la la gnas drang ba sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-22: snyam nas des ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-25: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-27: rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-28: rngon pa de shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du bsgyel nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:186b-29: yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-0: nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag @187a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-1: gi sug ba nas drang ba stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-2: rang sangs rgyas de rngon pa de la rjes su snying rje ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-3: de nas rngon pa des zug rngu med par byas te rma lhan gyis glan nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-6: gal te 'dir gser gyi lhan pas glan par mdzad nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-7: de yang bdag gis sbyar bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-8: rang sangs rgyas kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-9: bdag gis rnag gi lus 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa thob zin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-11: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-13: de rngon pa de nyid kyi mdun du'ang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-14: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag rnam par bstan nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-16: nor dang ldan pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-17: des spos kyi shing thams cad kyis phung por bcer te bsregs nas phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-18: rus pa de dag gser gyi bum par bcug nas lam po che'i bzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187a-26: sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-0: bdag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par mi 'gyur bar @187b mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-3: longs spyod che bar skye zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-4: 'di las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-5: thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-8: de la de'i tshe de'i dus na rngon pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-9: dge slong au tra ya na yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-10: des rang sangs rgyas kyi gnad du mda' dug can gyis bsnun pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-11: bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par gdungs nas las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mtshe'u de nyid du ri dvags su gyur nas mda' dug can gyis gnad du bsnun cing dus la bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-12: da ltar gyi bar du'ang dgra bcom pa thob kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-13: de mtshon gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-14: mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-17: longs spyod che bar skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-18: nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-19: 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-22: las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-23: gcig tu nag pa yin la /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:187b-25: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa'ang 'dren ma yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-5: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-7: khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-8: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-10: rgyal po gtsug phud can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-11: grong khyer sgra sgrog na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-12: tshe dang ldan pa k'a ty'a ya na chen pos las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-13: des dog sas non par gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-14: blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-15: bhi ru ka gnyis kyis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-19: de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-21: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-22: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-23: de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-25: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-26: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-29: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-32: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-35: skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188a-36: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-0: @188b chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-1: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-4: sngon byung ba ri brag cig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-5: khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-10: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu khye'u zhig byung ngo; ;yang rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-12: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu mo zhig byung nas de gnyis bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-13: bu mo de dang na mnyam pa'i bu mo dag slong ba 'ongs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-14: bu mo de la slong ba 'ga' yang ma 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-15: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-16: dkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-17: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-19: ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-20: ri brag der phyin nas bu mo des khyim phyags nas phyag dar rib ma'i steng nas bor ba de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-21: rang sangs rgyas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba de'i mgor phog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-22: bu mo des der phog pa mthong nas 'gyod pa'i sems kyang ma skyes la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-23: stes dbang gis de nyid kyi nyin mo de slong ba 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-24: ming pos de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:188b-25: deng khyod kyis ci byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-0: bdag gis deng rab tu byung ba'i steng du phyag dar bor @189a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-2: bu mo des bu mo gzhan dag la sbran cing des kyang gzhan dag la sbran nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-3: 'jig rten la bu mo gang dang gang slong ba mi 'ong ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-4: rang sangs rgyas kyi steng du phyag dar bor na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-6: zhes sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-7: bdag nyid chen po rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-8: bsnyen bkur ma yin pas 'jigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-9: rang sangs rgyas de ri brag de nas song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-10: drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi steng du dor bar brtsams nas de dag kyang dong ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-12: ri brag de na khyim bdag dge ba'i chos can gnyis shig 'khod pa de gnyis kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-14: dam pa ma yin pa'i chos 'phel ba 'di bzlog par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-15: zhes de gnyis kyis bzlog cing spangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-18: bu mo gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi steng du phyag dar bor ba de ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-24: pha ma dag gi steng du phyag dar bor ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sas non par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189a-26: blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-0: bhi ru ka @189b gnyis yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-1: las de'i rnam par smin pas bros par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-2: bu mo'i ming po gang gis 'dzum phyung ba de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-3: dge slong k'a ty'a ya na chen po yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-4: des 'dzum phyung ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sas g-yogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-5: gal te dge slong k'a ty'a ya na chen pos yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs par ma gyur du zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-6: dge slong k'a ty'a ya na chen po sas non cing tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-9: las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-11: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-12: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-15: las gcig tu nag pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-21: ko'u shambhi na khyim bdag nor bzang zhes bya ba; phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-23: longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug pa de'i khyim rgyal po shar pa'i drung na 'dug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-24: de nang par sngar langs te las kyi mtha' dag la rtog tu 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:189b-25: de dbyig gi gdangs can yin pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-3: 'di gser bzhag pa 'bum yod ces grag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-6: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-8: 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum ga la mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-9: gal te 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum mchis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-10: ci'i slad du bdag nyid dam bar bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-13: gal te khyed cag yid mi ches na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-14: khyim bdag nor bzang pos shig dang dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-15: de dag gis khyim bdag nor bzang pos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-17: khyim bdag khyod la gser bzhag pa 'bum yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-24: gser don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-26: ngas khyod la ci yod dam med ces dris par zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-29: lhas ji ltar mkhyen pa de zhu'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190a-43: bdag gi longs spyod dag 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-0: yangs par yang mi 'gyur @190b la lhas kyang bdag dbyig gi gdangs can legs par mkhyen par mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-3: khyod ci'i phyir glang po che dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-10: grogs 'di lta bus rgyal srid byed du gzhug par nus kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-11: 'di blon po kho nar gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-12: snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-15: lhan cig tu rgyal srid byed du gzhug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-18: de skad ces bka' stsal pa mi rigs te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-22: ci nas kyang gdon mi za bar khas len par shes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-23: nan gyis mnan nas des kyang khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-24: de nas rgyal pos de blon por bcug nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis chos dang rigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-26: rgyal po'i byed pa dag bya bar brtsams nas des blon po thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-27: de dag phrag dog skyes te nyid mi bde bar gyur nas 'dus te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-29: bdag cag 'di ltar khyim bdag gdangs can gyis zil gyis mnan par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-30: 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:190b-32: 'di la ci'i phyir sgrub tu med /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191a-0: zhes de dag thams cad 'dus te rgyal pos gan du dong nas @191a *//

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-4: gnas pa las brtag par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-5: ji tsam na byang lam nas ded dpon gyis zong rta ded de ko'u shambhir phyin nas rgyal pos gdangs can la bsgo ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-7: des gser 'bum gyis rta dag nyos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-8: rgyal pos gdangs can la bsgo ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-10: bdag gis 'bum tshang bar byin zin to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-16: slan chad 'dir chibs rta 'tshong pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-17: gzhan 'ga' yang mchi bar mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-18: 'di ltar lha'i dkor las 'bum phyed stsol cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-22: nga'i tshig de bzhin smras na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-26: bdag gis tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi don du tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par rngo mi thogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-27: rgyal pos de la lan gsum gyi bar du smras na yang de ma btub nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-28: de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-30: gang gis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i bka' lan gsum gyi bar du bcag pa de'i chad pa ci yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-31: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-37: ngas khyim bdag gdangs can yongs su btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:191b-38: blon po rnams kyis mi gshed ma dag la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192a-2: khyim bdag gdangs can sod cig ces byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192a-3: rgyal pos mi gshed ma pa de dag la gsang ste bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192a-4: khyod kyis khyim bdag gdangs can gsad par mi bya bar 'di ltar bsdigs par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192a-5: de dag gis de'i mgrin par k'a ra b'i ra'i phreng ba btags te grong khyer gyi dbus nas gsod sar khrid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192a-6: de'i nye du dag dong ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192a-8: 'di la lhas bka' ci stsal ba de ltar gyis la bdag nyid gsod du ma gzhug cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192a-10: kho bos lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bcag gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192a-12: gal te lhas kho bo nyes pa med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192a-13: gnod pa mi byed pa gsod na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192a-28: khyim bdag gdangs can de 'di skad ces mchi'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-3: lhas bdag brtag pa'i dgongs pas gnas skabs 'di lta bu stsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-7: gal te lha bdag la dgyes na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-8: bdag sbyin pa dag stsol cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-9: bsod nams dag bgyid par ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-14: ci dgar sbyin pa dag byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-16: de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-17: sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i mi dag bskos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-19: gal te 'dir sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-20: cha lugs can gyi dge sbyong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-24: ji tsam na lho lam nas drang srong lnga brgya tsam yul dbus su 'phags pa de dag mthar gyis lam du 'dong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-25: dgon pa'i lam du phyin nas de dag dgon pa'i nang du son pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-26: chu zad nas de dag chu dang bral ba'i skom gyis gdungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-27: dgon pa'i lam der phan tshun byul bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-28: de phan tshun nyul ba de dag gis ha cang thag mi ring ba na gsing ma sngon mo'i phyogs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-29: shing ljon pa zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-30: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:192b-31: shes ldan dag gsing ma sngon po'i phyogs 'di na shing ljon pa zhig snang gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-2: zhes de dag der dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-3: ji tsam na chu med par mthong nas de dag gis gsol pa gdab par brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-5: sa phyogs dang; shing ljon pa 'di la lha'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-11: lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-12: bdag cag drang srong lnga brgya skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la chu byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-14: ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las lag pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhig gser gyi ril ba bhing gar thogs te byung nas drang srong rnams kyis snyim pa bzed de chu btung bar brtsams nas ji tsam na myangs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-15: chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-21: dri nga ba med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-22: 'thungs pa na mgul la mi gnod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-23: 'thungs pa na lto mi na ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-24: de dag tshim par gyur nas ril ba bkang ste shis pa brjod nas 'phags te dong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-25: de dag la blo skyes pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-27: bdag cag gis de lta bu'i ya mtshan mthong nas de la khyod su yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-28: las gang gis 'dir skyes zhes ma dris pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-29: bdag cag nyams pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193a-33: de dag thams cad 'dus te phyir log nas shing ljon pa de'i drung du 'khod de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-3: lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa gang gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-4: bdag cag dgon pa'i lam du song ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-8: 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas tshim par byas pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-10: las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-11: ji tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-13: dzambu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-14: yid ches par dka' ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-15: kho bo su yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-16: las gang gis 'dir skyes pa yid ches par mi 'gyur bas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-20: bdag cag gis mngon sum kho nar mthong na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-21: ji ltar yid ches par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-22: the tshom ma za bar smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-27: kho bo gang yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-28: las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-29: yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer mnyan yod ces bya ba de na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-30: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba 'dug pa de'i khyim drung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-31: kho bo bzang mkhan byed cing 'dug 'dug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-32: de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed pas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:193b-35: de dag gis de nas lag pa gang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194a-3: rnyed pa thob cing 'dong ba de dag kho bos mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba skyed par byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194a-4: kho bo las des rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194a-5: shing ljon pa 'di la gnas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194a-6: de phyir kho bo'i lag pa g-yas pa shin tu lham me /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194a-10: de dag bkres pas gdungs shing /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194a-12: ji tsam na ha cang thag mi ring ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194a-13: shing ljon pa chen po lo ma sngo zhing snun pa zhig snang nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194a-15: shing ljon pa chen po lo ma sngo zhing snum pa 'di lta bu snang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194a-16: sngar yang bdag cag gis shing ljon pa 'di lta bu kho na las chu grub kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194a-18: gal te na cung zad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194a-19: zhes de dag der dong ste gsol ba gdab bar brtsams pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:194b-1: shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i drung na 'bras chan bre po gang zhig 'dug pa de las zos shing 'thungs nas bza' ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195a-18: kho bo gang yin pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195a-20: yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer mnyan yod ces bya ba de na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195a-21: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed nas ri brag cig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa longs spyod bsrabs nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195a-22: mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195a-24: de las cung zad 'grub par 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195a-26: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195a-28: rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags pa na; des de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195a-30: bdag la zas kyi mgron gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195a-34: rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dong la der zo zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195b-0: da de dang lhan @195b cig 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195b-1: ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lam gar zho'i bum pa zhig rnyed nas des de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195b-18: ci'i phyir khyim pa gzhan dag la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195b-24: khyim pa 'di dag kyang bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195b-25: 'di dag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:195b-28: gal te bdag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong len na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-7: des skom 'thungs te song ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-9: bram ze des de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-17: kho bos dge sbyong go'u ta ma la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-20: gal te re zhig za na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-23: kho bo'i khyim du gnas par mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-24: des dus ma yin par zos nas gso sbyong ral lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-25: ri brag na gnas pa'i bram ze gang yin pa gang gis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs nas dral ba de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-27: kho bos yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs te thams cad ma dral na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-28: kho bo sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-29: kho bos yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs nas dus ma yin par zos te gso sbyong dral bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-30: kho bo rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-31: shing ljon pa 'di la gnas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196a-32: de'i phyir kho bo la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:196b-2: gso sbyong ral zhes bya bar shes so ////
