K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-8: ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-9: mi dang ri dvags tshogs kyis bsten pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-10: chu klung tha dad 'bab par gyur pa dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-11: mtsho mchog bkra shis gtsang ma ngogs bde ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-12: rin chen 'byung gnas rgya mtshor 'bab pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-13: de bzhin bsod nams rgyun kyang rnam kun tu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-14: sbyin bdag gos sbyin zas skom sbyin pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-15: mal cha stan dang gding sbyin mi la 'bab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-16: chu klung chu 'bab rgya mtshor ji bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rang ste mngon par bstod do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:208b-21: ma dad nas des bsam pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209a-30: dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209a-31: 'on kyang de khyim de na dbang med de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209a-32: gal te de la dbang yod par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209a-33: de dge slong rnams la mkho ba stob par byed pas 'di gtsug lag khang du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209a-34: khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209a-35: da ltar bdag gson pa nyid na yang bdag gi gtsug lag khang na dge slong rnams kyi gnas skabs 'di 'dra na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-0: bdag shi na ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam du rig nas dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag @209b 'tshal te rang gi khyim du song nas nang mi rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-2: gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul bzhin longs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-3: de'i tshe na mgu byed bum pa thogs te chu bcu ba'i phyir byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-4: des der ras ma zhig rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyang de la phan gdags pa'i slad du phyogs der gshegs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-5: des bcom ldan 'das la brtag par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis na bza' chos gos kyi gra rdol bar de la bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-8: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi ras ma 'di bzhes su gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-9: bdag gis 'di bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-13: gal te khyod kyis yongs su btang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-15: des bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas nas gus pa bskyed de phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis de de nyid kyi mdun du na bza' chos gos kyi gra glan te btsems pa dang kha dog mthun par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-17: de dad pa skyes nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bran mor ma gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-20: ces smras nas bum ba chus bkang ste khyim du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:209b-21: khyim bdag gdangs can gyis nang mi la tshul bzhin brims pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210a-4: gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul shing longs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210a-5: kho bo la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210a-8: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi yi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210a-9: khyod thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210a-10: ces des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te gus par bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210a-11: khyim bdag gdangs can gyis yang cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham thabs dma' bar bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-7: gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-17: dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod pa de khyim bdag des 'dir las su bskos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-18: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs shig ces bsgo nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-19: da ltar de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-23: khyim bdag gdangs can gyis thos nas shin tu dga' ste khyim du song nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-24: des bu mo mgu byed kyi lag tu lde mig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-25: lde mig kyog po gtad nas nang mi rnams la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-26: khyed cag mgu byed kyis ci byin pa des gnas par gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-27: ko'u shambhi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyang bsdus te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-29: kho bos bu mo mgu byed 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-30: bran mo las phyung ste khyim gyi bdag mor bcug go; zhes bsgrags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:210b-31: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-0: khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal po shar bas gdangs @211a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-4: da ltar du ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-6: 'das pa'i dus na yang khyim bdag gdangs can 'di rgyal po shar pas gdangs las shes par gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-9: sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-10: rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa rgyas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-23: bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-25: ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-27: chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-28: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis rang gi yul du dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste phyogs su bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-29: nga'i yul na gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-30: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-31: ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-33: gang dag la lo bcu gnyis kyi zan bdog pa de dag gis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-35: gang dag la mi bdog pa de dag gis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-37: lo bcu gnyis 'das nas phyir 'ong bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211a-38: de'i tshe na w'a na n'a si na khyim bdag gzungs byed ces bya ba phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-2: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba zhig 'dug pa des mdzod pa bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-4: kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-8: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-9: bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-10: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-11: bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon tan gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-12: ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-13: w'a ra n'a sir phyin nas de dag khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong du phyin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-15: khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu gnyis su mkho ba stob par nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-18: je mdzod pa la rmas te slad kyis gsol lo; ;zhes des mdzod pa pos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-20: kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-21: rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po 'di dag gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-25: khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-30: ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas gzhan lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:211b-31: w'a ra n'a sir phyin nas de dag kyang khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-0: khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la lo bcu @212a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-1: gnyis su mkho ba stob par nus sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-5: ci'i slad du yang sgrub par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-8: kho bo cag kyang gzhan no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-10: je mdzod pa la rmas te slad kyis gsol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-11: zhes des mdzod pa bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-13: kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-14: rab tu byung ba stong gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-18: khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-23: khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-24: sbyin pa'i zhal ta ba'i mi dag dang spyan 'dren bskos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-25: spyan 'dren des nyi ma re re zhing song ste gdugs tshod la 'bod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-26: spyan 'dren des khyi zhig gsos pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-27: nyi ma re re zhing spyan 'dren de dang lhan cig 'gro bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-28: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spyan 'dren de la brel ba zhig byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-29: de je 'di bsgrubs te phyis spyan drang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-30: snyam nas de gzhan du song ba dang khyi des de ma rnyed nas sngon goms pas rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gan du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-31: der yang de ma mthong nas des skad phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212a-32: rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-0: spyan 'dren dus las @212b yol nas khyi 'dis spyan drangs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-5: spyan 'dren 'ongs te khyi des de mthong nas skad de byung bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-8: des na bdag nyid chen po 'di dag byon gor ma chag snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-17: slad kyis kyang gang gi tshe bdag la brel ba 'ga' zhig byung ba de'i tshe na 'di nyid khyed spyan 'dren par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-20: de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag gzungs byed gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-22: de'i tshe de'i dus na mdzod pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-23: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-24: de'i tshe de'i dus na spyan 'dren pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-25: bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-27: khyi gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-28: khyim bdag gdangs can yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-30: de'i tshe yang rgyal po shar pas gdangs las shes par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-31: da ltar yang 'di des gdangs las shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-32: rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du mi stong thub cig 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-33: rgyal pos de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-39: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:212b-41: stong thub la 'tsho ba byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-0: de dag gis de la 'tsho ba byin @213a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-1: no; ;gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dhar byung ba'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-2: ma ga dha ba'i bram ze dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-3: khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-4: des rgyal po'i khab tu dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-5: rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-7: yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-8: nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-9: nga'i yul du gang rkun po byed pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-10: ngas yul med par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-11: brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-15: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdos btul ba de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-16: des kyang mnyan yod du dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-17: nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-18: nga'i yul du rkun po byed pa de ngas gsad par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-19: brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-23: bar du yul ma ga dha na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-24: yul ko sa la na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-25: yul ma ga dha nas don mthun pa gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213a-26: yul ko sa la nas don mthun pa gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-0: thams @213b cad du yul ma ga dha na 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-1: yul ko sa la na 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-3: don mthun 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rgyun chad de rgyal po'i dpya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-5: zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra grags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-6: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de thos nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-7: ru gcig btang na; de bcom zhing rab tu bcom te phyir 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-8: de bzhin du ru gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-10: de yang bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-11: ji tsam na yul ma ga dha nas don mthun yul ko sa lar 'phags pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-12: chom rkun pas 'jigs pas rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te sel ba tshol par byed nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-15: ci'i slad du don mthun gyi sel mi bgyid /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-19: blon po rnams kyis de bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-22: ci'i phyir rgyal po'i bka' bzhin mi byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-24: khyed kyis bsgo ba gang zhig kho bos ma byas nas de skad du spyo bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-26: don mthun 'di yul ko sa lar 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:213b-31: zhes des mda' lnga brgya pa'i dong pa gnyis thogs te shing rtar zhugs nas don mthun gyi mdun du 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-0: @214a *// de don mthun gyi mdun nas 'ong ba thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas de la pho nya btang ste bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-1: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-3: gnod pa thob par gyur ta re zhes zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-5: dpa' bo la dpa' bos yongs su spang ba byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-6: chom rkun pa'i pho nyas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-8: khyod gcig pu dpa' bo yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-9: kho bo cag kyang dpa' bo yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-11: de nas phan tshun mda' khar dgye bar brtsams nas des chom rkun pa'i pho nya'i gnad du bsnun nas de phyir log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-12: de bzhin du chom rkun pa gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-17: drug cu rtsa bzhi nas chom rkun pa lnga brgya'i bar dag lhags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-18: des de dag gi gnad du bsnun nas de dag phyir log go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-19: de bzhin du chom rkun pa gzhan lnga brgya lhags nas des de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-20: ngas khyod kyi chom rkun pa lnga brgya bsad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-21: khyed cag kyang srog gis 'gebs par mi 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-23: chom rkun pa rnams kyis smras pa; nged kyis gcig kyang ma sod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-28: gal te khyed cag yid mi ches na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-29: gang dag ngas bsnun pa de dag gi go phud cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-30: de dag gis go 'bud par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-31: gang gis ji ltar go phud pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214a-32: de ltar dus la bab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-0: zhes byer te dong @214b ngo; ;stong thub mtshams kyi bar na 'dug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-1: de don mthun yul ko sa la nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de'i sel yang byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-2: yum ma ga dha nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de'i sel yang byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-3: des bsam pa; bdag gis ci'i phyir phar 'gro tshur 'gro bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-5: snyam nas des khyim brtsigs te 'dug nas don mthun gnyi ga'i bsti gnas su'ang gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-8: 'brog gnas zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-11: 'brog gnas su don mthun dag lhags nas kha cig gis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-20: ri lu btsong bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-21: chang tshong dag gis kyang chang btsong bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-22: de nyid du 'khod nas der tshong 'dus chags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-23: 'brog gnas kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'phrin yig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-25: bdag gis 'dir tshong 'dus btsugs kyi; lhas 'dir zhal lta ba gtang ba'i rigs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-28: gang du bdag gi ru gsum bcom zhing rab tu bcom zhing 'ongs pa der des tshong 'dus btsugs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-33: ngas tshong 'dus de khyod la byin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:214b-34: der dpya dang lo thang ci 'du ba de dag khyod nyid ci dgar spyod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-2: 'brog gnas zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-3: 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-5: bdag cag gang cung zad bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa de thams cad 'brog gnas kyi mthu yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-6: bdag cag gis 'di la phan pa cung zad bya gor ma chag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-8: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-12: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-14: gang su yang rung ba bag ma gtong ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-16: de 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-17: gos phrugs re yang bskon par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-23: 'brog gnas 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-24: gos phrugs re skon par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-25: ji tsam na mi dbul po zhig bag ma len du nye nas de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-26: bdag la 'brog gnas 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-27: gos phrugs re bskon pa'i 'byor pa ga la yod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-29: bdag gis bag ma de blangs nas dang po kho nar 'brog gnas la dga' mgur spyod du phul la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-30: des dga' mgur spyad nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis spyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-32: de 'brog gnas kyi gan du song ste mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215a-34: bdag bag ma len du nye na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-0: bdag la khyod 'khor dang bcas pa @215b la bshos gsol zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-1: na bza' phrugs re gsol ba'i 'byor pa ma mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-3: bdag gis bag ma de blangs nas dang po kho nar khyod la dga' mgur spyod du 'bul gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-4: khyod kyis dga' mgur spyad nas de'i 'og tu bdag gis spyad par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-7: gang yang rung ba bag ma len pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-8: bag ma gtong ba de thams cad kyis kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa la zan sbyin zhing gos phrugs re skon mi dgos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-9: khyod song la bag yangs su bag ma longs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-14: bud med kyi yul ni; dbang po rnams 'phrog cing don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-15: 'brog gnas kyis dang du blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-16: des kyang bag ma blangs nas dang po kho nar 'brog gnas la phul nas des kyang dga' mgur spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-17: 'brog gnas 'dod pa la 'dod chags kyis lhag par chags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-18: mi de la byams par bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-19: gzhan zhig gis de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-21: khyod la 'brog gnas te bor byams par gyur pa 'di la rgyu ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-22: des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-23: des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-24: gzhan zhig gis de la dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-25: des kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-26: des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-27: gzhan zhig gis kyang de la dris pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:215b-28: des kyang de la ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa nas des kyang de bzhin bya bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-0: de lta bu'i tshul gyis don dam pa ma yin pa'i chos @216a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-2: 'brog gnas kyis tshong 'dus der lha khang rtsig tu bcug nas de na gang yang rung bas bag ma blangs pa des bu mo de lha khang de bskor du bcug nas 'brog gnas kyi gan du gtong zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-3: 'brog gnas kyis de dang por dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-4: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu ma chen po zhig bag mar 'gror nye nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-5: bdag la yang dang por 'brog gnas dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-6: phyis khyim thab spyod par 'gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-7: ci nas kyang 'brog gnas 'di gsad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-8: snyam nas; des ji tsam na phyogs shig tu skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa de logs su kha bltas te sgron mor byung nas gcin rgyang byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-9: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis de mthong nas de dag mi dga' bar sems par gyur te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-10: bu mo ngo tsha dang khrel med pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-11: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs la mdun gyis phyogs te sgron mor byung nas gcig rgyang byed pa 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-13: bu mo des de thos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-14: khyed cag kyang pho yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-17: khyed cag pho ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-19: des khyed kyis chung ma blangs so cog dang por dga' mgur spyad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-20: khyed cag phyis de'i mi gtsang ba 'khru bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216a-23: 'dis bdag cag gnas su spyod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-0: 'di la bdag cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par @216b bya; de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-1: 'di la gzhan sgrub tu ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-4: de ji ltar gsad par bya ba dpyad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-5: zhes de dag de ltar gros byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-6: khyim bdag gzhan zhig gis rdzing bu 'bul ba nye bar gyur nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-8: khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gis rdzing bu 'bul bar nye bar gyur pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-9: der de mgron du bos pa'i tshe gsad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-10: ji tsam na khyim bdag des rdzing bu 'bul ba'i tshe mgron du bos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-11: des kyang dang du blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-12: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste phyogs su bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-13: nga'i yul du dge slong gang la la zhig 'ong bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-14: de gal te nga'i mdzod dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-19: sus mthong ba rang gis byin cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-20: phyis skyin pa nyis 'gyur du sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-21: zhes rtsig yig tu yang bris te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-22: bar du tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-23: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis ma ga dha dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-25: tshong dpon 'brog gnas kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-26: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis ma ga dha dag tu rgyu zhing 'dong ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-27: 'brog gnas su phyin ces thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-28: thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-29: rgyal po gzugs can snying po de bsod nams dag gis ngoms mi myong bas sbyin pa dag sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:216b-31: bdag gis kyang ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-1: mi bya snyam du rig nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-2: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-3: mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gnyis ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-4: de gnyis kyis de la chos bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-5: des de gnyis bsod snyoms la bos te zan byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-7: 'brog gnas g-yar 'dren gyis bos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-8: des yon bshad pa ma mnyan pa kho nar rdzing bu 'bul bar song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-9: 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis kyang brda byas te mtshon thogs nas der dong ste de dag gis 'brog gnas rdzing bur zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-11: zhes 'gyur byed tsha ba mgor blugs nas mig chu 'dzag par gyur te cung zad kyang mi mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-12: de nas de'i steng du 'khor lo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-15: mtshon rtse gcig pa la sogs pa'i mtshon dag 'phang bar brtsams te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-16: de gsod par bshams pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-19: kho bos khyed la nyes pa ci byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-21: khyod kyis kho bo cag gi bag ma dang por dga' dgur spyad cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-22: phyis kho bo cag gis spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-24: khyed cag nyid kyis dam pa ma yin pa'i chos 'di phyung bas 'di la kho bos ci nyes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-26: de dag gis de ltar shags 'debs bzhin du gsad par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-27: des srog dang 'bral khar gnad 'chad ka dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217a-28: tshigs 'grol kar sems bskyed de smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-0: bdag gis @217b 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-1: mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po lha dang mis mchod pa gnyis la bsod snyoms phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-2: bdag gang du 'di dag gsod par 'gyur pa der skye bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-4: chos nyid kyis na mar 'bri ba'i dus kyi tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-5: smon lam log pa btab pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-6: myur du 'grub pa yin pas des smon lam log pa btab ste shi zhing dus la bab nas gnod sbyin gdug pa rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-7: de nas de gnas 'dod pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-12: khyod kyi gnas 'brog gnas de nyid yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-14: de 'brog gnas su 'ongs nas mi ngas phyung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-15: skye bo mang po shi bar gyur nas khri dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-17: 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis ltas pa dag bkug ste bris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-19: gang gi phyir 'di lta bu'i yams byung bar gyur pa 'di la rgyu ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-22: khyed kyis 'brog gnas bsad pa gang yin pa des smon lam btab pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-23: gnod sbyin gdug pa rnams kyi nang du skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-24: des 'di lta bu'i yams phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-25: de dag gis shing rta dang bcas te 'bros par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:217b-27: 'jigs su rung ba chen por bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'bros pa'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-3: bdag cag sdig pa byed pa rnams la bzod pa mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-5: dam tshig gis bzod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-6: gal te nga la nyi ma re re zhing mi stong stong 'bul na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-10: gal te khyod la nyi ma re re bzhin mi stong stong phul na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-11: ring por mi thogs par 'brog gnas 'di mi snang bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-12: dngan dus 'di thong la bdag cag phyag 'tshal ba rnams la bzod pa mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-15: kho bo yun ring po nas smon pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-17: 'brog gnas 'di mi snang bar gyur cig snyam mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-18: 'on kyang kho bo la nyi ma re re zhing mi lnga brgya lnga brgya phul cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-20: de dag gis yang de bzhin gsol nas des kyang mi nyis brgya lnga bcu dang brgya'i bar du phul cig ces smras //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-23: de lta na yang bdag cag nyams par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-25: bdag cag gis khyod la nyi ma re re zhing ba lang drug dang ldan pa'i shing rta zas kyis bkang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-26: de khrid pa'i mi gcig dbul gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-31: khyed kyis du ba dag gis dbul bar mi bya bar bro dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-33: sil snyan gyi sgras dbul bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-34: de dag gis kyang khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218a-35: de nas 'brog na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'dus te gros byas par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-0: gnod sbyin gyi bdag @218b cag gnas skabs de ltar byas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-1: 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-2: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-3: res kyis res kyis dbul bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-5: gang la res bab par gyur pa de la brjod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-8: khyim byang bris te rdza mar bcug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-9: gang gi khyim byang byung ba da 'gro bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-10: des kyang mi tshab ma dag mi gtang bar bdag nyid 'gro bar bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-12: gang la brel ba byung ste ma 'dus pa de la bab na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-13: de'i khyim du khyim byang dpyang ste gzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-14: de'i tshe na 'brog gnas na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa de la bu med nas yun ring po nas kye ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-15: bdag la bu yod par gyur cig ces smon nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-16: stes dbang gis de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-17: chung ma de btsa' ba'i dus kyi tshe khyim bdag de bya ba zhig la phyi rol tu byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-18: de'i nyin mo de la gnod sbyin la gtor ma sbyin pa'i khyim byang byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-19: des res sbron par bskos pa'i mi dag gis de'i khyim sgor dbyangs te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-20: skabs der chung ma de btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-21: ji tsam na khyim bdag de phyir 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-22: des khyim du 'jug khar khyim byang des de mthong nas de sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te khyim du zhugs nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-23: chung mas de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-27: de lta na yang cang mi smra ba kho nar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:218b-28: chung mas de la lan gsum gyi bar du de skad smras kyang cang mi smra ba kho nar 'dug nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-3: khyod yun ring po nas kye ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-4: bdag la bu yod par gyur cig ces smon pa gang lags pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-6: ci'i slad du cang mi gsung bar bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-7: mchog tu dgyes pa skyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-17: gnod sbyin la gtor ma dbul ba'i phyir khyim byang 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-20: khyod kyi sras 'chi bar bas mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-22: khyod la sras mchis par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-25: khrag gi thigs pa yin pas 'di ji ltar gtang bar bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-27: tshogs pas khrims su bgyi ba rnam par bzhag pa las bdag nyid 'gro bar bya ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-31: bdag nyid dang mnyam pa'i sdug pa gzhan ma mchis kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-33: des gal te khyod dga' na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-34: song zhig ces dang du blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-35: de nas khyim bdag gi chung ma des mtshan mo mig lam chad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-39: me tog dag gis mchod pa byas nas kha shar phyogs su bltas te gsol ba gdab par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-40: 'jig rten dge dul zhi ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-41: dbang thul rnams kyis mi stong pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-42: bu yi don du der 'dud kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-43: bdag gi byis pa bskyab tu gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219a-44: de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-2: rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-3: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-4: 'jig rten la phan par bzhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-9: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-10: rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-11: bslab pa gsum la legs par bslab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-12: dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-13: chu bo bzhi las brgal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-14: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-15: bsu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-16: mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-18: 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-19: yan lag drug dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-20: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-21: rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-22: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-23: lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-24: mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-25: stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-26: phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-27: brgya phrag bcur dbang bsgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:219b-29: mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-10: ngan song gi lam nas bslang ste mtho ris dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-13: 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-15: 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-16: 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-17: gang gi sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-19: gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-21: gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-23: yongs su smin pa gang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-24: rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-27: chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-29: sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-31: ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-32: rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'dul ba'i skye bo la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-34: rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-35: kun mkhyen rgyud la lnga ba'i thugs rje yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-36: bzhon ma 'dul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-37: srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-38: rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220a-41: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la bya ba lhag par byas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-0: de la @220b phan gdags par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-1: gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyang gdul bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-2: snyam du rig nas ma ga dha dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas 'brog gnas su byon te 'brog gnas na gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyi gnas su mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-3: de'i tshe na gnod sbyin 'brog gnas gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du bar song bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-5: bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyi gnas su mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-6: mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin 'brog gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas la 'di skad ces smras so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-8: khyed kyi gnas su bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-9: khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-11: mi gyur pa yang bdag gi gnas su mtshan mo gnas par khas len tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-18: de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-19: 'on te ma yin pa shes par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-20: de nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyis gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba zil gyis mnan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:220b-21: rang gi gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces sol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-0: @221a *// gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-1: snyam du dgongs nas slar byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-5: nga rgyal nges par bcom pa'i phyir zhugs so; ;gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyis lan gnyis su yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-9: gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'o; ;snyam du dgongs nas slar byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-13: nga rgyal nges par bcom pa'i phyir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-14: gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyis lan gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-18: gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-19: snyam du dgongs nas slar byung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-23: nga rgyal nges par bcom pa'i phyir zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-24: gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin 'brog gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-29: khyod kyis nga lan gsum gyi bar du gnas su spyan drangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-33: de'i phyir khyod la dri ba dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-34: dri ba lan gdab pa des gal te kho bo'i sems rangs par byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221a-36: gal te sems rangs par mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-2: kha nas khrag tsha ba skyug pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-3: lag pa gnyis nas bzung ste chu klung skal ldan shing rta pa'i pha rol gyi 'gram du 'phang bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-6: ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-10: bram ze'i skye rgu dang bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-12: mi dang bcas pa'i nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-13: gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems g-yeng ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-15: zhal nas khrag tsha ba skyug pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-16: phyag gnyis nas bzung ste chu klung skal ldan shing rta pa'i pha rol gyi 'gram du 'phen pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-19: ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-20: de nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-22: gang dang ji ltar du dang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-23: gang zhig rgal dang ci yis rgal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-24: 'di ni skyes pa'i nor mchog gang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-25: ci zhig legs spyod bde spyod 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-26: ro rnams nang na mngar mchog ci //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-29: dad pa skyes bu'i nor mchog yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-30: chos la legs spyod pa de spyod 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-31: bden pa'i ro rnams mngar mchog yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-32: shes pas 'tsho na mtsho mchog bstan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-34: ji ltar grags dang ldan par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-35: longs spyod ldan par ji ltar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:221b-36: ji ltar snyan pa thob 'gyur zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-3: tshul khrims kyis ni grags ldan 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-4: sbyin pas longs spyod ldan par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-5: bden pas snyan pa thob par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-6: snying rjes mdza' bshes rnyed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-10: du zhig gis ni 'jig rten bkur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-18: gdugs mtshan g-yel ba ma mchis pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-20: dmigs med rten pa ma mchis pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-23: rnam kun tshul khrims ldan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-24: legs mnyam bzhag cing shes rab ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-25: nang du sems shing dran ldan pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-26: shin tu brgal dka' 'di las brgal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-28: gzugs kyi kun sbyor mthar gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-29: de ni dmigs med rten med pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-33: ci zhig gis ni rgya mtsho rgal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-34: ci yis sdug bsngal spong bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222a-35: ci zhig gis ni yongs dag 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis @222b bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-2: bag yod pas ni rgya mtsho rgal //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-3: brtson pas sdug bsngal spong 'gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-4: shes rab kyis ni yongs dag 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-5: bden dul gtong ba ma gtogs pa'i; ;chos gzhan 'ga' zhig yod dam zhes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-6: dge sbyong bram ze so so la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-7: gzhan dang gzhan du khyod dris shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-9: dge sbyong bram ze so so la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-10: ci slad gzhan du bdag 'dri bgyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-11: 'di ltar dpa' chen khyod kyis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-12: chos 'di legs par rab tu bshad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-13: kye ma gnod sbyin bong bu pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-14: gang gis ded dpon bla na med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-15: sangs rgyas bdag la bstan gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-16: khyod la kho bos byas pa gzo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-17: 'di nas kho bo grong nas grong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-18: khyim nas khyim du rdzogs sangs dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-19: chos kyi chos nyid bzang po la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-20: 'dud bzhin du ni spyad par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin 'brog gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-23: khyod kyis dge slong sh'a ri'i bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-24: mo'u 'gal gyi bu gnyis la zan byin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-25: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar bya ba las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-26: khyod kyis smon lam log par btab pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-27: gnod sbyin gdug pa rnams kyi nang du skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-29: lag pa khrag gis gos pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-30: nyams pa dang rab tu nyams pa la zhen pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:222b-32: gzhan gyi srog spyod pas 'tsho bar byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-3: bdag gis ci bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-6: khyod nga'i spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-7: bslab pa'i gzhi dag longs la 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la mi 'jigs pa byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-9: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su mchi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-10: bslab pa'i gzhi dag len cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-11: deng slan chad 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la mi 'jigs pa stsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-12: des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-13: bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-14: des bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs nas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-15: kye ma ston pa bdag don du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-16: sdum par yang dag gshegs gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-17: bdag gis de ring phyi ma yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-18: don ni rab tu shes par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-19: de nas khyim bdag des ba lang drug dang ldan pa'i shing rta zas kyis bkang ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-20: khye'u de yang shing rtar bcug nas bro dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-22: rol mo'i sgras gnod sbyin gyi drung du 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-24: khyim bdag kha cig gis thos nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-32: khrag gi thigs pa de gnod sbyin gyi gan du khyer ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-33: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'dus te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223a-35: khrag gi thigs pa 'dis gnod sbyin mi mgu bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-0: gdon mi za bar @223b gnod sbyin 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-1: bdag cag thams cad la gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-3: zhes de dag gis de ldog par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-6: tshogs kyis khrims su bya ba bcas pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-8: bu gtang bar bya'i zhes byung bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-12: de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod do; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis gro dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-14: rol mo'i sgra de gsan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-15: gsan nas kyang gnod sbyin 'brog gnas la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-21: bdag dam pa ma lags pa'i chos sdig pa de las slar log kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-22: skye bo dag gis da dung de bzhin du 'dzin par bgyid na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-23: ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi ma 'tshal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-27: des ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-31: skom longs la mi yang ma len /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-35: bdag gi zan tha ma 'di bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-37: khyim bdag des khye'u de shing rta nas phyung ste gnod sbyin la byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-38: gnod sbyin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la phul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:223b-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang pha la stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i @224a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-2: byis pa gang tshe gnod sbyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-3: lag nas nga yi lag tu thob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-4: nga yi lag nas pha yi lag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-5: de yi phyir na lag brgyud yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-6: de'i ming lag brgyud ces bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-7: khyim bdag des de khyer te 'brog gnas su song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-8: skye bo'i tshogs kyis mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-11: khrag gi thigs pa de khyer te 'ongs pa las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-12: gor ma chag par 'dis gnod sbyin 'khrugs par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-16: bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de'i gnas su mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis de btul te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-18: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag nas des 'brog gnas na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la mi 'jigs pa byin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-20: de dag shin tu dga' ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-21: khye'u 'di skyes ma thag tu gnod sbyin 'brog gnas btul bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-22: khye'u 'di'i ming lag brgyud 'brog gnas zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-23: zhes de'i ming lag brgyud 'brog gnas zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-24: de chen por gyur nas yi ge dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-26: sgyu rtsal gzhan dag la yang shin tu mkhas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224a-27: gang gi tshe sngo sangs can mgo bsgyur ran par gyur pa de'i tshe na de slong ba rgyal po dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-5: gzhan yang mang po dag lhags par gyur nas khyim bdag gdangs can 'di snyam du mang po dag sngo bsangs can slong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-6: gang dag la ma byin pa de dag bdag gi dgra bor 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-7: snyam nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-8: sngo bsangs can gyis de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-10: khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de sems khong du chud cing bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-13: khyod slong ba rgyal po dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-20: gzhan yang mang po dag lhags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-21: gang dag la khyod ma byin pa de dag nga'i dgrar 'gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-22: kho bo ji ltar lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug tu rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-25: gal te de lta na mi dgyes par ma mdzad cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-26: deng nas gdugs bdun na ngan bu rang gis gnas btsal bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-30: 'on kyang re zhig lha la zhu bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-31: zhes de bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-33: deng nas gdugs bdun na sngo bsangs can rang gis gnas tshol bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:224b-36: des nga ma gtogs pa gzhan su zhig la gnas tshol bar 'gyur snyam nas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-1: blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-3: grong khyer mdzes par byed du chug la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-4: deng nas nyi ma bdun na sngo sangs can rang gis gnas tshol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-6: blon po rnams kyis grong khyer de rdo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-8: gyo mo med par rnam par bzhag nas tsandan gyi chus chag chag btab ste bdug spos dri zhim po'i snod nye bar bzhag nas dar gyi chun po dpyangs te rgyal mtshan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-9: ba dan bsgrengs nas me tog sna tshogs bkram ste lha'i skyed mos tshal dga' ba'i tshal ltar dga' bar 'gyur bar byas nas dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-10: ko'u shambhi na gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-11: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang yul tha dad pa dag gnas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-12: deng nas nyi ma bdun na sngo bsangs can rang gis gnas 'tshol bar 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-13: de'i phyir khyed cag gis 'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin 'du bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-15: de nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag 'dus par gyur pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-16: nyi ma bdun pa la sngo bsangs can rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te shing rta la zhon nas me tog phreng gi chun po thogs te phyir byung nas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs la brtags par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225a-17: bad sa'i rgyal po shar ba 'di snyam du 'dis gor ma chag par bdag gi steng du me tog phreng gi chun po 'phen par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-0: snyam @225b nas sems bsdus te bag yod par rtog cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-1: sngo bsangs can gyis kun tu skye bo'i tshogs la rnam par bltas nas dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-3: glang po che'i rgyab tu zhon pa 'di dag gang gang yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-6: rgyal po gzugs can snying po'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-12: bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-13: de bzhin du nor can dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-19: gzhan yang mang po thams cad so sor dris nas de'i 'og tu smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-21: lag brgyud 'brog gnas zhes bya ba gang yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin las thar par byas pa de 'dir shog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-23: skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-27: des de'i phyogs su kha bltas te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-28: de bdag gi khyim thab yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-29: zhes me tog phreng gi chun po 'phangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:225b-37: gzhan yang mang po 'dus pa dag phyir phyogs te rang rang gi yul du dong ngo; ;khyim bdag gdangs can bag tsha zhing yid mi bde nas sngo bsangs can la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-0: gal te khyod kyis lag brgyud 'dam pas kho bo la rgyal po dag gnod pa byed par gyur @226a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-7: khyim bdag gdangs can gyis de bzhin pa bzang po sbyar te rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas 'khor dang bcas te 'brog gnas su btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-8: de'i skabs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-11: rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-12: 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-17: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-18: rig pa gsum gsal bar mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-19: bslab pa gsum la legs par bslab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-20: dul ba'i gnas gsum gyi gzhi la mkhas pa; chu bo bzhi las brgal ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-21: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis spyod pa'i gzhi la legs par gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-22: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongs su sbyang ba mdzad pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-23: mi 'jigs pa bzhis bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-25: 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-26: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-27: rtag tu gnas pa drug gis gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-28: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226a-29: lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-0: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas @226b pa; stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-1: phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-2: brgya phrag bcur dbang bsgyur ba las khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyi chos nyid ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-4: mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-25: ngan song gi lam nas bslang ste mtho ris dang thar pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-27: 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba gang gi lag nas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-29: 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbyig dang bral ba gang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-30: 'phags pa'i nor gyi dbang phyug la gzhag par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-31: gang gis sangs rgyas 'byung bas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-33: gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma bskyed pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-35: gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-37: yongs su smin pa gang ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-38: rnam par grol bar bya zhes mkhyen pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-41: chu srin gnas kyi dug can pa; ;dus las 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-42: sangs rgyas gdul la byams pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-44: ji ltar ma ni bu sdug gcig pu la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:226b-45: rtog cing de srog srung bar byed pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-0: @227a *// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang gdul ba'i skye bo la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-1: rtog par mdzad cing de srog srung bar mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-2: kun mkhyen rgyud la mnga' ba'i thugs rje yi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-3: bzhon ma 'dul ba'i be'u tshol mi skyo ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-4: srid dang ngan 'gros nyams la byams pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-5: rab nyams be'u la byams pa'i ba bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-7: gal te lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis bden pa ma mthong bar sngo bsangs can mthong bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-8: bden pa dag gi gnod du mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-9: de la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'brog gnas su 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-11: ma ga dha dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-12: 'brog gnas su byon nas 'brog gnas su mtshan mo ba lang gi lam du rtsva bting ba la gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-18: lam gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi dag gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-19: bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo ba lang gi lam na rtsva bting ba la gnas par zhal gyis bzhes pa mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-20: mthong nas kyang myur ba myur bar lag brgyud 'brog gnas gyi gan du dong ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-22: gang gis khyod gnod sbyin las thar par mdzad pa'i bcom ldan 'das de 'brog gnas su byon nas mtshan mo ba lang gi lam na rtsva bting ba la gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227a-23: lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-0: gal te sangs 'gro bar bya @227b na; bcom ldan 'das gzhan du gshegs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-2: snyam du rig nas myur ba myur bar 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-3: ji tsam na sgo chod do; ;de'i skabs su sngo bsangs can yang sgo drung du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-4: des kyang nang du ma chud de sgo drung du mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-5: nam nangs nas lag brgyud 'brog gnas myur ba myur bar kho nar shing rta la zhon te 'brog gnas nas phyir byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-6: sngo bsangs can yang shing rta la zhon te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-7: nang du 'jug pa na lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-9: sngo bsangs can gyis kyang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-10: khyod kyi shing rta zur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-12: gcig shos kyis kyang ma bzur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-13: sngo bsangs can gyis brtags te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-14: khyod lag brgyud 'brog gnas yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-16: kho bo skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-17: lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis kyang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-18: khyod kyang sngo bsangs can yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-20: bdag skye bo dag gis de ltar shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-21: lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-22: kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-24: khyod kyang re zhig khyim du song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-25: sngo bsangs can gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-26: skyes bu dam pa'i gan du song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:227b-27: ces sngo bsangs can gyi shing rta mtha' gcig tu bzur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-0: lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag @228a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-1: gis so sor kun dga' bar bya bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-2: bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bde bar gzims sam zhes so sor kun dga' bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag brgyud 'brog gnas la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-5: 'jig rten na gang dag bde bar nyal bar byed pa de dag gi nang na nga yang 'ga' zhig yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-7: dog sa sra zhing ba lang gi rtsid pa'i gzhi can du ras srab mo'i gdan bshams shing dgun smad kyi dus kyi tshe tshes brgyad kyi bar la 'od ma 'gas pa'i bser ma dag ldang la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-8: khyod kyi na bza' ngur smig 'di dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-9: srab pas sku yongs su gdung bar bgyid kyang bcom ldan 'das /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-12: gang dag bde bar nyal bar byed pa de dag gi nang na nga yang 'ga' zhig yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-15: de'i phyir khyod nyid la dri'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-16: khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-21: khyim bdag gi bu phyug pa; nor mang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-22: longs spyod che ba 'ga' zhig yod par gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-23: de'i don du khang bzang rtsig tu bcug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-24: khang bzang der khang pa brtsegs pa de rtsig tu bcug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-25: khang pa brtsegs pa der khri shur bus blas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-27: stan nang tshangs can bting ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228a-31: su mtshan gyi gos kyi steng g-yogs bting ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-0: @228b steng nas bgo ba'i gos dang bcas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-1: gnyis su rgyab rten dmar por bzhag pa bshams shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-2: til mar gyi mar me mtshan thub btsugs nas chung ma yid du 'ong ba zhig 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-3: dga' mgur spyad par bya pa'i phyir nye bar bzhag na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-6: mi de'i mal bcas pa bde ba'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-10: 'jig rten na gang dag bde bar mchis nyal ba de dag gi nang na mi de 'ga' zhig lags snyam bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-14: mi de lta bu'i bde ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-15: de lta bu'i yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa de la 'dod pa las skyes pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-16: zhe sdang las skyes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-17: gti mug las skyes pa'i yongs su gdung ba dag skye zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-18: yongs su gdung ba de dag gis yongs su gdungs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-19: mi de sdug bsngal bar nyam zhing bde bar mi nyal ba'i 'dod pa las skyes pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-21: gti mug las skyes pa'i yongs su gdung ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su mkhyen cing rtsa ba nas bcad de ta la'i mgo bzhin du mi snang ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-23: phyis kyang mi skye ba'i chos nyid du mdzad pas de'i phyir nga de skad ces 'jig rten na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-24: gang dag bde bar nyal ba de dag gi nang na nga yang 'ga' zhig yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-27: bram ze mya ngan yongs 'das pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:228b-28: gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-2: rnam kun bde bar nyal ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-4: snying gi rim nad bsal gyur ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-5: nyer zhi zhi ba thob pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-6: sems kyis bde bar nyal ba yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das lag brgyud 'brog gnas la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-8: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-9: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-10: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus sngar mdzad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid gang yin pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-13: tshul khrims kyi bka' mchid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-14: mtho ris kyi bka' mchid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-15: 'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-16: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-19: rab tu dben pa'i phan yon dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-20: rnam par byang ba'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-21: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de sems rangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-24: sems la sgrib pa med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-25: yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa kun shes pa'i skal ba dang ldan zhing mthu yod par gzigs pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-27: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-30: lam dag rgya cher ston pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229a-35: bsgyur du rung ba tshon du bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-0: @229b tshon legs par 'dzin par 'gyur ba de bzhin du lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis kyang stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-4: lam mngon par rtogs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-5: de nas lag brgyud 'brog gnas chos mthong ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-8: chos kyi gting sleb pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-9: so ma nyi las brgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-10: the tsom las brgal ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-11: ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-12: gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-15: mngon par zhugs pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-18: mngon par zhugs pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-21: chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-22: bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-23: deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas mngon par dad pas skyabs su mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-24: de nas lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-26: bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob ste bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-28: bdag deng kho na sngo bsangs can gyis btsal cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-29: bdag gis deng kho na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-30: 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:229b-31: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-0: sdo bsangs can yang ji ltar @230a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-1: khas blangs pa bzhin zas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-2: gos kyis mkho ba stobs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-4: 'jig rten gyi chos nyid yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-5: de nas lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rang gi khyim du song nas des sngo bsangs can la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-7: kho bo deng kho na khyod kyis btsal na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-8: kho bos kyang deng kho na bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-9: bslab pa'i gzhi dag blangs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-10: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-11: de'i phyir gal te khyod 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-15: zas dang gos kyi mkho ba bstab par bya'o; ;des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-16: gal te song bar gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-17: skye bo dag lag brgyud kyis 'di bkra mi shis par rig nas ma blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-20: sangs rgyas kyi sras yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-21: 'di nyid la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dir 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230a-22: snyam nas de de nyid du 'dug go /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230b-3: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230b-4: bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230b-5: bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230b-6: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230b-14: lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyi lus sa la mi thogs shing thim par gyur te; 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230b-18: thal ba'i steng du blugs pa mi thogs shing thim par 'gyur ba bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:230b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas la bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231a-1: gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231a-3: lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyi kha dog gi mthus /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231a-4: 'brog gi nags mchog thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231a-17: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dzambu'i gling na 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231b-1: lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas bdag cag la chos gang dang gang ston par 'gyur ba'i chos de dang de bdag cag gis mnyan nas de lta de ltar bsgrub par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231b-3: bdag cag la yun ring po'i don dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231b-8: lus zhig nas mi gdung ba'i lha'i ris su skyes par gyur /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231b-25: bsnyen bkur bgyid pas lan 'ga' yang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231b-26: ngoms shing phyir spong ma myong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231b-27: 'phags pa'i chos rnams yang dag blangs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231b-28: ser sna 'dul la brtson gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231b-29: chos gsum chog mi shes pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:231b-30: lag brgyud mi gdung skyes par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232a-0: @232a *// de nas lha'i bu lag brgyud 'brog gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232a-1: rjes su yi rang ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'chal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232a-2: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin 'brog gnas las dri ma can dang phral te skyabs su mchi ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232a-5: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bkod pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232a-8: da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232a-19: 'khrug pa dag las yongs su grol zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232a-22: mkhyen pa dang shes bya thams cad la mnga' brnyes pas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas las dri ma can dang phral te skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232a-23: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag pa 'di la ngo mtshar ci che /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232b-1: bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bzhag ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232b-4: sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'i si na ded dpon dpa' chen zhes bya ba phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232b-7: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232b-8: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232b-12: ji tsam na srin po spu ral can de bram ze'i cha lugs su mngon par sprul nas lam kar 'dug ste ded dpon dpa' chen la smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232b-21: de skad ces smras pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232b-24: je kho bo la rgol la phyis song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:232b-25: de nas ded dpon dpa' chen gyis shin tu 'jigs su rung ba de mthong nas gzhu rna drung du thug par bkang ste mda' dag 'phang bar brtsams pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:233a-23: dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:233a-26: dpa' chen khyod dang 'dra ba yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:233a-27: gang zag med par bdag gis shes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:233a-28: khyod kyi mthu yis tshong ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:233a-29: bde legs su ni 'dong la rag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:233a-30: 'byung po kun la snying brtse ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:233a-31: ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:233b-3: ded dpon dpa' chen gang yin pa de ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:233b-27: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:234b-14: des rnyed pa 'dod pa'i phyir rgyal po la bya gag phul ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gnod sbyin gyi gtor mar byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:234b-15: phyis 'gyod pa skyes nas thar par byas shing smon lam btab pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:234b-16: nga 'di thar par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:234b-17: ngas 'di gnod sbyin las thar par byas so //
