K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244a-23: de nas kun tu rgyu ma dus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244a-24: bdag gi bu mo dam pa gzugs ldan zhing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244a-25: dar bab brgyan pa 'dod pa don gnyer ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244a-26: khyod la 'bul ba 'di la khyod gzigs shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244a-27: mkha' la dgung zla smin drug mjal ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244a-28: 'di dang lhan cig legs par khyod dgyes mdzod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244a-30: gal te ngas dpe med ma la rjes su chags pa'i tshig brjod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-0: dpe med ma 'dod chags kyis @244b gdungs te dus byed par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-1: bdag gis 'di la khong khro ba'i tshig brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-2: snyam du rig nas tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-3: bram ze nga yi bdud kyi bu mo ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-4: sred ma dga' byed de bzhin dga' mo dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-5: pham byas 'dod pa dag la lan 'ga' yang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-6: nga yis 'dun pa'i sems bskyed ma gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-7: bshang dang gci bas gang ba 'di la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-8: rkang pas reg par spro ba'ang mi bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-9: ma dus tshigs su bcad pa gsol pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-10: bdag gi bu mo yan lag nyams gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-11: 'dod ldan yon tan bral bar gzigs sam ci //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-12: ji slad 'dod spyod yid 'ong gzugs dag la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-13: 'dun drag bgyid ltar 'di la khyod mi mdzad //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-15: bram ze rmongs pa gang zhig yul 'dod pa; ;de ni khyod kyi bu mo 'di sgrub cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-16: yul la chags shing khro bar zhugs gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-17: 'di la rab rmongs skye bo chags bral min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-18: nga ni sangs rgyas thub gtso mnga' bdag ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-19: nga yis byang chub bla med zhi ba rnyed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-20: ji ltar padma chus mi chags pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-21: chags pa med pa nyid du 'jig rten rgyu //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-22: autpa la sngon po rdzab dang chu nang na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-23: rdzab dang chu yis gos pa med pa ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-24: bram ze de bzhin nga yang 'jig rten na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-25: 'dod pa dag la rnam grol sems kyis spyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:244b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyi bshang pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-0: gci ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad pas 'dus pa @245a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-1: dang bral te yid mi bde bar gyur nas de'i 'dod chags kyi kun nas dkris pa gang yin pa de med par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-2: zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa skyes pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-3: rus pa dag sbom por gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-4: mig gnyis kyang mching bu lta bur gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-5: de'i tshe na rgan zhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'dug par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgan zhugs des 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-8: kun tu gzigs pa bud med blang mdzad de //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-9: bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag la stsal du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-10: dpa' bo bdag gis dregs pas brgyan pa 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-11: ci nas rjes su mthun par spyad par bgyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-12: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis rgan zhugs de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-14: mi gti mug can nga'i mdun na ma 'dug par phar song zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-15: des khros te tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-16: khyod kyi lhung bzed 'di dang chos gos 'di //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-17: 'khar ba ril ba 'di yang zad gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-18: bslab pa 'di yang ji ltar ma ma yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-19: phang par gzhon nu 'dzin ltar rang srel cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-21: de skad ces smras nas bslab pa phul te nyams pa'i phyir zhugs nas kun tu rgyu ma du ga la ba der song ste phyin nas kun tu rgyu ma du la 'di skad ces smras so; ;ma du /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-22: dpe med ma kho bo la byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-25: khyod la blta ba yang mi sbyin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-26: reg pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245a-27: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-0: rgan zhugs de kun tu @245b rgyu ma du la 'di lta bu'i kun nas dkris pa skyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-1: des khrag tsha ba skyugs nas dus la bab ste sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-3: bam po don drug pa; dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis dpe med ma rnyed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-8: da ltar du ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-10: 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di rnyed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-14: sngon byung ba ri brag cig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-15: lcags mgar zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-17: dga' mgur spyod par byed do /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-20: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la dus gzhan zhig na sems can zhugs par gyur nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-23: mdzes pa zhig byung nas des bsrings shing bskyed de chen mor gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-25: bdag gis bu mo 'di su la yang rigs kyi phyir yang mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-26: gzugs kyi phyir yang mi sbyin nor gyi phyir yang mi sbyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-28: gang bdag dang bzo mnyam pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:245b-29: lhag pa de la bdag gis 'di sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-0: ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u zhig slong mo'i don du de'i khyim du zhugs @246a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-2: bu mo des zas khyer te phyir byung ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-3: bram ze'i khye'u des mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-8: bdag gis pha ji skad zer ba dang sbyar na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-9: des bdag su la yang sbyin par dka'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-10: khyod kyi pha ji skad zer /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-11: bdag gi bu mo 'di su la yang rigs kyi phyir yang mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-12: gzugs kyi phyir yang mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-13: nor gyi phyir yang mi sbyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-14: 'di ltar gang bdag dang bzo mnyam pa'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-15: lhag pa de la bdag gis 'di sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-17: khyod kyi phas bzo ji lta bu shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-18: khab gang chu'i steng na 'phyo ba de lta bu shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-19: bram ze'i khye'u des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-21: bdag 'di don du mi gnyer mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-23: snyam nas de mkhas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-25: las kyi gnas de dag nas lcags mgar gyi mgar spyad dag brnyes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-26: khab gang dag chu'i steng na 'phyo ba de lta bu dag brdungs shing khab sbom po gcig brdungs nas de'i mig tu khab phra mo bdun bcug na de dang lhan cig chu'i steng na 'phyo ba brdungs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-27: de de dag brdungs nas lcags mgar de'i khyim du 'ongs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-29: khab su nyo zhes byas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-30: bu mo des mthong nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-31: grogs po khyod ni smyos pa'am //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-32: 'on te sems med gyur pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-33: gang phyir lcags mgar khyim du khyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246a-34: khab dag tshong du 'ongs par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-0: des kyang tshigs su bcad pa dag @246b smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-1: bzang mo kho bo smyos pa min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-2: sems med gyur pa'ang ma yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-3: nga rgyal bcag par bya ba'i phyir //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-4: kho bos bzo dag nye bar bsgrubs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-5: gal te kho bo'i bzo 'dra ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-6: khyod kyi pha yis shes gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-7: khyod dang nor gyi rnam pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-8: mang po gzhan yang sbyin par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-10: khyod kyis bzo ji lta bu shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-11: khab gang dag chu'i steng na 'phyo ba de lta bu dag shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-14: bzo bo'i bu zhig mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-18: lcags mgar gyi chung mas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-19: khyod bzo bo ji lta bu shes /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-23: bzo bo'i khye'u 'di bzo 'di lta bu 'tshal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-27: des chus snod bkang ste phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-30: de bzhin du khab gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-31: gsum pa nas bdun pa'i bar du bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-33: des khab sbom po de bcug na; de yang 'phyo bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-34: yang der khab gcig bcug ste bcug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-35: de lta na yang 'phyo bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-36: de bzhin du khab gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-37: gsum pa nas bdun pa'i bar dag bcug ste bcug na; de lta na yang 'phyo bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:246b-39: 'di bdag pas bzo ches lhag pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-0: snyam du rig nas bu mo de rgyan thams cad kyis klubs te @247a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-1: lag pa g-yon pas bzung nas lag pa g-yas pas ril ba bhing gar thogs te bram ze'i khye'u de'i mdun du 'dug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-3: khyod la kho bos bu mo 'di chung mar sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-5: kho bo 'di don du mi gnyer te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-7: kho bo khyod kyi nga rgyal bcag par bya ba'i phyir bzo nye bar bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na lcags mgar gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-12: kun tu rgyu ma du 'di yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-13: de'i tshe de'i dus na lcags mgar gyi chung ma gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-14: bur ma 'di yin no; ;de'i tshe de'i dus na lcags mgar gyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-16: de'i tshe yang ngas dpe med ma 'di rnyed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-18: da ltar yang ngas 'di rnyed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-19: ma blangs so; ;yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-21: rgan zhugs 'di dpe med ma la brten nas tshul ma lags pas sdug bsngal par gyur pa la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-24: da ltar du ma zad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-25: 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dpe med ma la brten nas btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247a-28: sngon byung ba rgyal po'i pho brang seng+ge lta bu na rgyal po sengge'i ral pa can gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-3: skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-12: bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-14: ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-15: chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-16: de'i tshe na rgyal po'i pho brang sengge lta bu na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-17: ded dpon seng+ge zhes bya ba phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-20: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-21: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-22: rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-23: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-25: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-28: dga' mgur spyod pa de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-29: bud med kyi yul mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can la la ma 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-31: skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-32: dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-33: mngal na gnas pa zhugs pa shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-34: gang las mngal na gnas pa de zhugs pa shes pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-35: khye'u shes shing bu mo shes pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-37: dku g-yas par brten cing 'dug la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-38: gal te bu mo yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-39: dku g-yon par brten cing 'dug pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:247b-40: de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-3: bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-5: bdag gi dku g-yas par brten cing mchis pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-7: de yang yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-8: kho bo yun ring nas mngon par 'dod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-10: kho bo dang mthun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-11: kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-12: gsos pas phyir gso ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-13: bgo skal la spyod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-14: kho bo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-15: bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung ngu'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-16: mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin pa dag byin zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-17: bsod nams dag byas nas 'di de gnyis gang du skyes bar 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-18: ces ming gi yon bshad pa byed par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-19: ces ched du brjod pa ched du rjod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-20: de la sems can zhugs par rig nas 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-21: mngal na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs par grang pa na grang ba'i yo byad dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-22: dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-23: sman pas bcas pa'i zas ha cang mi kha ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-24: ha cang mi skyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-25: ha cang lan tshva mi che ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-26: ha cang mi mngar ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-27: ha cang mi tsha ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248a-28: ha cang mi bska ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-0: bska ba rnam par spangs pa'i zas dag @248b dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-3: rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par spyod pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-6: shod kyis gzhir ma 'bab pa dang de sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par gnod pa med pa nyid du rim gro byed du 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-7: de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-12: mgo gdugs lta bu dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-16: sna'i gzengs mtho ba zhig byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-17: de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-18: de'i nye du dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-20: ded dpon sengge'i bu yin pa de'i phyir khye'u'i ming singga la zhes bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-21: zhes de'i ming singga la zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-22: khye'u singga la ma ma brgyad po bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-23: nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-24: dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-25: rtsed grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-26: de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-31: gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:248b-33: rdzing na gnas pa'i padma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-0: gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa @249a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-7: gzhag pa la nye bar zhugs nas de yi ge'i mthar phyin cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-12: brtag pa brgyad po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-13: rin po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-17: glang po che brtag pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-20: skyes pa brtag pa la mkhas par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-21: phas de'i chung ma'i 'khor gsum po rab dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-23: tha ma dag rnam par bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-24: 'dug pa'i gnas gsum po dgun gyi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-25: dpyid kyi dang; dbyar kyi dag byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-26: skyed mos tshal gsum po dgun gyi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-28: dbyar gyi dag byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-29: de steng gi khang bzang gi gzhir gtogs pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-30: skyes pa med par sil snyan gyis rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-32: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-33: des dus gzhan zhig na pha la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-35: bdag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-38: re zhig kho bo la nor gyi rnam pa mang du yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-42: rgya sran la sogs pa la spyod pa bzhin du rin po che dag la spyod par byed kyang de ltar na yang kho bo'i longs spyod srab pa nyid dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-44: yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249a-45: de'i phyir ji srid du kho bo gson pa de srid du khyod rtse bar gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-0: dga' mgur spyod par gyis la kho bo 'das pa @249b pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-2: de yang dang yang du smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-4: bdag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-5: des gdon mi za bar dus kyis 'chu bar shes nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-8: ji ltar khyod kyis 'jigs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-9: 'jigs su rung ba dag bzod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-10: des rgyal po'i pho brang sengge lta bur dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-11: rgyal po'i pho brang sengge lta bu na gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-12: yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i tshong pa shes ldan dag nyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-13: ded dpon singga la rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-14: khyed cag las gang ded dpon singga la dang lhan cig sho gam med pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-16: gru btsas med par rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'dod pa des rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i zong sta gon gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-18: tshong pa lnga brgyas rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i zong sta gon byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-19: de nas ded dpon singga las pha ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-20: gzhan yang snying du sdug cing 'brel ba'i rtsa lag dag la bltas nas nyi ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-25: bde legs su 'gyur ba byas nas shing rta dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-31: bong bu mang po dag gis rgya mtsho chen por 'gro ba'i zong khyer te tshong pa lnga brgya'i 'khor dang lhan cig 'phags so; ;de mthar gyis grong dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-35: rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu tshong rdal dag la rnam par lta zhing 'gro ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:249b-36: rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du phyin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-1: pa lnga brgyas gru sbyar nas zho shas 'tsho ba lnga po stob par byed pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-5: rlung yor thogs pa dag khrid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-6: lan gsum dril sgrog pa byas te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-7: de nas tshong pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-9: bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du dong ba rnams la 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-10: phan tshun bde ba nyid kyis nges par rgal ba shes par dka'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-11: bdag cag nor sgrub pa dag gis so so so so dag nas phongs pa'i don du chur rkyal ba dag thogs te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-14: shal ma la'i spang leb dag bkur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-16: sngas shing bal can dag bkur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-22: de nas nor sgrub pa de dag gis de ltar so sor brtags nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-23: so so so so dag nas phongs pa'i don du chur rkyal pa kha cig gis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-24: shal ma la'i spang leb dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-26: sngas shing bal can dag kha cig gis ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-29: ra rkyal dag khyer te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-30: de dag rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du dong ba na chu srin nya'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gru bcag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-31: de dag rgya mtsho'i gru bcag pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-32: so so so so dag nas phongs pa'i don du chur rkyal ba khyer te 'ongs pa dag la zhon te 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250a-34: shal ma'i spang leb dag la zhon //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-0: @250b sngas shing bal can dag la zhon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-2: ku ba'i gzings dag la zhon /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-4: ra rkyal dag la zhon te chu'i steng na 'phyo'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-5: de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pas byang phyogs nas rlung langs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-6: des de dag lho phyogs kyi lam du bdas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-7: zangs gling na srin mo khrung khrung gzhon nu ma zhes bya ba dag 'khod pa de dag tshong pa gru chag pa rnams la gtam snyan pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-8: dga' ba'i tshul gyis slu bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-9: de dag la rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i gnas dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-10: phongs pa'i gnas dang mthun pa gnyis yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-11: ji tsam na dga' ba'i gnas dang mthun pa'i rgyal mtshan g-yo bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-14: dga' ba'i gnas dang mthun pa'i rgyal mtshan g-yos pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-15: dzambu'i gling pa'i tshong pa dag gis rgya mtsho'i gru chu srin nya'i rigs kyis gru bcag ste 'ong gor ma bcag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-17: zhes de dag gis rgya mtsho'i 'gram du btsal bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-18: ji tsam na skye bo phal po che'i tshogs chur rkyal ba sna tshogs dag gis rkyal zhing 'ong ba mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-19: mthong nas kyang bdag nyid gzugs bzang mor mngon par sprul nas rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan te lha'i gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-20: phreng ba rgyus klubs nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram nas 'bod par brtsabs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-23: bdag cag khyim thab ma mchis pa rnams kyi khyim thab mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:250b-24: bdag po ma mchis pa rnams kyi bdag po mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-2: gling ma mchis pa rnams kyi gling mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-3: skyob pa ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyob pa mdzod ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-4: skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-5: dpung gnyen ma mchis pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-7: khyed kyi zas kyi gnas dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-10: gnas mal gyi gnas dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-11: kun dga' ra ba dga' bar 'gyur ba dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-12: nags tshal dga' bar 'gyur pa dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-13: rdzing bu dga' bar 'gyur ba dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-14: dzambu'i gling pa'i rin po che mang po 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-18: man shel dkar po dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-25: g-yas su 'khyil ba dag lags kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-27: bdag cag dang lhan cig rtse ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-29: dga' mgur spyod par mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-30: khyed cag las 'ga' yang shin tu myos par gyur kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-31: lho lam du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-33: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-35: skyes pa la bud med kyi gzugs ji ltar chags par 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251a-36: rgyags par 'gyur ba dang 'dod par 'gyur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-0: kun @251b tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs gzhan gcig kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-2: de dag srin mo de dag gis brjod pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-3: rgya mtsho chen po las brgal te de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-5: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-6: de dag de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-8: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa dag la brten pa'i rgyu las bu dang bu mo dag kyang byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-9: de nas ded dpon singga la 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-10: ci'i phyir bud med 'di dag lho lam shin tu srung bar sems /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-11: bdag bud med 'di dang lhan cig nyal zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-12: de gnyid log pa dang lam du zhugs par rig nas khad kyis dal bu dal bus mal chen po las babs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-13: ral gri rnon po mchan du bcug nas lho lam du 'gro'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:251b-16: ral gri rnon po mchan du bcug nas lho lam du song ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:252a-2: des de na lcags kyi grong khyer chen po 'phang mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:252a-3: tha gru che ba zhig mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:252a-4: de grong khyer de la sge'u chung 'ga' zhig yod dam snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:252a-5: kho ra khor yug tu byul na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:252a-6: des grong khyer de'i khor khor yug tu byul ba na grong khyer de la tha na byi la 'dzul ba tsam gyi sge'u chung yang ma rnyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:252a-7: de'i byang phyogs kyi ngos na shing ljon pa shi ri sha chen po 'phang mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:252a-8: tha gru che ba dag yod nas de shing ljon pa shi ri sha chen po 'phang mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:252a-9: tha gru che ba de la 'dzegs te skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de la 'di skad ces smras so; ;shes ldan dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:252a-10: khyed ci'i phyir kyi hud pha /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263a-9: de nas rig sngags smra ba dag gis rig sngags dag gis phab nas 'phong gi slob dpon dag gis phal cher bsad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263a-10: lhag ma rnams kyis rgyal po singga la'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263a-14: dam tshig gis bzod par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263a-15: gal te khyed cag gi grong khyer 'di phyung ste gzhan du 'dong zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263a-16: nga'i yul du gnod pa 'ga' yang mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263a-21: de dag gis grong khyer de dag phyung nas gzhan du dong ste 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263a-22: rgyal po singga las kyang der grong khyer brtsigs nas rgyal po singga las gnas bcas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263a-24: singga la'i gling zhes bya ba'i ming du gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263a-26: de'i tshe de'i dus na ded dpon singga la gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263a-28: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po seng+ge ral pa can gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263a-30: de'i tshe de'i dus na srin mo gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-0: de'i tshe yang dpe med ma 'dis 'di'i btsun mo 'khor dang @263b bcas pa tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar byas la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-1: da ltar yang 'dis 'di tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-2: kun tu rgyu ma dus dpe med ma khrid de ko'u shambhir 'ongs nas skyed mos tshal zhig na 'dug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-3: skyed mos tshal srung ba'i mis rgyal po shar pa la sbran pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-7: mdzes pa zhig skyed mos tshal na mchis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-10: rgyal pos thos nas skyed mos tshal du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-13: dbang po rnams 'phrog pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-14: mthong ma thag tu chags par gyur nas des kun tu rgyu ma du la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-18: bdag gi bu mo lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-21: su la yang ma stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-22: nga la ci'i phyir mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-25: rgyal pos bag mar blangs te btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bcug nas de la khang bzang me tog gi so'i phyed kyang byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-26: bsnyen bkur ma lnga brgya yang byin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-27: nyi ma re re zhing dri dang phreng ba rgyu'i rin karsha pa ni lnga brgya lnga brgya yang byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-28: kun tu rgyu ma du yang blon po'i mchog tu bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-29: de'i tshe na bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa la blon po'i mchog gsum yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-33: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bad sa'i rgyal po shar ba'i gan du mi zhig 'ongs nas rgyal pos dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-38: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-40: snyan smra la 'tsho ba byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:263b-41: de dag gis de la 'tsho ba byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-1: na yang rgyal po'i gan du mi zhig 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-2: rgyal pos de la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-6: bdag mi snyan smra lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-7: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-9: mi snyan smra la 'tsho ba byin cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-12: gal te na lhas mi snyan pa gsan par 'gyur yang dag pas 'di la 'tsho ba mi stsal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-15: rgyal po'i bya ba dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-18: de dag gis de la yang 'tsho ba byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-19: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-20: bad sa'i rgyal po shar ba btsun mo sngo bsangs can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-21: dpe med ma dang lhan cig 'dug pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-22: de na rgyal po sbrid pa byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-23: sngo bsangs can gyis sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-25: dpe med mas lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-30: dge sbyong go'u ta ma la phyag 'tshal ba la gzigs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-34: sngo bsangs can dge bsnyen ma yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-35: los kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma la phyag 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-36: de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-37: des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-39: gang gi tshe lha sngo bsangs can dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-40: kho mo dang lhan cig dben pa na zhugs pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-41: khyod kyis them skas nas khar phor rbab tu thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-43: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gang gi tshe de dag lhan cig 'dug pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264a-44: them skas nas khar phor rbab tu btab pa na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-18: nyi ma gnyis pa la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-19: dpe med ma'i gan du zan za'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-20: dpe med mas bya ba la bsgo ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-22: bya bas gang gi nyin mo rgyal po sngo bsangs can gyi gan du zan za ba de'i nyin mo rgyal po la gong ma sreg gson po phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-24: dpe med ma la gtod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-25: dpe med mas thos nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-27: bdag gi res ma lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-28: sngo bsangs can gyi res lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-31: song la sngo bsangs can la gtod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-32: des sngo bsangs can la phul te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-33: lha'i don du g-yos mdzod cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-37: kho mo srog gcod par mi byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-39: des rgyal po'i gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-41: sngo bsangs can gyi mchid nas ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:264b-43: kho mo srog gcod par mi byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-2: dpe med mas mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-4: gal te de la dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i slad du g-yos gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-6: da tsam 'khor dang bcas te g-yos bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-8: de ltar 'gyur ba snyam zhes mi de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir g-yos gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-14: dpe med mas lkog tu sod la phul cig ces bsgo nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-15: des bsad de sngo bsangs can la phul nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-16: lha'i zhal nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir g-yos gyis shig ces byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-17: sngo bsangs can 'khor dang bcas pas g-yos bya bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-18: bya bas song ste rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-20: sngo bsangs can 'khor dang bcas pas g-yos bgyi bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-21: dpe med mas smras pa; lhas gsan tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-22: gal te srog gcod par mi bgyid na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-23: dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i slad du yang mi bgyid la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-24: lha'i slad du yang mi bgyid pa'i rigs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-25: dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i slad du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-26: bgyid la lha'i slad du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-27: mi bgyid pa de ji lta bu zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-28: rgyal po khros par gyur nas gzhu bkang ste 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-34: sngo sangs can la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-35: lha shin tu khros nas gzhu bkang ste 'ong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-37: des rang gi 'khor la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265a-39: khyed cag thams cad byams pa la snyoms par zhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-0: de dag thams @265b cad byams pa la snyoms par zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-1: rgyal pos gzhu rna drung du thug par bkang ste mda' 'phangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-2: de la ma phyed du ltung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-4: de phyir log ste rgyal po'i drung du ltung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-5: mda' gsum pa 'phang bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-6: sngo bsangs can gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-9: khyod thams cad kyi thams cad du ma mchis par 'gyur ba ma mdzad cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-10: rgyal po skrag ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-23: klu mo yang ma lags gnod sbyin mo yang ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-24: dri za mo yang ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-25: mi'am ci mo yang ma lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-26: lto 'phye chen mo yang ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ma phyir mi 'ong ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-31: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi drung nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-32: bud med lnga brgya po 'di dag gis kyang bden pa dag mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-33: rgyal po mngon par dad par gyur nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-34: khyod la dam pa ci zhig sbyin par bya ba smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-36: gal te lha bdag la mngon par dad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-37: gang gi tshe lta btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du gshegs pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-38: bdag la sring mo'i 'du shes nye bar zhog cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-42: rgyal po de dpe med ma dang lhan cig rtse ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:265b-44: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa nyams su myong bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-1: can la chos kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dad pa skyed par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-2: de la lo thog gsar pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-4: dus tshigs gsar pa gang dag 'grub pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-5: dang po kho nar sngo bsangs can la 'bul bar byed do /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-7: phrag dog gi rang bzhin can yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-10: bdag dang lhan cig rtse ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-13: 'di la lo thog gsar pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-15: dus tshigs gsar pa gang dag 'grub pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-16: dang po kho nar sngo bsangs can la 'bul bar byed pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-17: gang gis sngo bsangs can 'di gsod par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-18: snyam nas de gsad pa'i phyir klan ka tshol zhing de lhur len zhing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-19: ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa'i ri brag pa zhig log nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-20: des der ru gcig btang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-21: de bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste 'ongs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-22: de bzhin du ru gnyis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-24: de yang bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste 'ongs nas blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-26: nyams shing ri brag pa'i dpung ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-28: gal te lha rang nyid ma gshegs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-29: de phebs dka' bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266a-30: des ko'u shambhir dril sgrog pa byed du bcug ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-0: zhes bsgos te de nas @266b 'phags so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-16: des kyang phyi bzhin skyel bzhin du lha /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-18: bdag kyang lha nyid dang thabs cig mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-19: zhes lan gsum gyi bar du gsol kyang rgyal pos ma gnang nas des khas blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-20: ma du dpe med ma'i gan du song ba dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-28: snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-30: sngo bsangs can bdag gi cir 'ong mkhyen tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-35: bud med kyi yul la chos gang shin tu gnod pa mkhyen tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-45: bdag la mgo gnyis mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-46: rgyal pos lan gsum gyi bar du sngo bsangs can la mkho ba stobs shig ces bka' stsal gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-47: khyod kyi ming yang ma smros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:266b-51: bu mo'i don du pha la cung zad 'tshol ba su yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-0: rgyu med par yang de la byams @267a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-2: de'i phyir gal te je de gsod na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-7: rgyal po de bud med kyi dbang du song ba yin pas de ltar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-8: snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-10: gyi na de bzhin du gsad par mi nus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-12: thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-16: des sngo bsangs can la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-18: ci bgyi ba bka' stsal cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-23: bu mo 'di dag mtshan mo me mar la sangs rgyas kyi bka' klog pas der gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-32: zhes des mang po sbyor du bcug ste nang du bskyal nas sgo khang du phung por bcer te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-33: sngo bsangs can gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-39: slan chad yang dang yang du 'jug tu mi stsal bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-40: zhes des 'jug tu bcug nas gro ba'i khur phyi mar me bcug ste 'jug tu bcug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-41: me 'bar ba des sgo khang la mched nas ko'u shambhi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis me gsod du rgyugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-43: ral gri shubs nas phyung ste khyed cag ci'i phyir rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'jug par 'dod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267a-45: ces skye bo'i tshogs phyir bzlog par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-0: 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon gyis smras @267b pa; kho bos sgo khang la me mched pa 'di 'khrul 'khor gyis gnas gzhan du spo bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-1: ma dus de yang de ji bzhin du phyir bzlog go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-2: sngo bsangs can rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la gyen du 'phags te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-4: bdag cag gis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-6: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-7: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-8: bdag cag gis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-10: bar snang rgya mtsho'i nang dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-11: ri yi sul du zhugs gyur tam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-12: gang du gnas na las rnams kyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-13: mi tshugs 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-14: ces gsungs pas bdag cag la las de gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-16: tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-17: bdag gis rtsig dos dkar khung nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-18: bcom ldan 'das ni mthong gyur te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-19: sangs rgyas kyi ni bstan pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-20: bden pa dag na kun shes byas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-21: de dag phye ma leb bzhin du gyen du mchong zhing mchong zhing mer lhung bar gyur to; ;de na sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-24: chu'i stor khung nas bros so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-25: ma dus bud med lnga brgya po de dag gi ro dur khrod du bor nas rgyal po'i pho brang nang dang phyi rol dang bcas pa'i phyir dor byas te ko'u shambhi na gnas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-26: yul tha dad pa nas lhags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs du ma dag bzlog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:267b-27: de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268a-2: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ko'u shambhi ra bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268a-3: dge slong rab tu mang po dag ko'u shambhir bsod snyoms la rgyu bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268a-4: bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa ljongs su song ba'i btsun mo'i 'khor sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya tsam mes tshig ces thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268a-5: thos nas kyang ko'u shambhir bsod snyoms rgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji ltar longs spyod pa'i gnas mkhos su phab ste rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268a-7: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268a-9: 'di na bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268a-11: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ko'u shambhir bsod snyoms la zhugs na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268a-13: bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po ko'u shambhir bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dag gis bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa ljongs su mchis pa'i mchis brang gi 'khor sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya tsam zhugs kyis dral ces thos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-0: gang gis bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa ljongs su song ba'i btsun mo'i 'khor sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya tsam mes bsregs pa'i mi @268b gti mug can des bsod nams ma yin pa mang po bskyed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-3: mi gti mug can des bsod nams ma yin pa mang po bskyed mod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-5: 'bras bu med par dus la bab pa ma yin no /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-7: btsun mo'i 'khor de na bud med gang dag gis tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas rdzus te skyes shing der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-9: yang 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can de lta bu'i bud med dag btsun mo'i 'khor de na yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-10: btsun mo'i 'khor de na bud med gang dag gis kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-12: zhe sdang dang gti mug bsrabs pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-13: lan gcig 'jig rten 'dir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bud med dag kyang btsun mo'i 'khor de na yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-14: btsun mo'i 'khor de na bud med gang dag gis kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas rgyun tu zhugs pa log par mi ltung ba'i chos can /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-15: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par gzhol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-16: re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa lan bdun lha dang mi rnams su mtshams sbyar nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i bud med dag kyang btsun mo'i 'khor de na yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:268b-17: btsun mo'i 'khor de na bud med gang dag rang gi srog gi phyir yang bslab pa dag las 'da' bar mi byed pa de lta bu'i bud med dag kyang btsun mo'i 'khor de na yod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-0: btsun mo'i 'khor de na bud med gang dag nga la sems dad pas dus @269a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-1: byas shing lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams kyi nang du skye ba de lta bu'i bud med dag kyang btsun mo'i 'khor de la yod pa'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-4: sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgya po dag gis ro ga la ba der 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-7: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po dag dang thabs cig bud med lnga brgya po de dag gi ro ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-10: bud med lnga brgya'i ro 'di dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-11: gang la bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa chags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-17: lhag par chags shing 'dug pa dag yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-19: 'di dag la rkang pa dag gis reg par yang su zhig byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-20: tshigs su bcad pa yang bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-21: 'jig rten snying po med brel la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-22: skal ldan gzugs bzhin lta bar byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-23: byis pa nyon mongs bcings gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-24: mun pas yongs su bskor ba dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-25: dam pa min la dam par lta //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-30: ka ba tshig pa gang yin pa la yang sems rab tu sdang bar mi bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269a-31: rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-1: khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-3: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dag 'dus te gros bya bar btsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-5: rgyal po la gnod pa 'di lta bu byung na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-6: bdag cag las gang gis rgyal po la brjod par bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-7: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-8: mi snyan smra gang yin pa de brjod du gzhug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-13: zhes de dag gis de bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-14: lha la mi snyan pa 'di go rim bzhin du gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-16: de'i tshe khyed cag na re /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-17: ci phyir mi snyan smra la 'tsho ba sbyin par bya zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-19: khyed cag nyid kyis gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-21: de'i don nyid du khyod la 'tsho ba byin pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-22: gzhan su zhig gsol bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-25: dam tshig gis gsol bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-26: kho bo ci zer ba de bzhin gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-30: go rim 'di ltar gsol bar bya ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-36: gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:269b-39: khang bzang me tog so dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:270b-0: de nas mi snyan smras blon po rnams la yi ge spring @270b ste; rgyal po la gnod pa 'di lta bu byung ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:270b-1: kho bos thabs 'dis brjod par bya'o //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:270b-5: rgyal po shar pa la 'phrin yig 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:270b-8: yul ga ge mo zhig gi rgyal po ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:270b-27: 'jal gyi; de la 'phrin yig 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:270b-28: kho bo'i ri brag pa zhig log pa ma phebs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:270b-29: khyod kyis je kho bo'i grogs gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:270b-30: kho bos kyang phyis khyod kyi grogs bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:270b-32: blon po rnams kyis de la 'phrin yig de skad ces bris te bskur ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:270b-33: des 'phrin yig bklags nas bklags ma thag tu ri brag der 'ongs te de dag thag mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271a-7: phyir thob par mi rung gi /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271a-14: bdag gi bu 'chi bdag gis 'phrog ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271a-15: lhas bdag gi grogs gyis shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271a-16: bdag de dang lhan cig g-yul sprod par byed do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271a-21: bal glang mo lnga brgya dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271a-25: gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271a-37: des ri mo brkyang ste rgyal pos ri mo brtags nas gnad du bsnun pa dang 'dra bar gdung bzhin du smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-2: bdag ni rgyal po ma lags rgyal srid min //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-4: mi snyan don 'di khyod la gsol slad du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-5: bdag 'dir khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-6: rgyal pos shin tu brtags nas 'di ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-20: rnam par dpyad nas smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-26: lha nyid de skad gsung ngo; ;kva'i nang rje /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-27: khyod kyis ngal thabs kyi sa gsol bar zad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-29: ngas khyod kyi mgo drungs nas bcad de sa la bsgyel bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-30: zhes smras nas rgyal po sa la bsgyel to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-31: de nas chus btab pas dbugs phyir byung nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-33: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go skon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-35: blon po rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas rgyal po ko'u shambhir 'phags te mthar gyis ko'u shambhir phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-36: des pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams kyi nang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:271b-37: ches rgyus mkhas pa thams cad la rmas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-3: song la ma du rgya skyegs kyi khang par chug la sregs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-4: dpe med ma yang rte'u ma thul ba'i rkang pa la thogs la 'or cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-5: sbyor ba 'dzin gyis ma du rgya skyegs kyi khang par bcug ste bsregs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-8: gal te rgyal pos bsam nas dpe med ma 'on cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-11: re zhig sdod cig snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-12: des dpe med ma sa khang du bcug ste bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-13: rgyal po nyi ma bdun pa la mya ngan sangs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-14: des mya ngan sangs pas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-19: bdag gis rte'u ma thul ba'i rkang pa la btags te bor ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-24: khyod kyis kyang dpe med ma bsad kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-25: da nga rab tu dbyung bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-28: de nyid kyi slad du bdag gis dpe med mas khang du stsal te bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-31: des de sa khang nas phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-32: gnas skabs de kho na bzhin du nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-34: rgyal pos mthong nas bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-35: ji ltar 'di gnas skabs de kho na bzhin du nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-38: zas kyang mi za ba las na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-39: gor ma chag par skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272a-40: snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-5: bdag de lta mi bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-8: khyod bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-13: dge sbyong go'u ta ma zhes zer la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-17: ro dang 'dra ba khyod kyi phyir bcom ldan 'das la mi zhu'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-18: sngo bsangs can gyi don du bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-19: zhes de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-20: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la bad sa'i rgyal po shar pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-22: sngo bsangs can la sogs pa bud med lnga brgyas las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-25: chab kyi gtor khung nas bros par gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-28: de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-30: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-31: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-32: de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-34: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-35: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:272b-38: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-1: las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-4: skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-5: las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-6: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-7: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-10: sngon byung ba grong khyer w'a ra n'a si na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-11: rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa rgyas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-21: mu ge dang; nad dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-23: bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-25: ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-28: chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-29: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-30: bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-31: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-32: bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-33: ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na w'a ra n'a sir phyin nas skyed mos tshal zhig na spyil bu na gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-34: rgyal po tshangs byin gyi btsun mo'i 'khor lnga brgya skyed mos tshal der byung nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273a-35: btsun mo'i 'khor de dag rtse mo'i rdzing du khrus byas nas grang bas sprebs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-0: de na btsun mo dam pas bu mo mngag gzhug ma @273b la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-2: shin tu grang bas sbrebs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-3: song la spyil bu 'di la me thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-4: des sgron me sbar te song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-5: rang sangs rgyas de mthong nas des btsun mo'i mchog la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-7: 'di na rab tu byung ba zhig mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-9: rab tu byung ba 'dug kyang rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-12: des ma btang bar bros pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-13: de nas btsun mo'i mchog de 'khrugs nas de rang gis me btang ba dang; rang sangs rgyas de phyir byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-14: btsun mo'i 'khor gzhan dag gis kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-16: khyod kyis zhugs btang ba legs pa bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-17: bdag cag thams cad zhugs bde'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-18: zhes rjes su yi rang ba byas so; ;rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-19: btsun mo'i 'khor nyon mongs ma 'di dag ha cang rmas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-20: nyams par gyur na mi rung gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-21: 'di dag la lag nas drang ba sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-22: snyam nas des dang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang pa ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-25: glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so; ;so so'i skye bo ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-26: rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtod par byed pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-27: btsun mo'i 'khor de dag shing ljon pa rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa'i drung du 'gyel nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-28: yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mar gshegs su gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:273b-30: nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag cag gi sug pa nas drang ba stsal du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-1: mo'i 'khor de dag la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' las shod du babs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-2: de dag gis de la mchod pa byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-3: bdag cag yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i cha dang mthun par ma gyur par mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-4: thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-7: de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po tshangs byin gyi btsun mo dam pa gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-9: de'i tshe de'i dus na bud med gzhan bzhi brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu po gang dag yin pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-10: bud med gzhan bzhi brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu po 'di dag yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-11: de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo mngag gzhug ma gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-13: de dag gis rang sangs rgyas kyi spyil bu bsregs shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-14: rjes su yi rang ba byas pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lo mang po dag tu sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su bsregs nas da ltar bden pa mthong gi bar du yang mes tshig par gyur to; ;sgur mchog me gtong du ma btub pas ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-15: da ltar chu'i stor khung nas bros par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274a-16: de dag gis rang sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-0: da @274b ltar nga'i drung du bden pa mthong bar byas shing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-1: de dag gis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-4: las gcig tu nag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-5: gcig tu nag pa yin la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-6: las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-7: las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smrin pa yang 'dren ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-10: las gcig tu nag pa rnams dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-11: 'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste; rgyal po chen po /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-12: khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-13: de nas bad sa'i rgyal po shar pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-16: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-18: sgur mchog gis las ci bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:274b-24: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275a-3: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275a-6: rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275a-9: mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275a-18: rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya bas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275a-32: bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275a-34: ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275a-36: chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyi rgyal srid byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275a-37: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275a-38: rgyal po tshangs byin gyis w'a ra n'a sir dril sgrog par byed du bcug ste 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275a-39: gang la lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod pa de ni gnas par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275b-0: gang la med pa de @275b ni; gzhan du 'gro bar bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275b-1: lo bcu gnyis 'das nas phyir yang 'ong bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275b-3: de'i tshe w'a ra n'a si na khyim bdag gzungs byed ces bya ba phyug pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275b-6: yongs su bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275b-7: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275b-8: rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des mdzod pa bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275b-10: kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:275b-14: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-8: khyed cag la gsol lags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-9: ci'i slad du yang sgrub par mdzad /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-15: zhes des mdzod pa bos te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-17: kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-18: rab tu byung ba stong po 'di dag gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-21: des rab tu byung ba gzhan lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-25: de dag kyang de na 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-26: des sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste des sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i mi dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-28: der nyi ma re re zhing rang sangs rgyas stong stong zan za'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-29: de nas rang sangs rgyas gcig na bar gyur nas de de'i nyin mo ma 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-30: khyim bdag gzungs byed la bu mos smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276a-32: deng rab tu byung ba gcig ma mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276b-0: des rgyab btud @276b de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276b-5: khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:276b-7: 'dis rang sangs rgyas la mtho brtsams pa gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sgur por gyur to //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:277a-0: khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis sbyin gnas rang sangs rgyas stong po de dag @277a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:277a-1: nyid kyi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:277a-3: de lag pa 'dar pas zan za ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:277a-4: lhung bzed mgul nas gzungs byed kyi bu mo des /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:278b-1: la rgyu zhing rgyal rigs kyi bu mo de'i khyim du zhugs pa na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:278b-3: rgyal rigs kyi bu mo des mthong nas /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:278b-6: 'phags pa 'di la bsod snyoms phul cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:278b-10: snying du sdug cing 'brel ba'i rtsa lag dag la ma phul gyi bar du dge sbyong mgo reg 'di la ga la sbyin /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:278b-20: bdag gis 'di la bsod snyoms dbul lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:278b-21: des de la bsod snyoms phul nas smon lam log pa btab ste /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:278b-26: de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu mo gang yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:278b-28: 'dis rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms phul nas smon lam log pa 'di skad ces /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:278b-30: 'jig rten pha rol tu yang rnam par smin par ma gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-0: ces btab pa gang yin pa'i @279a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-1: las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di nyi ma bdun du zan med par sa khang du bcug cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-2: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-3: lus ma rnying par phyung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-4: dus gzhan zhig na mgu byed rgyas par gyur nas des 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe smon lam btab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-5: bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag khyim bdag gdangs can gyi chung ma'i mchog gi mngal du skye zhing sngo bsangs can gyi chu zheng ci 'dra ba de lta bur bdag kyang gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-6: bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa bdag gi khyim thab tu gyur cig ces btab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-7: de shi zhing dus la bab nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyi chung ma'i mchog gi mngal du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-8: gang gi nyin mo skyes pa de nyid kyi nyin mo khyim de dpal dag gis snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-10: dgu 'das te btsas pa las bu mo gzugs bzang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-13: byung ma thag tu yang des pha'i khyim rgya cher dpal dag gis snang bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-14: de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas nyi ma bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279a-15: nye du rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-0: gang gi phyir bu mo 'di gang gi nyin mo ma'i mngal du zhugs pa de nyid kyi nyin mo khyim de dpal dag @279b gis snang bar gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-1: btsas pa na yang 'dis pha'i khyim rgya cher dpal dag gis snang bar gyur pa de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming dpal ldan du gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-2: zhes de'i ming dpal ldan zhes bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-3: gang gi tshe de smra shes par gyur pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-4: dge slong gang dag khyim der bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de dag gi gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas snyun gsol bar byed do //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-8: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-15: kha na ma tho ba me mchis sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-16: bde ba la reg par gnas sam /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-26: kha na ma tho ba med /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-27: bde ba la reg par gnas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-28: des smra ba'i tshig thos nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyi nang mi dag mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:279b-29: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280a-17: gang gi tshe dpal ldan pa chen mor gyur pa de'i tshe na de slong ba; rgyal po dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280a-24: gzhan yang mang po dag 'ong bar brtsams so; ;khyim bdag gdangs can 'di snyam du /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280a-26: gang dag la ma byin pa de dag bdag gi dgrar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280a-27: snyam nas de lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280a-28: dpal ldan gyis de mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280a-30: khyod ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad de sems khong du chud cing bzhugs /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-0: khyod slong @280b ba rgyal po dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-6: gzhan yang mang po dag 'ong ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-7: gang dag la ma byin pa de dag bdag gi dgrar 'gyur na; ji ltar lag pa la 'gram pa gtad de sems khong du chud cing mi 'dug tu rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-11: bdag gis khyim thab 'tshal lags so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-19: go rim ji lta bu lags /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-22: gang gi tshe des bshos gsol ba de'i tshe na khyod steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi na 'dug pas pho long 'phang par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-26: des bad sa'i rgyal po shar pa khyim gzhan du mgron du bos te zan zos pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-27: dpal ldan steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi na 'dug pas pho long 'phangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-28: rgyal pos steng du brtag par brtsams pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-35: sngo bsangs can ma lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-39: sngo bsangs can gyi nu mo dpal ldan zhes bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-43: su la yang ma stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:280b-45: nga la ci'i phyir mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-0: khyim bdag gdangs can gyis byin nas pad sa'i rgyal po @281a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-1: shar pas dpal gyi 'byor pas bag mar blangs te btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-2: dus gzhan zhig na des rgyal po la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-4: bdag dge slong mthong bar 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-7: dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang du mi 'jug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-10: bdag rnam pa thams cad du btson rar stsal du bas mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-11: gal te dge slong mthong bar ma gnang na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-12: deng slan chad 'tshal ma yang mi 'tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-14: des zan gcad pa la zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-15: rgyal pos khyim bdag gdangs can la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-17: khyod so sor mi rtog gam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-20: dpal ldan zan gcad pa la zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-24: dge slong dag rgyal po'i pho brang du mi 'jug go; lha /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-25: 'o na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-27: de'i phyir khyod kyis bdag nyid kyi ming gis ra bar dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drangs te bar du sgo thod la bshos gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-28: khyim bdag gdangs can gyi khyim rgyal po dang 'dab chags su 'dug pas des ra ba'i bar du sgo btod nas sa'i byi dor byed du bcug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281a-29: de nas de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-0: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag gdangs can la chos dang ldan pa'i @281b bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-1: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-2: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-3: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-4: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-7: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo; ;de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-8: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-9: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-10: sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-12: de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo; ;de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo bza' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-14: bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams nas chu ra bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:281b-18: da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes spyan drangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:282a-0: @282a *// tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:282a-3: rdzas las byung ba na bzhugs shing bsod snyoms mngon par bsgrubs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:282a-4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
