K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-1: sos ka'i tsha ba'i dus la bab pas sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa tsha bas gdungs pas bsil pa 'dod pa zhig phyogs der bskyil te nyal ba dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-2: ji tsam na dge slong de lam gyis dub pas yur bar brtsams nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-3: de'i lus yud tsam yud tsam zhing 'chog pas khri yang sgra rtseg rtseg zer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-4: sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-6: des gdengs ka byas te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-7: ji tsam na yang de lus 'chog cing khri sgra rtseg rtseg zer nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-8: des de'i dpral bar bzung ste spyod lam de nyid kyis shi zhing dus la bab nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris bzang po rnams kyi nang du skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-9: de'i gan du lha'i bu mo dag lhags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-10: des se gol gyi sgras de dag phyir bzlog nas de dag lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gan du dong ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-12: 'di na lha'i bu skyes nas ring po ma lags pa zhig skyil mo krung bcas te mchis nas bdag cag de'i drung du mchis pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-13: des se gol gyi sgras bdag cag slar bzlog go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-18: de'i mdun du me long zungs shig dang dran pa rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-19: de dag gis de'i mdun du me long bzung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-20: des bdag nyid dpung rgyan dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:291b-23: rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-0: de nas des de dag 'dod par @292a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-4: bdag cag de bzhin du bsnyen bkur mi byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-5: gang lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phyag 'tshal ba de la bdag cag bsnyen bkur byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-7: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa'i dri nga ba med pa la phyag byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-8: da ji ltar lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa'i longs spyod can la phyag 'tshal snyam du rig nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-10: gang gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phyag 'tshal bar mi byed pa de lta bu'i thabs 'ga' yod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-13: gang na lha'i drang srong dag tshangs par spyad pa spyod cing 'khod pa de dag gi nang du gang tshangs par spyad pa spyod par byed pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-14: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la phyag mi 'tshal te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-15: lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyid de la phyag 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-16: de dag gi nang du zhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-17: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-18: ji ltar de lha'i drang srong gi nang du zhugs te tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa thos nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin de'i gan du song ste phyin nas rkang pa la phyag 'tshal de song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-19: de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu de 'di snyam du sems te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-20: gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-21: bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-22: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-23: bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292a-24: bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-0: @292b bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-2: de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g-yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te do shal dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-3: sen mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i autpa la dang; padma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-5: padma dkar po dag gis thub bkang ste kha dog shin tu 'das pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-6: mtshan mo la bab pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-7: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-9: 'di ltar sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-10: de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bus bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-11: rmongs pa zhes bgyi tshal de ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-12: lha mo'i tshogs kyis kun bsgrags shing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-13: sha za mo bzhin yongs bskor ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-16: drang po zhes bya'i lam de nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-17: 'jigs med phyogs zhes bya ba der //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-18: sgra med ces bya'i shing rta ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-19: chos kyi rtogs pas bskyod gyur pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-20: de yi dmigs pa ngo tsha shes //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-21: dran pa de yi 'khor yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-22: kha lo sgyur ba shes rab yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-23: sna 'dren yang dag lta zhes bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-24: skyes pa'am bud med gang la'ang rung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:292b-26: de 'dra'i bzhon pa zhon gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-5: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas dge slong lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtog par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-6: des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-8: bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-11: lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-12: sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-13: dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-16: rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-17: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-19: rus pa'i ri dag las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-21: ngan song gi sgo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-23: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-29: lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-30: zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-32: khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-33: ngan song shul bkag bsod nams rab ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293a-34: mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-0: mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang @293b thob par gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-1: shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-2: de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-3: go 'phang zhi ba 'phags pa dgyes thob ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-4: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol brgal bar gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-5: 'gro ba lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-6: skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-7: srid pa stong du mthong ba rab dkon pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-8: thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-9: de nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-10: zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-11: dgra thul g-yas nas yongs su bskor byas te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-12: lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-13: de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-14: tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-15: zhing pa lo thog 'byor pa lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-16: dpa' bo g-yul las rnam par rgyal ba lta bu dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-17: nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa lta bur gyur te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-18: cha lugs gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i cha lugs de nyid kyis rang gi gnas su song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-19: ji tsam na mtshan mo nam nangs nas khang skyong gis sgo phye ste phyags ma thogs nas sgo khang phyag par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-20: skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa mthong nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-25: khyod kyang sngar bsam gtan byed pa yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-27: des de'i lag pa gnyis nas bzung ste bsgul bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-28: ji tsam na dus la bab par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:293b-29: des 'di ci zhig gis dus la bab ces brtag par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-1: na khri 'og na sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa 'dug pa mthong nas des sdangs te dge slong rnams kyi gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-3: dge slong sgo khang du nyal pa gang yin pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-4: sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pas bzung ste dus la bab po //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-5: dge slong rnams kyis de dur khrod du bskyal te bsregs nas phyir lhags pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-6: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-8: nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba de thams cad dge slong dag khri dma' ba la mal 'cha' zhing de'i mdun du rkang pa gnyis 'khru ba las gyur pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-9: snyam du dgongs nas bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-11: dge slong gis khri dma' ba la mal bca' bar mi bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-12: khri'i mdun du rkang pa gnyis bkru bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khri dma' ba la mal bca' bar mi bya zhing khri'i mdun du rkang pa gnyis bkru bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-14: zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong gzhan dag la mchil lham mi bdog pa de dag la gnod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294a-15: gang dag mchil lham mi bdog pa de dag gis mgo logs dang rkang pa'i logs su rkang pa gnyis bkru bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-0: drug sde dag gis dge slong khri dma' ba la nyal ba sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pas zin te @294b dus la bab nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis khri dma' ba la mal bca' bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-1: zhes bkag pa thos nas de dag gis khri rkang pa khru bcu gnyis pa bcas te ya ga da mthon por btsugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-2: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-5: khyed cag bya ra byed dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-8: khyed kyis dge slong sbrul dug myur du khyab bar byed pas zin te dus la bab pa ma mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-10: khyod drug sde dag kyang sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pas bzung ste dus la bab cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-11: kho bo cag shi ba'i yo byad dag 'ged par 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-12: dge slong don nyung ngu dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-13: ci'i phyir dge slong rnams kyis bzlog pa na de dang de skad zer zhes smod par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-15: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-16: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-19: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs ba snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-21: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-22: mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis drug sde dag la rmas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-25: khyod dge slong rnams kyis bzlog pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-26: de dang de skad zer ba bden nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:294b-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-0: @295a *// rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-2: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-3: rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-4: zhes rnam par smad pa mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mas rnam par smad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-8: phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-9: 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-10: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-11: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi khri'am khri'u byed du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-12: rtsa ba bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad kyi tshad du gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-13: de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-15: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-16: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshad las shin tu 'das pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-17: de'i pus mo gnyis kos ko la reg pa'i skabs de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-18: dge sbyong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-21: bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-23: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295a-24: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-0: de dang 'tsham @295b bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-6: rjes su gnang ba yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-7: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-8: dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi khri'am khri'u byed du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-9: rtsa ba bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs par bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad kyi tshad du byed du gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-10: de las lhag pa byed du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-12: dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-14: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-18: khri'u zhes bya ba yang khri'u nyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-19: byed du 'jug na zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-21: gzhan no; ;rtse ba bu gar gzhug pa ma gtogs par zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-22: rtsa ba bu gar gzhug pa bzhag ste'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-23: bde bar gshegs pa'i sor brgyad kyi tshad du byed du gzhug par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-25: bde bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:295b-27: de'i sor brgyad gang dag yin pa de la ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305a-39: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-0: dge ba'i chos rnams @305b la sgrib par byed pa ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-3: de la bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-5: srid du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho bcu /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-6: zheng du mtho drug ste; de la 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-7: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gros kyi tshad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-9: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho bcu gang yin pa de la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-10: tshad dang ldan pa'i khru bco lnga'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-11: bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho drug gang yin pa de la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-12: chad dang ldan pa'i khru dgu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-13: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-14: dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad kyi chos gos sam; bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos las lhag pa'i chos gos byed du 'jug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-15: thams cad du ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-19: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-20: bde bar gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi tshad las gyur pa'i ltung byed de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-22: ltung byed 'ba' zhig tu gyur pa rnams rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-26: grong dang khyim gzhan nyid dang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-27: bslab pa rnams dang dgon pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-28: sangs rgyas phan pa gsungs pa yis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-29: so sor bshags par bya bar gsungs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-30: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-31: ka landa ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:305b-32: rdo 'jog na khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-1: bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-2: rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-3: rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-5: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-8: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la dus gzhan zhig na sems can zhugs par gyur nas de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das te btsas pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-13: autpa la'i dri dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-14: autpa la'i ze 'bru'i mdog 'dra ba zhig byung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-15: de'i nye du dag 'dus shing lhags nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas bu mo 'di'i ming cir gdags zhes de'i ming 'dogs par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-16: nye du dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-17: gang gi phyir bu mo 'di mig autpa la 'dra la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-18: autpa la'i dri dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-19: autpa la'i ze 'bru'i mdog 'dra ba de'i phyir bu mo 'di'i ming /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-20: autpa la'i mdog ces bya bar gdags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-21: zhes de'i ming autpa la'i mdog ces bya bar btags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-22: de bsrings shing bskyed nas chen mor gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-23: de'i pha la bu med nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-24: bdag gi bu mo 'di su la yang rigs kyi phyir yang mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-25: nor gyi phyir yang mi sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306a-26: gzugs kyi phyir yang mi sbyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-0: 'di ltar gang bdag gi khyim na @306b 'dug pa'i mag par 'dug pa de la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-2: rdo 'jog na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-4: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-7: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de'i chung ma la dus gzhan zhig na sems can zhugs par gyur nas de zla ba brgyad dam; dgu 'das te btsas pa las khye'u zhig byung nas de yang rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags nas de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-9: de'i pha ma gnyis dus la bab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-10: de phan tshun 'khyams pa na stes dbang gis khyim bdag de'i khyim du phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-14: khyim bdag che ge mo zhig gi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-20: de yang dus la bab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-23: kho bos khyod la bu mo sbyin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-24: khyod kho bo'i khyim na 'dug pa'i mag pa gyis shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-27: bdag kyang pha ma gnyis dang bral nas phan tshun 'khyams shing yid chad par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-28: khyod de skad gsungs pa ma nongs kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-30: khyim bdag des de la autpa la'i mdog byin nas nyi ma dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:306b-32: yud tsam gyi sbyor bas bag mar btang nas khye'u des kyang khyim der 'dug par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-0: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na autpa la'i pha dus la bab nas de'i ma ci dga' mgur @307a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-2: rgyu ba'i sbyor bas zas dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-3: gos bzang po dag gis brtas pas nyon mongs pa dag gis gnod par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-5: gal te bdag gis 'dir skyes pa gzhan bkug na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-6: bdag gi mag pa 'dis shes par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-7: bdag 'di nyid dang lhan cig rtse ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-9: dga' mgur spyad ba nyams su myong bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-10: snyam nas des de la mtshan ma bstan to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-13: don du gnyer 'dod par 'gyur ba yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-14: des de la brtags par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-15: yang des de la mtshan ma bstan pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-16: de de dang lhan cig bsten par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-17: de'i tshe na autpa la'i mdog la sems can zhugs par gyur cing de btsa' ba'i dus la bab nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-18: des bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-21: de song ba dang ji tsam na de mag pa dang lhan cig dben pa na 'dug pa mthong nas des yud tsam zhig rtog cing der bsdad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-22: ji tsam na de phyir byung nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-23: autpa la'i mdog khyod la 'bod kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-26: ji tsam na bu mo zhig btsas nas autpa la'i mdog gis bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307a-30: khyod kyi yum dang khyim thab nad med par gyur cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-1: de ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-5: khyim thab la skur pa 'debs sam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-9: bdag gis khyod kyi mngon sum du 'gyur bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-10: zhes de de gnyis kyi skabs btsal ba de lhur len cing 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-11: ji tsam na de gnyis dben par 'dug par gyur nas des myur ba myur bar song ste autpa la'i mdog la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-14: de yang myur ba myur bar song ste bltas pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-15: de gnyis bsten pa mthong nas autpa la'i mdog gis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-17: rdo 'jog na skyes pa gzhan ma mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-19: gang gi phyir mag pa dang lhan cig sten par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-20: skal chad pa 'dis kyang rdo 'jog na bud med gzhan ma mthong ngam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-22: gang gi phyir sgyug mo dang lhan cig sten par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-23: snyam du rig nas mi bzod pa skyes nas des khyim bdag la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-25: khyod da phyin chad 'di dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod cig ces bu mo de pha'i gan du 'phangs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-26: de pha'i lus las 'dril nas sgo'i them par lhung ste klad pa zhom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-27: autpa la'i mdog mgo g-yogs te khyim nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:307b-28: ji tsam na don mthun bcom brlag tu 'phags pa mthong nas de dang lhan cig 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-1: dang lang tsho mdzes pa la chags nas des smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-7: ded dpon des de chung mar byas nas don mthun mthar gyis bcom brlag tu phyin pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-8: des de de nyid du bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-9: de nas ded dpon des zong bsgyur nas zong gi rin khyer te phyir rdo 'jog tu 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-10: de na tshong pa de dag phan tshun khyim gzhan du mgron du bos te ston mo byed pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-11: ded dpon des 'ga' yang zan ma byin nas tshong pa dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-13: khyod kyis 'ga' yang g-yar drangs te 'tshal ma ma stsal to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-16: khyim mi mo dag bdog pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-17: des na ston mo byed mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-19: gang bsnyen bkur byed pa 'ga' yang med pas kho bos ji ltar zan sbyin /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-22: ci'i slad du bu mo mi tshol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-24: kho bo'i chung ma dang 'dra ba'i bu mo 'ga' zhig yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-27: je khyed kyi btsun mo ci 'dra ba blta'i /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-29: des autpa la'i mdog gi gzugs dang lang tsho mdzes pa brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308a-33: bud med rin po che zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-0: 'on kyang de lta bu gzhan 'ga' mchis kyang gnas @308b btsal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-1: zhes de dag gis btsal bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-2: ji tsam na autpa la'i mdog nyid kyi bu mo de de dang 'dra bar mthong nas de dag gis bu mo slong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-6: ded dpon che ge mo zhig yod pa de'i phyir ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-10: 'di ltar khyed la skyon yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-11: khyed kyis bag ma blangs nas bor te 'dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-15: de dag gis de bslangs nas ded dpon gyi bag mar blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-16: de nas tshong pa de dag gi zong bsgyur te zong rin khyer nas yang bcom brlag tu 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-17: ji tsam na mthar gyis bcom brlag dang ha cang mi ring ba na ri brag cig yod pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-19: ded dpon des zong de dang bu mo de ri brag der bzhag nas nyung shas shig dang bcom brlag tu song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-20: autpa la'i mdog gis byon pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-21: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kun tu spyad de smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-29: khyod gson por byon pa dgyes mod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-30: nor lta slad kyis kyang mchis par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-31: de dus cung zad cig 'dug nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-33: kho bo bcom pa'i rdzas tshol du 'gro'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-37: de song ma thag kho nar de'i shed mthun 'ongs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:308b-38: autpa la'i mdog la dris pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-3: bcom pa'i rdzas tshol du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-11: de da ltar phun sum tshogs shing 'ongs pa de ltar sngon 'ga' yang phun sum tshogs shing ma 'ongs pas des khyod brid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-15: des rdo 'jog nas sa 'dzin ma 'di lta bu zhig khrid de 'ongs pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-16: khyod de'i rkang pa gnyis 'khru bar yang mi rung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-20: des sdod cig ces byas te cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-21: ji tsam na ded dpon de 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-22: des brnyas thabs sngon du btang ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-24: khyod kyis bcom pa'i rdzas btsal tam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-28: khyod kyis kho mo brid de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-29: khyod gang du sus kyang ma bcom gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-30: kho mos ji ltar khyod kyis rdo 'jog nas sa 'dzin ma zhig khrid de 'ongs zhes thos kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-31: de 'di nyid du khrid de spyon cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-32: gang gi gnas gnyis su 'god par 'gyur ba de'i longs spyod dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-35: yongs su mthar thug par 'gyur ro; ;bzang mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309a-36: gal te de lta yin du zin kyang khyod kyis gang gi khyim na chung ma gnyis yod pa des lan 'ga' yang skyo ma grang mo mi 'thung zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-2: zhes bya ba ma thos sam //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-7: gal te nu mo tsam zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-8: nu mo'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-9: gal te bu mo tsam zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-10: bu mo'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag par bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-16: zhes des de khrid de 'ongs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-17: des de mthong nas rjes su chags pa skyes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-18: dus gzhan zhig na autpa la'i mdog gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-19: bu mo de'i skra bla bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-20: mgo la sgros yod par mthong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-25: bdag gi phyi mo'i mchid nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-26: khyod kyi ma pha la khros pas khyod 'phangs pas sgo'i them par lhung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-30: ming che ge mo zhig go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-35: ma dang chen chun du gyur la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-37: bu mo dang chen chun du gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-38: rnam pa thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-39: snyam nas de mgo g-yogs te khyim nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-40: ji tsam na don mthun yul yangs pa can du 'phags pa mthong nas de yang de dang lhan cig 'phags pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-41: de tshong pa dag dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod cing yangs pa can du song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:309b-42: yangs pa can na gnas pa'i tshogs can ma dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-1: dag bag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-2: dga' mgur spyod pa nyams su myong bar mi byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-3: de na tshogs can ma gcig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-4: de dag gis sa 'dzin ma 'di lta bu zhig khrid de 'ongs pas bdag cag de'i rkang pa gnyis 'khru bar yang mi nus pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-5: ci'i phyir de dag bdag cag dang lhan cig rtse ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-7: dga' mgur spyod pa nyams su myong par byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-8: tshogs can ma de dag 'dus te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-9: autpa la'i mdog gi gan du dong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-11: khyod kho mo cag gi 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed na ci'i phyir kho mo cag gi nang du mi 'jug /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-12: des mgo g-yogs pa bshus te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-13: bdag deng phyin chad khyed cag gi nang du 'jug go //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-14: zhes de de dag gi gan du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-15: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-16: tshogs can ma de dag chang gral du tshogs shing gtam zer ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-18: bdag cag las gang gis tshong pa gang nor ji tsam dang bral bar byas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-19: de na gcig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-21: tshong pa che ge mo zhig nor 'di tsam dang bral bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-24: tshong pa che ge mo dag nor 'di tsam dang bral bar byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-25: yang gzhan dag gis smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:310a-27: yangs pa can na spos tshong gi khye'u mi sdug pa thob pa zhig 'dug pa de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-9: gal te dbyig su'i yin zhes zer na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-10: autpa la'i mdog gi yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-19: rigs kyi bu de na bas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-27: na chung chen mo zhig ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-28: rang gi sman gyis bsnyen bkur byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-29: snyam nas de de la rjes su chags pa skyes nas des bu mo de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-31: autpa la'i mdog la spos tshong gi khye'u de khyod lta bar 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-33: bu mo des autpa la'i mdog la brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-37: da dung rigs kyi bu de ma sos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-39: de song ste de la de skad brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-40: de yang dang yang du bu mo de la nyi ma gang la 'ong bar bya zhes 'dri'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-41: des autpa la'i mdog la brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311a-43: de lhag par chags par gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311b-0: thabs kyi rnam @311b pa lags pa zhig bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311b-1: snyam nas des rtsva mi zhig byas te khri'i steng du bzhag nas dur khrod du 'khyer te bsregs nas de'i 'og tu skra bshig cing du ba'i bzhin gyis spos tshong gi khye'u de'i tshong khang dang ha cang thag mi ring ba nas 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311b-2: spos tshong gi khye'u des de mthong ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311b-14: spos tshong gi khye'u de de la shin tu chags par gyur nas bu mo de la yang smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311b-17: des autpa la'i mdog la brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311b-19: bu mo song la 'di skad ces /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311b-20: rigs kyi bu de der dus la bab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311b-21: da dung mya ngan ma sangs pas mthong bar ga la 'gyur zhes byos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:311b-22: autpa la'i mdog gis ji lta ji ltar bsgyangs pa de lta de ltar spos tshong gi khye'u de chags pa dang bcas pas mthong 'dod par gyur nas autpa la'i mdog gis de la sdum par ma byon par skyed mos tshal ga ge mo zhig tu spyon cig ces phrin spring pa dang /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-0: ji tsam na der ro zhing chang gi dbang gis bdag nyid mi @312a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-1: dran par gyur nas autpa la'i mdog gis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-3: 'di skye bo mang pos tshor bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-4: snyam nas des de'i mgo la phreng ba btags te gnya' ba bsgril nas khyim du khrid pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-5: tshogs can ma de dag gis de mthong nas de dag mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-6: sa 'dzin ma 'dis spos tshong gi khye'u mi sdug pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-7: rjes su 'jug par byas pa legs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-8: zhes de dag gis de thu mo'i gnas su bzhag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-9: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-11: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-12: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na; de la sems can zhugs par gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-13: yangs pa can na sgo ba gnyis yod de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-16: de gnyis phan tshun bshes par gyur nas de na gcig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-18: gang gis bdag cag gnyis shi zhing dus la bab kyang bshes pa'i rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-20: shed mthun bdag cag gnyis kyi bu mo phan tshun sha klag bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-21: gal te kho bo la bu yod la khyod la bu mo yod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-22: khyod kyi bu mo kho bo'i bu la sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-23: gal te khyod la bu yod la kho bo la bu mo yod na kho bo'i bu mo khyod kyi bu la sbyin par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312a-24: des na bdag cag gnyis shi zhing dus la bab na yang bshes rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312b-0: @312b autpa la'i mdog zla ba dgu 'das te btsas pa las /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312b-1: khye'u zhig byung nas des bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312b-2: bud med gang la bu chung ngu yod pa de skyes pa dag gis 'di yongs su spang ngo //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:312b-6: der gnas gcig tu khye'u bzhag ste mar me tshugs la 'ga' zhig gis blangs kyi bar du mtha' gcig tu sdod cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313a-0: @313a *// nub kyi sgo bas thos nas des bsam pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313a-2: de bdag gi mag par 'gyur ro //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313a-21: de rab tu dga' bas blangs so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313b-10: de bdag gis mna' mar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313b-12: des de la gos dang rgyan dag bskur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313b-13: de bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur nas ji tsam na de yang dga' 'dun ma'i nang du zhugs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313b-14: ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313b-22: 'di ltar khrims su bya ba bca' ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313b-23: bdag cag las gang de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod par mi byed pa de la dga' 'dun dag gis karsha pa na drug cu dbab bo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313b-24: de dag gis sa 'dzin ma autpa la'i mdog karsha pa na lnga brgyas glas te skyed mos tshal du khrod nas dga' 'dun de dag thams cad kyis res kyis de dang lhan cig dga' mgur spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313b-25: shar gyi sgo ba'i bu de dga' mgur spyod par mi 'dod nas autpa la'i mdog gis de la smras pa /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:313b-29: des chad pas 'jigs pas dga' mgur spyad pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-0: de autpa la'i mdog la rjes su chags pa skyes nas des @314a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-1: de gcig pus chung ma khud par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-2: li tsa byi dag khros nas shar gyi sgo ba'i bu des /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-3: tshogs kyis spyad par bya ba'i bud med de gcig pus chung ma khud par byas kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-9: tha mal pa yin pas gzhan zhig shar gyi sgo ba de'i gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-10: ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-11: shar gyi sgo ba de skrag nas li tsa byi rnams kyi gan du song ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-12: rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-17: des de dag la rgyas par brjod pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-18: de na kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-20: shar gyi sgo ba 'di bdag la yun ring po nas phan pa byed byed pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-21: gal te 'di'i bu tshogs can ma 'dod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-26: zhes de dag gis de la autpa la'i mdog byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-27: shar gyi sgo ba'i bu des tshogs las thob pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-28: bag tsha ba med par autpa la'i mdog chung mar blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-29: de nas de'i phas nub kyi sgo ba la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-30: shed mthun khye'u la bu mo bag mar thong zhig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-33: khyod kyi bus chung ma blangs zin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-34: bag ma gzhan gyis ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314a-39: gal te kho bo la 'byor pa yod par gyur na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-0: kho bo bu'i chung ma'i 'khor rnam par 'jog par byed @314b do; ;nub kyi sgo bas sngar 'thams pa'i phyir shar gyi sgo ba'i bu la bu mo byin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-1: shar gyi sgo ba'i bu des kyang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-4: yud tsam gyi sbyor bas de bag mar blangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-5: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po shar gyi sgo ba de'i khyim du 'gro ba des bu mo de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-7: khyod kyi chen ma gang yin pa 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-9: khyod kyi khyim thab gang yin pa 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-10: khyod kyi ming po yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-11: ma la rab tu sdang ba'i sems ma skyed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-12: sems can dmyal ba la gzhol bar 'gyur bar ma byed cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-13: autpa la'i mdog de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-15: dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-17: ji tsam na bram ze zhig lam de nas 'gro ba des mthong nas des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-18: mi rnams nang na mchog gi rab kyi mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-19: mtshungs med rgyal ba skyob pa'i nyan thos ma /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-20: me tog man d'a ra ka rab 'dra ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-21: sring mo khye'u 'di khyod kyi ci zhig yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-22: des kyang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-23: bram ze 'di ni bdag gi ming po dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-24: ming po'i bu dang bu dang skud po yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-25: 'di yi pha de bdag gi pha yin te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-26: ming por gyur nas da ltar khyo 'di yin /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-34: khyod kyi bu bdag gis shar sgor bor ba gang lags pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:314b-35: da ltar khyod kyi khyim thab 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-0: khyod kyi bu mo bdag gis nub @315a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-1: sgor bor ba gang lags pa de ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-2: da ltar khyod kyi chun ma 'di lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-3: autpa la'i mdog gis bsam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-5: bdag ma dang chen chun du gyur nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-6: yang bu mo dang chen chun du gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-7: da yang bdag bu mo deng chen chun du gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-8: bu khyim thab tu gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-9: rnam pa thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-10: snyam nas de mgo g-yogs te khyim nas byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-11: ji tsam na don mthun rgyal po'i khab tu 'phags pa mthong nas de de dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-12: de yang 'jud mthun ma'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-13: ji tsam na dga' 'dun lnga brgya skyed mos tshal du 'phags nas de dag gis gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-15: bdag cag gyi na de bzhin du skyed mos tshal du dong ste ci rung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-21: zhes de dag gis sa 'dzin ma autpa la'i mdog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-22: karsha pa na lnga brgyas glas te skyed mos tshal du khrid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-23: de dag zos shing 'thungs nas de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-25: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-26: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po autpa la'i mdog gdul ba'i dus shes nas de dag dang ha cang thag mi ring ba na shing ljon pa zhig gi drung na 'chag cing 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-27: de na dga' 'dun gcig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315a-28: 'phags pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-0: 'dod @315b pa'i dam du bying ba yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-1: autpa la'i mdog gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-2: bdag gis yangs pa can du spos tshong gi khye'u mi sdug pa thob pa rjes su 'jug par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-5: 'di yang rjes su 'jug par byed 'dod dam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-8: 'di skyes pa skyes pa'i dbang po dang stan pa yin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-9: 'di skyes pa skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-10: kho mos gal te 'di rjes su 'jug par bya na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-13: gal te khyod kyis 'di rjes su 'jug par ma nus na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-15: khyod gcig pu'i chung ma khud pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-17: de ltar gyis shig ;autpa la'i mdog gis khas blangs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bud med kyi g-yo dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-18: bud med kyi gya gyu dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-19: bud med kyi ya yo dag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-20: bud med kyi sgyu gang dag yin pa de dag nye bar bstan par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-21: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dbang po bag phab ste 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-23: bud med kyi yul gyi reg pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-27: snyam nas des 'khyud par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-28: tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ngang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas tshigs su bcad pa dgra smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-30: chu bas yongs su dkris gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:315b-31: mi gtsang rul ba dri nga ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-2: rtsog pas gang ba'i rkyal pa khyod //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-3: gsong ldong phol mig ngal skyen ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-4: rgyun lam dgu nas rtag tu ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-5: mi gtsang rab tu 'dzag pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-6: ji ltar kho bos khyod shes ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-7: skye bos khyod ni shes gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-8: dbyar dus phyi sa'i gnas bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-9: thag ring rnam par spong bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-10: gang phyir byis pa gti mug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-11: mun pas bsgribs pa mi shes pa //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-12: de phyir rdzab la glang rgan bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-13: de dag khyod la chags par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-14: autpa la'i mdog gis kyang tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-15: skal pa chen po de lta lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-16: 'phags pas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-18: chu bas yongs su dkris gyur cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-19: mi gtsang rus pa dri nga ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-20: gzhan la sten cing bdag gir bgyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-21: rtsog pas gtams pa'i rkyal pa bdag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-22: gsong ldong phol mig ngal skyen ldan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-23: rgyun lam dgu nas rtag tu ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-24: mi gtsang rab tu 'dzag pa lags //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-25: ji ltar 'phags pas bdag mkhyen ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-26: skye bos bdag ni 'tshal gyur na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-27: dbyar dus slad sa'i gnas bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-28: thag ring rnam par spong bar 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-29: gang phyir byis pa gti mug gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-30: mun pas bsgribs pas ma 'tshal ba //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-31: de phyir rdzab la glang rgan bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-32: de dag bdag la chags par bgyid //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-33: skal pa chen po mar gshegs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-34: 'phags pa chos ni bstan du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316a-35: shes rab mchog gi bstan pa la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-0: bdag gis khyod kyi @316b nyan thos bgyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-1: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil nas babs nas des de'i bsam pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-4: rang bzhin khong du chud nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-5: 'di ltar autpa la'i mdog gis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan par byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-6: des bden pa mthong nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-8: bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'phags pa la brten nas 'phags pas bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-9: bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-12: lha rnams kyis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-13: sngon gyi pha mes dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-14: dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-17: rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-18: khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-20: rus pa'i ri dag las ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-22: ngan song gi sgo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-24: mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-30: lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:316b-32: thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-0: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste @317a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-1: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-5: mngon par zhugs pa lags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-8: mngon par zhugs pa lags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-13: dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-14: bdag dge bsnyen mar gzung du gsol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-15: deng slan chad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar glo ba thag pa nas rab tu dang bas skyabs su mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-16: de nas rigs kyi bu mo autpa la'i mdog gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa; btsun pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-18: bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-19: rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po 'thob na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-20: bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-23: song la khyim thab dag la gsol cig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-24: de de dag gis gan du song ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-26: bdag rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-29: ci'i phyir kho bo cag la co 'dri bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317a-36: de de dag gi gnang nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po ga la ba der song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-0: des de khrid nas bcom ldan 'das @317b ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-1: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-4: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-5: rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po 'tshal lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-9: zhes bka' stsal nas rang nyid kyis skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la 'phrin yig bri bar brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-10: bcom ldan 'das 'phrin yig mdzad pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-11: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos 'ongs te gsol ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-13: 'jud mthun ma 'di ci'i slad du 'dir mchis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-17: khyod kyi chos kyi sring mo 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-18: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-19: rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong ma'i dngos po 'dod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-23: mnyan yod du skye rgu'i bdag mo chen mo la'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-25: bdag gis kyang 'di la sel ba stsal bar bgyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-28: rgyal pos de'i sel ba bskos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:317b-29: autpa la'i mdog gis 'phrin yig ma nos te mnyan yod du song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-1: mo chen mo go'u ta mis de rab tu phyung /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-2: rdzogs par bsnyen par byas te gdams ngag byin nas de gcig tu dben pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-5: bdag nyid btang bar gnas pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-6: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba 'di nyid rig ste 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-9: rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis zil gyis mnan nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas rigs kyi bu mo dag gang gi phyir skra bregs te gos ngur smrig dag bgos nas yang dag pa kho nar dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-10: tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-11: tshangs par spyod pa spyad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-13: srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-15: dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-16: bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-17: nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-18: tsandan bzhag pa lta bu rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-20: so sor yang dag par rig pa thob pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-23: bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318a-24: dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyi mchod par bya ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-0: rjed par bya ba @318b dang; mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-3: nga'i nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul che ba rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-4: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog 'di mchog yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-5: dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-7: autpa la'i mdog gis las ci zhig bgyis na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-9: autpa la'i dri dang ldan pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-10: autpa la'i ze 'bru'i mdog 'dra bar gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-12: des skyes pa dag gis phongs pa ma mchis par gyur cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-15: des nyan thos ma rdzu 'phrul che ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-16: mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog tu bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-19: autpa la'i mdog nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-21: 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-22: gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur pa dag byas shing bsags pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-23: autpa la'i mdog nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-25: las byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:318b-26: phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin pa mi 'gyur /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-2: 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-5: skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te; las rnams skal pa brgyar yang ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-6: chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-7: rnyed na lus can rnams la ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-10: sngon byung ba ri brag cig na; khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-12: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-14: zong thogs te yul gzhan zhig tu song ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-15: de'i chung ma gos dang zas bzang bas nyon mongs pa dag gis gnod par gyur nas de dang ha cang thag mi ring ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-16: 'jud mthun ma'i khyim zhig 'dug pa der skyes pa gzhan dag 'jug cing gzhan dag 'byung ba mthong nas des bsam pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-17: bud med 'di'i bsod nams byas pa yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-18: 'di skyes pa dag gis phongs pa med pa yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-19: bdag kyang gang gis skyes pa dag gis phongs pa med par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs ci yod snyam nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-20: de de ltar sems pa na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-21: der gcer bu pa'i nyan thos ma zhig 'ongs nas des de la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-23: gang gis gang sems pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319a-24: gang sgrub pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i thabs ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319b-0: kho mo'i ming po rab tu byung ba brtul @319b zhugs grub pa bdag nyid chen po zhig yod pa de zan byin la smon lam thob cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319b-2: sgrub pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319b-6: song la bdag nyid chen po de kho mo'i khyim du zan la bos shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319b-7: des de zan la bos so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319b-8: khyim bdag gi chung ma des kyang zan sbyar cing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319b-9: autpa la dag gis lag pa sta gon byas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319b-11: dus su yang zan za la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319b-12: dus ma yin par yang za bas de yun ring zhig thogs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319b-13: sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:319b-14: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:330a-4: gal te de lta na kho bo cag ches sngar mgron du bos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:330a-5: gang gi tshe dmag dpon seng+ge'i bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas bden pa dag mthong ba de'i tshe na /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:330a-18: zhes bsgrags pas de'i phyir kho po cag ches sngar mgron du bos so //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:330a-27: gzhan sgrub kyi bar du re zhig sdod cig /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:330b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:330b-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang snga ma bzhin te /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:330b-24: rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-10: dge 'dun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-12: bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams par gyur la zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-14: yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-16: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-17: slob pa dag gi khyim gang dag dge 'dun gyis bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de lta bu dag tu zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-18: ji skad bstan pa lta bu dag tu'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-19: sngar mgron du ma bos par zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-21: song ste zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-23: rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-26: bza' ba zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-30: byin len stob tu bcug nas so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-31: 'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-33: dge slong des zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-34: dge slong gang yin pa des so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-35: phyi rol kun dga' ra bar song ste zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-36: gong gi phyi rol gtsug lag khang du song ste'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-37: dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:334b-38: de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa rnams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-0: bdag la smad pa'i gnas zhes bya ba @335a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-2: mi rigs pa zhes bya ba ni tshul dang mi mthun pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-3: so sor bshags par bya ba zhes bya ba ni mthol bar bya ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-4: byung gi zhes bya ba ni ltung ba byung gi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-5: chos de zhes bya ba ni chos ma yin pa chos kyi sgrar gsungs pa de'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-7: zhes bya ba ni mthol lo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-9: so sor bshags par bya ba ste zhes bya ba ni mthol bar bya ste'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-10: chos 'di yang so sor bshags par bya ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-11: zhes bya ba ni chos 'di yang mthol bar bya ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-12: des na so sor bshags par bya ba'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-14: de la ltung bar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-15: dge slong gis ji tsam cung zad slob pa dag gi khyim gang dag dge 'dun gyis bslab pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa de lta bu dag tu sngar mgron du ma bos par song ste rang gi lag gis bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-16: bza' ba blangs nas 'cha'am za na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-17: thams cad du so sor bshags par bya bar 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-18: sngar mgron du bos pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-22: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-23: bslab pa dral te khyim du 'jug pa'i so sor bshags par bya ba ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335a-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-0: ser skya'i gnas kyi nags su dbyar gnas @335b par zhal gyis bzhes so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis zhag bdun nam brgyad na dgag dbye 'byung bar 'gyur na spyod yul gyi grong du zhag 'di snyed na dgag dbye 'byung bar 'gyur zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-2: zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong rnams kyis dong ste brjod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-3: de nas ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i sh'akya dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-4: de nyid kyi dgag dbye bco lnga pa la bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-5: mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-6: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-7: yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-8: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-9: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-12: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-13: de nas ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-14: rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-15: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas sang 'di nyid du bdag cag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:335b-16: sang dge slong 'gas kyang bsod snyoms la 'jug par mi bgyi ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-2: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la rang gi sug pa nas tshim zhing stob par bgyid do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-4: de nas ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i sh'akya rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-5: de dag gis ser skya'i gnas su dong ste de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-6: bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa dag sta gon byas nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-7: de nas nang par sngar langs te bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-8: bza' ba dag gis shing rta dag bkang nas sh'akya mo rnams la smras pa; khyed cag je shing rta dag zhon la dengs shig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-9: kho bo dag kyang phyi bzhin 'ong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-10: de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te shing rta dag la zhon nas 'phags so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-11: ser skya'i gnas kyi nye 'khor thibs po yin pas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-12: de dag lam kar chom rkun pa dag gis mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-14: sh'akya mo dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'di dag 'dong gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-17: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon gyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336a-20: khyed cag la 'di dag bcom pas ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-0: sh'akya gdug pa pha rol gnon pa @336b dag gnod par byed par 'gyur gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-6: zhes de dag gis de'i tshig tshig ma yin par byas te de dag bcom nas gos dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-7: rgyan thams cad 'phrog ste dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-8: sh'akya mo de dag kyang 'jigs shing skrag nas sgren mor tshang tshing dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-9: nags ma dag gi nang du yib ste 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-10: shing rta 'ded pa dag kyang skrag nas byer ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-11: glang dag kyang chu thag bcad nas ci dgar yan cing 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-12: shing rta dag kyang shing rta'i mnga' dang bral te 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-13: drug sde dag gis phan tshun gros bya bar brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-15: sh'akya bag med pa dag yun ring du thogs pas bdag cag gis zan gcad par bya'am ci /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-18: zhes de dag lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-20: ji tsam na lam ga na shing rta bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-21: bza' bas gang ba shing rta'i mda' dang bral ba dag 'dug pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-22: glang dag chu thag bcad de /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-23: ci dgar yan cing 'khod pa dag mthong nas de dag gis phan tshun rnam par bltas nas 'bod par brtsams pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-26: de dag gis skad phyung ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-27: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-30: bdag cag sh'akya mo dag go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:336b-32: kho bo cag la brims shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-1: chom rkun pa dag gis bcom ste sgren mor mchis so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-2: kho bo cag gdugs tshod yol gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-4: khyed cag gi yan lag dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-5: nying lag dag las kho bo cag gi sngon ma mthong ba gang yod tshur sheg /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-6: de dag lo ma dag gis g-yogs te byung nas brim par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-7: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-18: de dag de ltar gtses pa na ngo tsha nas tshang tshing dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-19: nags ma de dag nyid kyi nang du yib ste 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-20: sel ba dag gis kyang sh'akya rnams la sh'akya mo rnams bcom mo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-22: de nas sh'akya dag mda' gzhu lag na thogs shing mtshon bzas pa dag gis lam kar dong ste lam bgags nas de dag gis chom rkun pa de dag bzung ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-23: de nas kha cig gis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-24: 'di dag la btang snyoms byar ci yod /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-27: re zhig der khrid la sh'akya mo rnams la dris te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-28: gang la yan lag gang gis nyes pa byas pa de'i de gcad par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337a-29: de dag gis de dag khrid nas sh'akya mo rnams kyi gan du dong ste smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-0: chom rkun pa 'di dag las gang gis khyed cag la yan lag gang gis nyes pa byas @337b pa smros shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-2: chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-4: gnod pa mi byed pa yin te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-6: de dag ma btub pas 'di ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-8: de dag gis de btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-9: de srog de'u chad pa las phyir thob nas des de dag gi rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-11: khyed cag dad pa skyes te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la gdugs tshod gsol du 'gro ba yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-12: 'di dag bsad pas khyod la ci bya /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-13: nyes pa 'di dag kyang gtang bar gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-14: de dag las bcom pa'i rdzas dag phyir bkug ste btang ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-15: de nas sh'akya de dag gis sh'akya mo de dag gos bskon cing rgyan thogs su bcug nas shing rta dag kyang chu thag btags te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-16: shing rta la zhon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-17: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gong du gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-19: sh'akya mo rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la brim par brtsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-20: sh'akya mo rnams drug sde dag la zas mi sbyin nas sh'akya rnams kyis smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-21: ci'i phyir 'phags pa dag la zhal zas mi gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:337b-28: khyed cag sgren mo dag gis ji ltar brims /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-0: de'i phyir 'di dag gis kho mo cag mtho btsams te ji ltar kho mo cag lo ma dag gis g-yogs te @338a *//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-2: nags ma dag gi nang nas byung ste brim par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-3: 'di dag gis mtho btsams te 'di ltar brjod par bya ba mang du yod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-7: gnas ngan len kun tu spyod pa yin gyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-8: 'di dag la zas mi sbyin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-9: de dag cang mi smra bar 'khod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-10: de nas de dag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun la brims nas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-12: kye ma khyod kyis lam 'di 'jigs pa dang bcas pa yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-14: bdag cag bag bgyid cing mchi'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-16: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-19: dge slong nags nyul ba bsko bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-20: dge slong nags nyul ba chos lnga dang ldan pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-21: ma bskos pa yang bsko bar mi bya la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-22: bskos pa yang dbyung bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-28: nags byul ba dang ma byul ba mi shes pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-29: nags nyul ba chos lnga dang ldan pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-30: ma bskos pa yang bsko bar bya ba la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-31: bskos pa yang dbyung bar mi bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-34: zhe sdang gis mi 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338a-35: gti mug gis mi 'gro ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-1: nags byul ba dang ma byul ba shes pa'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-3: gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gand'i brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pas de dang por spro bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-4: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar spro'am /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-8: de nas dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-9: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-10: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-11: dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar spro na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-12: gal te dge 'dun gyis dus la bab cing bzod na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-13: dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-14: dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyis nags nyul bar bsko ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-15: dge slong nags nyul ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-21: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-22: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-23: dge 'dun gyi nags nyul bar spro na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-24: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bskos te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-27: tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bsko bar bzod pa de dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:338b-29: gang dag mi bzod pa dag ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-1: nas dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba nags nyul bar bskos lags /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-4: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-5: ngas dge slong nags nyul ba'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-6: dge slong nags nyul bas dpag tshad phyed nas bzung ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-7: khor khor yug tu nags byul bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nags nyul bas dpag tshad phyed nas bzung ste khor khor yug tu nags byul bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-10: de lam gyis dub cing gcig pu 'jigs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-12: khye'u sus sbyin par bya zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-14: gal te nags 'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-15: des dung brda gtul bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-16: ba dan sngon po bsgreng bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-17: 'dab ma'i chang bu dag lam gar gzhag par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-18: gal te nags 'jigs pa med pa nyid yin na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-19: ba dan dkar po bsgreng bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-20: dge slong nags nyul bas kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa yang dag par blangs te 'jug par mi byed na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-22: dge slong don nyung ngu dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339a-23: ci'i phyir dge slong nags sngar ma byul bar kun dga' ra ba'i phyi rol du bca' ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:339b-0: bza' ba blangs te 'cha' zhing za zhes smod @339b par byed /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-3: 'khor ba na sems can rnams nye du la byams pa ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-4: thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa yin pas de dag de bzhin du ngu zhing mi sdod pa thos nas dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-7: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-8: stan la ma brtags par khyim gzhan du stan la 'dug par mi bya bar bslab par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-9: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das mngon par byung nas lo bcu gnyis lon zhing /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-10: rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo drug lon nas ser skya'i gnas su byon pa de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-12: yab kyi gan du gdugs tshod gsol /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-13: nyi ma gnyis pa la ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-14: rang gi btsun mo'i 'khor du gdugs tshod gsol ba na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-15: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas btsun mo grags 'dzin bshos 'brim pa la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-16: rkang pas rkang pa la phul ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-17: de stobs dang ldan pas 'gyel nas des btsun mo sa 'tsho ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355a-19: 'phags pa 'char kas bdag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar mtho btsams so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-0: des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa @355b dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-2: de ci nas kyang phyin chad de ltar byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar mi dga' bar bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-3: ji tsam nyi ma gzhan zhig la btsun mo grags 'dzin gyis khri'u ma brgyus pa zhig ras kyis g-yogs nas bu mo mngag gzhug ma la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-5: song la re zhig rgyal po'i pho grang gi sgor sdod la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-6: gang gi tshe 'phags pa 'char ka 'ong ba de'i tshe na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-7: khyod kyis 'di skad ces; bram ze bram ze zhes brjod par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-8: gal te bram zes ci bya zhes zer ba de la btsun mo'i 'khor du 'bod do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-10: bu mo de byung ba dang tshe dag ldan pa 'char ka yang 'ongs nas /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-11: der bram zer bram ze zhes 'bod par brtsams pa dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-18: der gor ma chag par sbyin par byed kyi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-20: snyam nas der myur ba myur bar song ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-21: btsun mo grags 'dzin gyis bu mo la smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-23: kho mos khyod la bram ze bos shig ces bsgos na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-24: khyod kyis ci'i phyir dge sbyong mgo reg bos /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-25: de cang mi smra bar 'dug go /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-26: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas smras pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-27: gal te kho bo khyod kyi khyim thab kyi gan du rab tu byung zhes te /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-28: kho bo'i bram ze yang nyams snyam mam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-30: gal te bram ze na ni /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-31: aom bhu ra bhu ba sva zhes zer la /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-32: 'on te rab tu byung na ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:355b-33: sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste //

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-10: de'i phyir bdag gis bram ze la 'di dang 'di sbyin par bya'o //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral bar mdzad na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-15: 'di lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral bar ma mdzad do //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-17: 'phags pa; bud med kyi yul ni /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-25: zho'i kham phor 'di dang; phye'i kham phor 'di 'greng ste longs la khri'u 'di la bzhugs shig /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-27: khri'u 'di yang kho bo la sbyin nam /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-32: gal te khri'u mi ster na /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-35: des khri'u de nyid la lus thams cad kyis ljid kyis phab ste 'dug pa dang bsgyel nas zho'i kham phor dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-36: phye'i kham phor de de'i mgor bo ba dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-37: de dag gis rta gad kyis btab ste /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-38: lag pa dang rkang pa dag nas bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rol pa'i rdzing du 'phangs so //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356a-39: de langs te gos dag 'tshir ba de /

K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:356b-7: kha zer bar byed pa thos nas skabs de /
