K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-12: rtsod pa zhi bar bya ba'i chos bdun rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-13: bzod pa dka' thub dam pa bzod pa ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-14: mya ngan 'das pa mchog ces sangs rgyas gsung //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-15: rab tu byung ba gzhan la gnod pa dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-16: gzhan la 'tshe ba dge sbyong ma yin no //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-17: mig ldan 'gro ba yod pa yi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-18: nyam nga ba dag ji bzhin du //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-20: sdig pa dag ni yongs su spong //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-21: skur pa mi gdab gnod mi bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-22: so sor thar pa'ang bsdam par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-23: zas kyi tshod kyang rig par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-24: bas mtha'i gnas su gnas par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-25: lhag pa'i sems la yang dag sbyor //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-26: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-27: ji ltar bung ba me tog las //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-28: kha dog dri la mi gnod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385a-29: khu ba bzhibs nas 'phur ba ltar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-0: de bzhin thub pa grong du @385b rgyu; ;bdag gi rigs dang mi rigs la //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-1: brtag par bya ste gzhan rnams kyi //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-2: mi mthun pa dang gzhan dag gi /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-3: byas dang ma byas rnams la min //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-4: lhag pa'i sems la bag bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-5: thub pa'i thub gzhi rnams la bslab //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-6: nyer zhi rtag tu dran ldan pa'i //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-7: skyob pa mya ngan med pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-8: sbyin pas bsod nams rab tu 'phel //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-9: legs bsdams dgra sogs mi 'gyur ro //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-10: dge dang ldan pas sdig pa spongs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-11: nyon mongs zad pas mya ngan 'da'//
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-12: sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-13: dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-14: rang gi sems ni yongs su 'dul //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-15: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-16: lus kyi sdom pa legs pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-17: ngag gi sdom pa'ang legs pa yin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-18: yid kyi sdom pa'ang legs pa ste //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-19: thams cad du ni sdom pa legs //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-20: kun tu bsdams pa'i dge sbyong ni //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-21: sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-22: ngag rnams bsrungs shing yid kyis rab bsdams te //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-23: lus kyis mi dge ba dag mi byed cing //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-24: las lam gsum po 'di dag rab sbyangs na //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-25: drang srong gsungs pa'i lam ni thob par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-26: sangs rgyas rnam gzigs gtsug tor thams cad skyob //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-27: 'khor ba 'jig dang gser thub 'od srung dang //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-28: sh'akya thub pa go'u ta ma lha yi lha //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-29: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba bla na med //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-30: 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa mchog /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-31: sangs rgyas dpa' bo bdun po dag /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-32: grags ldan rnams kyis so sor thar //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:385b-33: 'di ni rab tu rgyas par bstan //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-2: sangs rgyas nyan thos rnams kyang gus //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-3: 'di la gus dang bcas gyur pas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-4: 'dus ma byas pa thob par gyis //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-5: brtsam par bya zhing dbyung bar bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-6: sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-7: 'dam bu'i khyim du glang chen bzhin //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-8: 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par byed //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-9: gang zhig rab tu bag yod par //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-11: skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-12: sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur //
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-13: 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa rdzogs so ////
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-14: dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-15: 'phags pa gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba'i 'dul ba 'dzin pa kha che'i bye brag tu smra ba'i slob dpon dzi na mi tra dang /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-16: zhu chen gyi lo tstsha ba bandhe klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
K01acip-k_lha_sa-008-001:386a-20: brgyad cu rtsa gsum du byas so ////
